Summary: Understand that we are all limited due to COVID, but this is no excuse for hotels to downgrade service. Asked for a teabag one nite, and the only one the front desk could find, was a Chai Vanilla which was terrible.   The to go breakfast bag was totally lacking, an apple, a cheap nutrient bar and a muffin. Can‚Äôt anyone think out of the box, would adding a juice be to much. Maybe instead of a breakfast box, a gift certificate to Starbucks would work better.  It‚Äôs tough enough dealing with COVID, but starting the day without breakfast makes it that much worse.

Please think of us when planning your next trip to Cypress, we welcome another opportunity to extend our hospitality to you.

Summary Heading: Clean, safe, comfortable hotel with very friendly, helpful staff.
Summary: I stayed here in early March 2020 one week before the pandemic began.  The hotel is in a great location near Target and some good restaurants which you can easily walk to.  Disneyland is just a short drive or Uber away in about 10 minutes.  The hotel staff was very kind and went above & beyond to make sure that my room was fresh, clean, and comfortable.  Slept very well and enjoyed the wonderful spread at breakfast.  This is a newer property and I loved all the amenities including the fitness center.  Recommend highly.
Manager Response: Thank you maconMouse for the positive review. We hope to keep you as a satisfied guest and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Fantastic  customer service. Check in was seamless and the staff was very friendly. The room was very clean and comfortable. I received a text from the front desk once we arrived at our room to verify that everything was acceptable and see if I needed anything. The kids raved about the waffles at the complimentary breakfast.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. Thank you for taking the time to recognize our staff they do their best to ensure our guest have a happy stay and I am so proud they were able to make a difference in your visit with us,. We love the waffles too, great to here the kids enjoyed them as well. We hope to welcome back soon.

Summary Heading: Good location between military locations for Reservists
Summary: We stayed at this location because we had Military business to do at the Reserve Center at Garden Grove, CA. It was also close to Los Alamitos. They have free breakfast and waive hotel taxes for those on government orders (but there is still a CA tourist tax). You are a short drive down the road from Disney Land and close to beaches. This hotel does not have a bar/restaurant for dinner or happy hour, but they do have wine/beer to sell in their snacks area. It is also right next to a Target if you forget anything and don't want to pay the higher prices at the hotel. You are in walking distance from plenty of restaurants and half an 15-20 minute drives from Seal and Long Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for your service as a military reservist. We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your recent experience at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are proud to hear we were able to provide you with a comfortable place to rest well visiting for business. We hope you had some time to visit the local area and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: great stay because of the staff!!!
Summary: A true 10... one of the best things of the whole trip was meeting Michelle.. a truly beautiful person, very professional, kind, friendly and helpful a true asset to your hotel. We are shareholders in Hilton worldwide (HLT) and Michelle is just what we want to represent our company (great job lady) and as a personal note... My wife and myself would like to thank you for being part of our Hilton family...
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate the feedback and are so happy to hear you had a great stay. Thank you for taking the time to recognize Michelle she is a gem at the front desk and we are so proud to have her, Thank you for your loyalty and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: This was our first time staying at this hotel and it was hands down the best hotel I‚Äôve ever stayed at in a long time. Every single staff member was so kind and helpful. We our so happy you chose to stay with us and we look forward to having you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, lots of places to walk
Summary: For the price, this is a nice hotel.  The room was clean and affordable.  Highlights: - It is RIGHT next door to a Target (which sells everything you could want, including liquor).  Walk out the parking lot past the pool and walk around the shrubs - you'll be looking right at Target!   - There are a number of restaurants (fast food, probably others) right next to it and also a Starbucks.  - The room was clean and everything was in working order.   - The bathroom had ample storage - much more than usual, which was nice. Shower only, no tub. Closet was small but would certainly be fine for most people unless you had a few people in the room staying a week or more.  Only nice addition would be a makeup mirror. - The staff was nice - check in and out was really fast. - Pool looked
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent travels. We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your stay and recognizing our awesome staff. We are so glad you had a chance to stop in and enjoy our breakfast buffet. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary: We had an excellent experience. The staff are friendly, efficient and go way above normal service. Clean rooms and hotel. The breakfast Buffett that is offered has an abundance of choices. The breakfast eating area is large and very comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent travels. We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your stay and recognizing our awesome staff. We are so glad you had a chance to stop in and enjoy our breakfast buffet. Summary: If a good night sleep is what you're counting on, you might want to try another place.  They are in dire need to replace their mattresses.   Backache guaranteed.   Also, complimentary breakfast is great, just wish the eggs weren't so watery and the coffee is far removed from everything else.   You have to go look for it by the front desk.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us on your recent visit. We are so sorry to hear you had an uncomfortable stay with us and are looking into your mattress concerns. Our mattresses are fairly new and we want to make sure no other issues are going on with the bed. We hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Nice & friendly 10/15 miles from disney park
Summary: Nice hotel Very friendly, clean . Good rate between price & quality for an hotel early disney Ask a room on the mountains  No surprise  Good advices concerning restaurant and other informations  Don t hesitate to stay in this hotel for reasonable price with children
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate your recent visit and appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your stay. Glad to hear we were able to point you in right direction for food and we hope to welcome you again soon on your next visit to the area.

Summary: I usually stay at one of Hilton's high end hotels but chose to stay here to be closer to my event. I must say that this hotel is AMAZING. The rooms are big with the most comfortable bed ever. But the hidden gem is their breakfast. I was expecting to try different restaurants for breakfast but saw the spread that the hotel was offering and changed my mind. This is not your ordinary tasteless breakfast. Fresh pressed juices, smoothies, and other amazing juices. The eggs were prepared different each day. Steamed rice, 2 different flavors waffles each day, pastries, fresh breads, oatmeal and other fruits and yogurts. Great safe location with the best staff you'll find. I will be back
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress location for your recent travels. We appreciate you being a loyal Hilton guest and we are happy to hear you decided to switch things up and stay with us on this visit.   Thank you for recognizing our awesome staff they do their best to keep our hotel at it's best and we are glad you noticed. We are so happy to hear you had a chance to enjoy our breakfast buffet and the variety of items met your needs. We look forward to welcoming you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: large clean rooms..comfortable beds...Staff is very willing to assist you...loved the warm fresh baked cookies every afternoon....central location...easy in and out of hotel..close to major attractions.

Summary: I normally stay at a different hotel that was closer to my business but when they started charging to park at their hotel so this time I decided to try Hampton and glad I did. My room was fantastic and room for my walker.  Bathroom was easy to move around in. The employees were way above what I was used to.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress, We appreciate you choosing us for your recent business travels. Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel for Business and Family
Summary: I couldn't find a Hilton branded hotel near my customer site until I found this one only seven miles away and hidden in an office complex.  It really is well positioned between LAX and SNA, very clean and the staff was excellent.  Breakfast in the AM was fresh and filling.  Hotel looks brand new but is really 10 years old and recently updated to match the new Hampton Inns but being older it has great bones, large comfortable rooms with nicely done and big bathrooms as well.  Clean and relaxing, I was pleased how quiet it was and plan to come back next time I'm visiting my customer in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share comments about your recent visit to the Hampton Inn Cypress. Your feedback is very important to us and we are so proud to hear we were able to meet your needs and provide you with a clean and comfortable stay well visiting for business. Our staff does an amazing job keeping the hotel at it's best and your right we have some big shoes to fill when competing against a brand new Hampton Inn thank you for taking a notice and sharing your kind words. We look forward to welcoming you again, take care.

Summary: Room was great. Clean and spacious. Onsite laundry. Great breakfast. And the staff has been so sweet. Michelle went above and beyond to make this a comfortable stay. I will definitely come back next time I'm in Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Hampton Inn Los Angeles/Orange County/Cypress NOV 30, 2019 to JAN 7, 2020
Summary: This particular hotel is my "go to" lodging the the greater Los Angeles region. It's very convenient for my personal needs in terms of where I need to be. Also, pleased with the many amenities in walking or short drive distance. The location is quiet with no safety concerns.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress as your go to hotel, we appreciate your loyalty and kind feedback. We look forward to welcoming you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: Not trustworthy staff but great amenities and breakfast.
Summary: I was incorrectly charged a different amount than what I was quoted. After spending close to half an hour at check-in at 11pm and finally being assured by the manager that she put a note to herself to charge the rate that I booked with on the final day of the stay, I realized again at checkout time that the invoice had the higher rate charged. I went again to the front desk and finally got that corrected. Poor experience overall. Not trustworthy staff.  Breakfast is superb.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave comments about your recent stay. Sorry to hear you were disappointed in our service our team members do their best to make thing right. I‚Äôm sorry you felt differently and we hope for another opportunity to welcome you again. Sorry again for any mix up with your booking from the entire staff.

Summary: I recently stayed at the  HAMPTON INN and my overall feeling was that is was very good. It's about a 15 minute drive to Disneyland pretty much a straight shot of a drive. The check in was fast and the room is very big, has a big screen TV and a fridge to keep your drinks cold. Bathroom is big as well, my only complaint is that the' shower head is 7'- 8'. high so if your short you will not be able to reach it to change the setting. I am 5'10 and it was tough for me to reach it as well, and the toilet paper is very thin which was not good had to go and buy my own softer paper at Target. Walls are a little thin so you can hear people in rooms next door to you as well as the hallways.Had a little issue with next door room on my last day went and told front desk and they were quick
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent visit to Disneyland. We appreciate you taking the time to share feedback regarding your recent visit to the hotel. We are proud to hear you had a comfortable stay and you enjoyed our breakfast buffet. We are sorry to hear about the noise concerns you experienced but hope you were still able to get plenty of rest for your long days at Disneyland. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future, take care!

Summary: Great hotel, super clean, breakfast was excellent,  within walking distance to stores n restaurants. only complain was the noise at night,  not sure if it was bc we were right next to elevator, i would recommend picking room as far away from it
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent travels. We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your stay, we are so proud to hear you had a great stay and had the chance to join us for breakfast. We hope to welcome you back again soon. Happy New Year!

Summary: I don‚Äôt want to leave a review because I love this little gem tucked away. I always stay here when I travel to Orange County (which is often) and it is amazing. Clean, comfy, safe. Tucked away and close to a Target. They are always available and have great staff.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a loyal guest of the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate your awesome feedback and taking the time to recognize the staff. Thanks again for the review!

Summary: My sons 9th birthday trip was absolutely ruined due to the food poisoning he received from the breakfast. He had uncontrollable diarrhea and vomiting and our three day park hopper passes went to waste.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent visit. We are very sorry to hear your son became ill on his birthday trip. Our hotel does it's very best to provide a clean and suitable breakfast for all. All our food is heat and service and nothing is cooked on property. We hope your son is feeling better and back to himself and is able to enjoy the Holiday. Again we are sorry your trip didn't go as planned and hope for another opportunity to welcome you back to the brand.

Summary: Only one front desk clerk on duty on a busy weekend. Forever running out of breakfast items,  Sheets on bed don‚Äôt fit, forever coming off mattress.  Staff on duty friendly, hotel usually clean.  Near restaurants and shopping, easy driving distance to attractions and beach
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent visit. We appreciate your feedback and sorry your stay was less then perfect. We did experience a very busy week with holiday travelers we are sorry if we were unable to meet your expectations. We wish we could have done more prior to your check out to ensure you had a 5 star stay. We hope for another opportunity to welcome you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Very clean rooms.  Delicious breakfast buffet and nice selection.  Front desk was friendly and even gave me a check in gift for being a Hilton Honors guest.  The bed was comfortable and sheets felt new, shower was clean and amenities were nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent travels. We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your visit and recognize our awesome team members. We are so HAPPY to hear you had a HAPPY stay. We hope to welcome you again.

Summary: The stay was great!! It's a good time for me when the room is clean and not outdated.  The coffee is good too üòâ. My family is not very needy and didn't run into much of the staff but those we did were very nice and welcoming.

Summary: Great place to stay! Nice gym, nice rooms, friendly staff, great continental breakfast, digital rooms keys using the app are great, 24hr coffee/tea/water in lobby, big flat screens in the guest rooms...
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate you taking the time to share feedback about the hotel and our awesome staff. Summary: Smells amazing awesome location friendly staff! We had to do a last minute trip to California for a funeral & we picked this location to stay. It is located near shopping centers and lots of food options. I would certainly stay here again and I would recommend it to a friend. üòÑ

Summary Heading: Excellent comfortable away home stay. It was very relaxing and enjoyful. If that's even a word lol
Summary: I had the most pleasant stay at this hotel. Comfortable, warm and clean. Not to mention the best Christmas movies on the Hallmark channel. I live it. Wish they had monthly affordable rates then it would be the best everrrrrr.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate you taking the time to share feedback about your relaxing and enjoyful (don't think its a word but we love it!!) stay with us! We hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: I love this hotel, very convenient for me, the hotel was clean inside and out. The staff checked with me several times to see how my stay was going. Free snacks and drinks at check-in.  Michelle and Jessica were great! Comfortable bed and clean room!  Make sure to go to Polly's Pies during your stay - GREAT food and staff - makes you want to work there!

We are so proud to hear you had an amazing and comfortable stay with us and thank you for taking the time to recognize Michelle and Jessica! We are so lucky to have such caring team members who take care of our guest like family. We hope to welcome you again soon. I Love Pie too Polly's Pies is definitely a local favorite. See you soon!!

Summary: We booked this hotel through Hilton site and we had very good experience. staff were very nice and friendly. everything was a great during our  stay. Breakfast had a lot of options they had very healthy option like fresh juices.
Manager Response: Thank you for selecting to stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. we appreciate you taking the time to share your wonderful comments. We are so proud to hear you'll be back and had a great stay. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: Helpful staff, nice breakfast but very thin walls
Summary: Staff was nice and helpful.  Good hot breakfast with multiple options and variety.  The room was clean and the bed was comfortable.  However, a major drawback was the very thin walls between rooms.  I could hear phone conversation in the next room very clearly as if they were in my room. Hotel staff was aware of this issue and said that was what everyone complains about. I travel frequently to the area but will likely not stay in this location again for this reason.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent travels. We are very sorry to hear of your room to room noise issues and wish we could have done more to ensure you had a perfect stay. We hope to get another opportunity to welcome you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Nice stay - good location.  Close to Disney and beaches.  Close enough, but far enough away to have free parking.     Rooms were clean/nice.  Hallway noise is loud.  Tile in my bathroom was loose, needs repair (421).  Beds were a little hard.  I think anything but the top floor would be quite noisy.  Breakfast was great - good selection.  Would be nice if eggs were peeled.  Difficult to do without running water.  No hot tub....  I could've used that after Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent travels to Disneyland. We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback and hope to welcome you back again on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: I went to this hotel for a quick business trip. The hotel and staff were amazing.  I was very pleased with the breakfast.  There was a good choice of food and it was in good supply.  I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress, we appreciate the wonderful comments about your recent stay. Thank you for recognizing our awesome staff I look forward to sharing your feedback with them and we are so happy to hear you enjoyed our breakfast buffet offerings. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next business trip, see you soon.

Summary Heading: Great Location - Quiet, but Centrally Located
Summary: Good property, clean room and friendly staff. Location is roughly equal distance from Long Beach airport and the Orange County attractions. Positives also include free parking, included hot breakfast and restaurants within short walk. Suggestion for improvement: room safe.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate the wonderful comments about your visit and we are glad to hear you had a great experience. Our team hopes to welcome you again soon when traveling to the Orange County area.

Summary: I reserved two rooms for our entire family to have a reunion/ vacation around the Knott‚Äôs Berry Farm & Disneyland area.  This property did not disappoint at all.  From the hospitality of the TERRIFIC Front Desk-Shane & everyone, to the Breakfast Staff, also housekeeping-everyone is OUTSTANDING!  Target Shopping & Restaurants within walking distance.  Access to Fresh fruit & hot coffee 24/7 is great!!  I‚Äôm a Diamond Member & will return to this property in the near future.

Summary: The hotel is nice, quiet, location confortable because it has Target just next to it, so whatever you need you can go walking. The mattresses are TERRIBLE, I had back pain the whole 4 days of my stay, they are too soft for me. The employees were super kind and professional They
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate you taking the time to share feedback regarding visit and we are proud to hear you had a quite and clean stay but we are so sorry to hear about you not getting a comfortable nights sleep. We hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back in the near future when traveling to the area. See you soon.

Summary: The hotel was a great place to stay. Clean, many amenities and friendly staff. Good for personal or business stay. Also has conference rooms and computers with printers. The location was close to target and many other eateries that made it convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress and taking the time to share feedback regarding your visit. We are so happy to hear we were able to meet your needs and appreciate you recognizing the staff. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary: close to Seal Beach facility, Long Beach airport, and transits. right next to Target and many eateries.  many more within 2-5 miles. quiet area industrial park. close to Disneyland too.  good sized rooms. good for work travel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments and rate your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so proud to hear you has a great visit and enjoyed some of the local area. We hope to welcome back again soon when travels bring you back to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel and delicious complimentary breakfast
Summary: This hotel was very nice, clean and staff was very friendly. The rooms are very spacious, clean and have everything you need, mini fridge included. Their complimentary breakfast was really good. And free parking is also a plus :)
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress, your feedback is important to us. We are so proud to hear you had a wonderful experience and enjoyed our breakfast buffet and we agree free parking is that added plus!!! We hope to welcome you again soon on your next travels to the area. Kindest Regards, Team Hampton Cypress

Summary: Had a very pleasant stay. Room was clean . Staff was very nice. Highly recommended . Loved our room and 24 hour coffee and tea assortment. Nice breakfast although lots of messy kids at it. Great safe location . Excited to return

Summary Heading: Another Great Stay at a Hampton Inn
Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights:  Check in: I used the Hilton app to check-in and choose my room from the floor map. When I arrived, I showed my CC and ID and off to the room I went. Extremely easy check-in process.  Note: I did not know this but I must have selected a handicap/accessible room as the room did not have a tub (Shower only). Had I known this I would not have selected the room because 1) my wife loves a tub, and 2) I would not want to take away a room from someone that actually needs this type of room. It would be nice to have something on the floor map when you check in online that indicates this is an accessible room.  ¬∑         Free hot breakfast starts at 6:00:  The usual good Hampton Inn breakfast ‚Äì 3 waffle makers, ham, eggs, pot of oatmeal, cereals, fruit, breads,

Summary: Hotel walking distance to nail salons, massage parlor, Starbucks, food choices, clothes and shoe choices and many little conveniance stores that would be helpful while out of town on business especiallt if you had no transportation as hotel is located by little strip malls. Free parking is always nice.  Beds comfy and nice soft pillows.  Room layout not really good for watching TV in bed.  Comes with refrigerator but n9 microwave or safe.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate you taking the time to share some comments about your visit with us. We hope you had a great time visiting the local area and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: My family has been a long time regular guest during the holidays for a few years. Had a few problems and the general manager did NOT reply/respond to my email...... Looks like we will have to try the new Buena Park Hampton Inn for our mothers day visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your experience at the property. I am very sorry to hear you had a few problems during your visit and they were not addressed. I do my best to address all guest concerns and return emails,I am sorry if yours was missed. We would love to have another opportunity to welcome you and your family back and have the chance to make things right.

Summary: The rooms here are very clean and good quality. It is close to Knotts and other entertainment plus a lot of very nice restaurants. The staff is very friendly and helpful and their breakfast every morning was very good and in abundance.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate you taking the time to leave comments about your experience. We are so happy to hear you had a comfortable stay and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Overall experience was above average.  They have comfortable bedding and linen.  Great customer service. The have basic toiletries if you forget to bring yours. This site also has plenty of restaurants nearby.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress and taking the time to share comments about your experience. We are happy to hear you had a comfortable stay and hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: Great location. Great service.  Bad noise- walls are thin No hot tub or whirlpool tub suites Breakfast was crappy first day. Second day was better, but nothing to impress. Typical motel breakfast. The only plus way the great walking distance to sushi world and BevMo! Lol
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are sorry to hear your stay wasn't perfect and hope to have another opportunity to welcome you again in the future.

Summary: Woke up to a cold shower, but the hotel did right by waiving the cost of one nite. Unusual this hotel usually is on the ball. Really good staff.  Hotel not far from So. calif. attractions. Some good restaurants nearby
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate your feedback and so sorry about the water, we tried to make some repairs and ended up having some delays on the hot water the next morning, we are so happy we were able to take care of you prior to check out. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: The stay was great rcvd nice gifts for staying also rcvd a bag every morning on the way to work with snacks in it..Also fresh cookies every night..The service was great Regina,Jessica and jerry were so helpful and made the week stay so pleasurable..Any questions or help was handled in the most professional manor..The customer service was Amazing I will be back and I will always refer this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate the wonderful comments about your recent stay with us and thank you for taking the time to recognize our amazing staff. We are so proud to hear we were able to meet all your needs and we look forward to having you back as a return guest the next time your in the area. See you soon.

Summary Heading: A comfortable stay for a prolonged business trip.
Summary: I had a good stay during the week here at the Hampton Inn. The exercise facility was well-cleaned as well as the rest of the premises. My room was pleasantly comfortable and all of the appliances and furniture seemed well cared for, I typically see damage in hotels I go to but this one was pristine.  I enjoyed the breakfast in the morning as well, the frittatas were excellent and everything was fresh and enjoyable. Would definitely give another stay next time I'm back in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent business trip. We appreciate you taking the time to leave us comments regarding your experience. We are so happy to hear you were able to utilized the hotel amenities and enjoyed our breakfast buffet. We are so proud to share you wonderful comments with our team they work hard to keep the property at it's best. We hope we can continue to meet your needs on your next visit to the hotel.

Summary: Checked in using the mobile app and used the digital key for the very first time. We came in late so it was absolutely wonderful that we could go straight up to the room without stopping at the front desk. Staff was very friendly, rooms were clean, very comfortable and quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate the wonderful comments and are so proud to hear you had a comfortable stay with us. We hope to welcome back again soon.

Summary: Yes, expect NOT to sleep then you‚Äôll be pleasantly surprised if you do. This place has the thinnest walls, floors/ceilings of anywhere I‚Äôve stayed. It‚Äôs truly miserable to pay for such a lousy experience. Yes, the beds and bathrooms are clean. But the noise from voices and stomping feet is atrocious and the hotel isn‚Äôt even busy-maybe 20 cars were in the whole lot. Not worth it. Noise until midnight from child above then again in early morning when he/she fell out of bed, then at 6:45 when they got up. Noise on our own floor sounded like people running full-speed down the halls as it was. May have been doing so, I don‚Äôt know. Bottom line-don‚Äôt stay here if you expect to rest.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your experience. We are so sorry to read about your stay and the noise concerns you experienced during your stay. We wish we could have done more prior to your departure to ensure you had a pleasant stay. We wish we could have another opportunity to welcome you back again.

Summary: Within 30 minutes shuttle ride to and from airport.  Staff was very helpful and courteous.  Room was very nice, clean and comfortable.  Had a refrigerator in the room and a couple microwaves in the lobby and bar, so great for doggy bags and no waste of food.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent travels. We are so pleased to hear you had a great stay with us and appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback and recognizing our amazing staff members. I look forward to sharing your feedback with our team and we hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: The problem with this hotel is that if you stay in a room near the fitness center/weight room you can really hear and feel the weights that bang and shake the rooms nearby when people are working out. Its a real problem. Stay away from room 127 and the whole wing where room 127 is located. The whole place shakes when people use the weight room.  Room 105 is next to the kitchen and around 5:00 AM they make a lot of noise preparing breakfast. I know because I've stayed in both rooms. Besides that, it is a nice hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments regarding your recent visit with us. We would first like to thank you for being a return guest to the property and hope to can arrange some better room accommodations for your next visit. We are so sorry to hear you had a less then perfect stay with us and experienced some noise concerns. We have been working with our breakfast team to ensure they are being courtesy to guest occupying near by rooms by keeping the noise down during their breakfast prep. We are aware their may be some noise from the gym when in use and we hope we can help you find you a better first floor accommodations for your next visit.

Summary: I had the opportunity to stay at this establishment recently. It is across the street from a strip mall with Target and Ross. There were many other stores in the neighborhood allowing guests and residences to locate their needs immediately. The check in to the hotel was quick. They thanked me for being a member of the Hilton chain. The lobby offered fresh warm chocolate cookies for their guests. The room had two queen size beds with a LG 43 inch flatscreen tv. It offered a refrigerator, but did not have a microwave in the room or in the lobby. I was hoping to heat up some snacks for the evening. The bathroom had a huge sink area to place toiletries. The shower space was combined with the sink space so guests would need to wait to utilize the area. The water pressure and shower
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress and for being a loyal Hilton Honors member. We appreciate you taking the time to share feedback regarding your recent stay, hotel amenities and the local area. We are very proud to hear that your stay was enjoyable and you enjoyed our breakfast buffet, warm cookies and our lobby coffee bar. We do offer microwaves available on a request bases and have two available in the lobby area for guest use. We look forward to welcoming you back again and hope to see you soon.

Summary: We reserved a room with two queen beds and received one with a king bed and a roll out. Breakfast was mediocre at best; there were not a lot of options. We were not pleased there was not a spa. We went for a Disneyland vacation and the hotel was 15 minutes away (that is our fault for not doing more research).
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your recent visit. We are so sorry to hear that you had a less then perfect stay, we wish we could have done more to ensure you had a happy visit. Sorry our breakfast buffet didn't have specific items you may have been looking for. We hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back again in the future.

Summary: Beds were okay, put on 4th floor with no option to move, fridge did not get cold, and no microwave.  Hotel is not super close to anything and for food had to drive up towards Disney which is really congested.  Beds were great but lighting in room was not good especially when you are there for a national cheer competition.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your stay. We are sorry to hear your stay was less then perfect and wish we could have done more to ensure you had a happy experience with us. We hope to have another opportunity to welcome you again soon.

Summary: We stayed at Hampton for 4 days in March. The room was clean, as we the rest of the hotel.  The breakfast was great,  had variety and quality breakfast. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The room was clean and spacious. The location was perfect for our needs.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share about your recent experience at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so proud to hear that our location was able to meet all your needs. We hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: This Hampton is nestled in the corner of an industrial area. It is very quiet and very clean. The staff from the front desk to the breakfast area to the housekeeping were all helpful and courteous - always smiling. My children loved the little pool. Breakfast was just as expected. We stayed there to visit Knott's Berry Farm. It was less than a 10 minute drive. I would return!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent visit to Knott's berry Farm. We are so proud to hear you had a great experience and good interactions with our staff. Weather has been warming up and is perfect for some pool time. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon.

Summary: The staff here is beyond friendly and accommodating. The food is standard for Hampton, but was good and hot. The rooms are spacious and the beds are comfortable.   Location wise, it‚Äôs about a 15-20 minute drive to Disney‚Äîwhich is nice! It‚Äôs also about 30-35 minutes to Huntington Beach!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your experience and we are so proud to hear you had a great stay. We hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary Heading: Trip to Disneyland for our family of 5.
Summary: This hotel is perfect for a trip to Disneyland. Kind staff, excellent breakfast, clean rooms and all around great place to stay. I recommend this hotel for sure!  My three kids, 7, 5, and 2 fit into a queen bed comfortably and slept well and my wife and I took the second queen. Space of rooms is great and we didn‚Äôt feel crowded at all.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate you taking the time to share feedback about your recent stay with us. We hope you had a magical time with your family at Disneyland and we are so proud to have been apart of your family trip. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: The customer service at this hotel is incredible.  My mom is allergic to down so I put in my reservation notes to please remove all of the down from the room.  I also called the hotel and they confirmed that they saw the note and would take care of it.  I always do those two steps, but hotels never remove all of the feathers.  This hotel did!  When she arrived her room was perfect, which was amazing.    The staff was incredibly accommodating and hospitable.  Every person that my mom met at the hotel asked her how she was doing, how her stay was, and if they could do anything to assist her.  She said it was her best stay at any Hilton property ever.    We definitely recommend this hotel and would stay here again in a heart beat.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent visit to the Orange County area. We appreciate the wonderful comments about your mothers stay with us and her experience with our staff. Our team does their best to ensure our guest leave happy and all their needs are met. We are so pleased to hear we were able to make your mothers room comfortable for her stay prior to her arrival. Thank you again for taking the time to share your feedback and we hope to welcome you and your mother again soon.

Summary: Standard Hampton.  Front desk people alert and helpful.  We got the weekender special, which beat all major chain properties in Orange County hands down.  Good, hot breakfast.  Place is well maintained and clean.  All staff polite and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are happy to see that you enjoyed your stay. We have a great location, just  minutes from Disneyland and a complimentary hot breakfast available each morning. We also have a great staff the prides themselves on the service they provide and maintaining our property. We hope you stay with us again soon.

Summary Heading: Dated, Dirty, Disgusting, Deplorable,  - Don't Do It
Summary: There is a reason you will not find pictures of their bathrooms. It was absolutely old and couldn't help but feel dirty just looking at it. I could not even walk in. The hallways were disgusting with crumbs, dirt, and even dead bugs. The elevator was also filthy. It makes you wonder how they clean rooms when they couldn't care less about public areas. The odors in the hallways and the rooms was not pleasant. I've usually had good luck with this brand but this location is a hard pass.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We would like apologize for the issues you encountered during your visit. We try to create a clean and comfortable hotel experience for all our guest, but it seemed we fell short in many areas during you stay. We appreciate you sharing your feedback and we have shared this with our team. Once again, we apologize for not meeting your expectations.

Summary: Everything was amazing except the breakfast. It was OK but no choice of breakfast meat only ham. It was a bit cold. Continental part and waffles were good though. Just needed a piece of sausage or bacon. Funny thing they had rice for breakfast as opposed to grits or cream of wheat. They did have oatmeal. Otherwise fabulous place to stay. I would stay again and again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress, we appreciate you taking the time to review your recent stay. Sorry to hear of your disappoint in our breakfast buffet, we rotate breakfast meats daily and Canadian bacon/ham is one of our meat rotations as well  as bacon and sausage. We are one of the few Hampton Inns that offer an Asian breakfast option with Rice and Miso Soup to cater to some of our local business account travelers. We are proud to hear you say our property is a fabulous place to stay and we hope to welcome you back again and again.

Summary: This Hampton Inn is about 15-20 from Disneyland and California Adventure. Very close shopping (Target). Several quick places to eat. Staff was friendly and helpful. Breakfast was great. I recommend this place!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress, we appreciate you taking the time to review your recent visit with us. We are so proud to hear you had a clean ad comfortable experience with us and our staff was able to meet your needs. Hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Was my 2nd year at this location for the NAMM show. Got the same room as year before (love the palm tree out my window.  Rm 314). Staff is excellent and courteous. Attentive on needs and offered Hilton Honors rewards and benefits that go with being a member. I'll stay here every year for NAMM. Tried to book next year but it's too far out on booking.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal Hilton Honors member and guest of the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress when traveling in town to attend the NAMM convention. We appreciate you taking the time to recognize our amazing staff and we look forward to sharing your comments with them. We look forward to welcoming you again next year. See you soon!

Summary: I stayed at this Hampton Inn on a work trip. Regina Went a live and beyond to make my co-worker feel special on his birthday. Everyone else we interacted was exceptional as well. I would highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments regarding your recent trip to he Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. Thank you for recognizing Regina our front office supervisor. We are so proud to hear she was able to make your colleague feel special on his birthday, it's always tough working, traveling and getting older. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Very clean staff was friendly and extremely helpful. It near alot of different foods and stores. About 10 mins from Disneyland and 5 mins from Knott's Berry Farm. Breakfast was great and the seating area clean and well maintained.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate you taking the time to share your wonderful comments and we are so proud to hear you had a great stay with us We hope you had a great time visiting the local area and hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Stayed here due to proximity to airport!  Great location, decor and service.  Will definitely stay here again we come every year to visit family and like to be near the airport since we leave at 6am.  Our room was a great size and very modern.  It was a fun and relaxing way to end our trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton. We are so proud to hear you had an enjoyable visit and we look forward to welcoming you back next year.

Summary Heading: Staff was nice ... no microwaves in room
Summary: I had a relatively pleasant experience at this Hampton Inn. My bed was hard, but it might have just been that room. Also, the mini fridge did not have a freezer area. My biggest disappointment was that there was not only no microwave in the room, but none available for delivery to the room.  Bummer on that. The microwave that I had to use was next to the front desk and was really old.  I say this with a smile b/c I had to ask the front desk staff (who were very nice) how to work it. : -) Other than that, all was good. Plenty of hot water and towels ... the hotel was clean. My room had no smell and the a/c - heat worked fine. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are sorry to hear you had a couple of disappointments during your stay. We appreciate the feedback as there is always opportunity for improvements. We look forward to welcoming you back on your future travels to the area.

Summary: The location was great. Close to plenty of restaurants and not far from main attractions like Disneyland. My main concern was the bugs in the room. Coming into the room wanting to lay down after a day of walking, only to see bugs crawling on the pillows. Had to kill them and just suck it up. But probably wouldn't stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We would like to apologize and are so sorry to hear about your negative experience. We do our best to provide a clean and comfortable hotel for all our guest to enjoy well choosing to stay with us. We hope you reported your concerns during your stay so we could investigate and take care of you. You are important to us and we would hope you gave us another opportunity to show we can do better then this.

Summary: Requested handicap room with roll in shower.  No provided. Toilet not handicap without bars. Only one bar in shower!Overall we were completely disappointed because the hotel did not provide what was ordered and I actually fell getting off THE LOW TOILET WITH NO SAFETY BARS.  I was not injured.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, we are deeply sorry to hear of your incident and not having your requested room type available upon check in. We did our best to ensure you were happy with the room available upon your arrival and we are sorry that we did not meet your overall needs. It is important to us that everyone of our guest is comfortable and we provide a room that is equipped to meet your needs. We would like to again apologize for  missing it here. We hope we can get another opportunity to have you back for a future visit so we can show you how important of a guest you are to us. Sincerely the entire staff.

Summary: The only thing that would make this hotel more perfect would be a jacuzzi and some new carpet. I chose this hotel for our family‚Äôs Disneyland trip for the free hot breakfast and WiFi. We arrived and discovered that it was in a business park next to a Target and a Dollar Tree. Super quiet hotel with friendly staff out of the craziness and expense of the Anaheim Disneyland hotel scene. It takes about 20 minutes to get here from Disneyland, but the commute is worth it for the peace and the access to grocery stores, shopping, non-tourist food, non-tourist prices, etc. The outdoor pool was even heated! Really wish they would work on that jacuzzi though... üòâ
Manager Response: We are proud you selected to stay with us at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent trip to Disneyland. We are so glad to hear you found our location to be convenient and a hidden gem. We wish we had a Jacuzzi  to so you would be even happier with your stay with us :) We hope to welcome you again soon and thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Clean room, very comfortable beds and the location looked safe. The Continental Breakfast was great with lots of items.. Very close to Knotts Berry Farm and Medieval Times. We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent travels. We appreciate you taking the time to share your comments, we hope you had an amazing time visiting the local theme parks and area. We hope to welcome back again soon.

Summary: Good hotel to stay away from the hustle. Amazing service. Decent breakfast. Rooms are a little dated, but if you don't care about the shine and do care about everything else, then this is the place to go.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so Happy to hear you were Happy with your stay because making you Happy makes us Happy! We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: I would like to say Priscilla provided world class customer service today! She made me and my family feel valued! She is the epitome of great customer service! She deserves a raise! She made our Christmas! The rooms are clean as well. Overall we were pleased.
Manager Response: We appreciate the wonderful comments about your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. Thank you so much for recognizing Priscilla at the front desk, She is a rock star with guest and we are so proud to hear you felt the same as well. We hope to welcome you back again soon and wish and your family an amazing New Year!

Summary: I don‚Äôt often write reviews but this property and its staff deserve kudos. I am very particular about cleanliness and comfort, and am used to staying at high end hotels. I was delightfully surprised to find this hotel to offer a great value for the comfort it offers for a family - clean & comfy rooms, good & wide variety of breakfast items, a very helpful staff, and a heated & clean pool! It‚Äôs also 20 mins away from Disneyland, and good restaurants.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to review your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so proud we could make your stay a great one and that we were able to meet all your cleanliness needs. We hope you had a great time visiting the area and hope to welcome you back again soon. Thank you for staying with us!

Summary: From the time we arrived, until the time we left, everything was wonderful! The staff was attentive and helpful. The rooms were clean, comfortable and relaxing. Breakfast was wonderful and the staff kept the facility clean. Definitely a great stay and will definitely be back when we have scheduled activities in this area!
Manager Response: We appreciate the wonderful comments about your resent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so proud to hear our staff and breakfast met your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the Orange County/Los Angeles area. See you soon.

Summary Heading: Hampton Inn Los Angeles/Orange County/Cypress NOV-DEC 2018
Summary: This is my favored lodging within the Hilton family of hotels in the greater Los Angeles region. The staff is always friendly and helpful. The hotel is located behind a shopping center, but it is definitely quiet for a stay. The location has so many eating and shopping options within walking distance (behind the hotel) or a short drive. This Hampton is very unique because it offers simple Japanese offerings at breakfast due to the large Japanese corporate clients who stay at the same.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal guest of the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate the wonderful feedback and are so proud to hear we are your favorite location in the area. We hope to continue to meet your expectations and make your stay when traveling to Orange County/Los Angeles area an amazing one. We hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: Nous nous sommes arr√™t√©s trois nuits dans cet h√¥tel pendant notre road trip. L‚Äôh√¥tel est en dehors de Los Angeles, ce qui le rend tr√®s calme. L‚Äôext√©rieur est magnifique, l‚Äôint√©rieur est propre. Le personnel est sympa peut importe qui et o√π vous croiser ils ont un petit mot pour vous. La chambre est spacieuse, propre, le lit de tr√®s bon qualit√©, il manquerait juste un peu de rangement. Le petit d√©jeuner est sous forme de buffet √† volont√© avec pas mal de choix. Il y a un parking gratuit et c‚Äôest facile d‚Äôacc√®s, lors d‚Äôun road trip c‚Äôest parfait!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent trip to Orange County. We appreciate the wonderful comments about your stay and are so proud we could provide you with a clean comfortable stay. We look forward to welcoming you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: Ok. Not the best Hilton has
Summary: Several problems in room. Bad shower head, squeaky bed. Just things that need a little more attention from housekeeping and maintenance teams. Everything else was good and pretty standard. Wasn‚Äôt overjoyed.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton for your recent visit. We appreciate you taking the time to share your honest feedback and wish we could have done more to exceed your expectations. We are dedicated to being more aware and will do our best to make your next visit a more enjoyable one. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Convenient location. Minutes from the attractions. Clean property and well kept!! Staff is amazing! Everything was great and it's a great deal! We were taken care of like family rather than hotel guests. Love it! We'll be back!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton and welcome to the family!! We appreciate you taking the time to review your stay with us and sharing your wonderful comments about your visit and the staff. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the Cypress area.

Summary Heading: Great spot near Knott‚Äôs Berry Farms
Summary: Nice clean hotel rooms. Some of the best hotel service we have received. Incredibly accommodating and when there were some late nighters still enjoying after hours in their room the front desk handled it immediately. The staff also went above and beyond to accommodate my son‚Äôs wanting to blow up a large water tube. Breakfast was very consistent and had a good selection of good quality healthy choices. Keep up the great work.
Manager Response: We are proud you selected to stay with us at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress and appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback. Thank you for recognizing the staff on their hard work, I look forward to sharing your comments with them and I'm very happy they made impact in your stay. We hope you enjoyed Knott's its such a fun time of the year to go. We hope we can welcome you again soon when traveling to the Orange County area.

Summary: This is a great location and extremely easy to access major locations in the area. The rooms are on average small. The tv is beside the bed and not easy to watch in bed. The desk is small. The staff is great however the breakfast is average.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review regarding your recent stay. We appreciate you giving us your honest feedback and wish we could have done more to exceed your expectations. We hope to have another opportunity to welcome you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Perfect for a short Disney stay!
Summary: Stayed for one night for the Disneyland Halloween party. Close enough to the parks for a short drive or Uber. New, quiet, safe, and clean just outside of the resort area. Free breakfast. Free parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent visit to Disneyland. We are so pleased to hear you had a perfect stay with us and had the opportunity to join us for our breakfast buffet. We hope you enjoyed Disneyland's Halloween party, it's known to be a lot if fun. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Look, I work at the #1 hotel in OC (HILTON! <3), so I've come to expect other hotels to be less than steller. NOT TRUE HERE This hotel is utterly beautiful with modern style (recently remodeled, and it shows in a great way). The Suite shop was full of delightful goodies, and the HiltonHonor rewards were some of the best I've experienced. They even made me a water bottle with my name on it.  But lets talk about the crown jewel of my stay: Regina. Holding back tears, I confessed to Regina that this reservation was meant to be a get away for me and my significant other, only to have him break up with me earlier in the day. Regina showed empathy and compassion, gave me some wine on the house and an extra snack. Girl, thank you so much. You went above and beyond and I super
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to complete a review of your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so proud to we could impress a fellow Hilton employee and make your stay a great one. Regina at the front desk is so awesome and it sounds just like her to ensure she could put a smile on your face. We hope we can welcome you again soon.

Summary: I am a Hilton Honors member but I was super impressed that when I got to my room there were customized water bottles with my name printed on them...nice touch! The staff at breakfast were super friendly and the food was pretty good. I only stayed for one night so I was not there very long but I could see this being a good budget friendly option for a family going to Disneyland or for a business traveler as it is near a lot of businesses.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress and thank you for being a loyal Hilton Honors member. We appreciate you taking the time to complete a review about your stay and hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: Family visit to Knotts Berry Farm and found the property to be very comfortable.  Reasonable distance from Knotts/Medieval Times.  Good value for the Money.  Definitely would stay there again if visiting the Theme Parks in Orange County
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn Cypress for your recent trip to Knott's Berry Farm. We hope you enjoyed your visit to the park and visiting the local area. We appreciate you taking the time to complete a review and hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: We stayed here for one night. The staff was helpful and breakfast was decent, but the carpet in our room was filthy and the refrigerator did not work. We let our 11 month old crawl and walk (she just started taking steps) on the carpet. After about an hour, we noticed that her hands, knees, and feet were black. We looked at the bottom of our feet, and they were black too. Needless to say, we were totally grossed out and tried to keep her and our belongings off the carpet. We only stayed for one night so we didn't bother asking to be moved.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback regarding your stay. Please accept our deepest apology for finding your room in less then perfect condition. We pride ourselves on providing a clean guest room and happy guest experience and we are sorry to hear we dropped the ball. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again and show you we can do better.

Summary: This is a good location for going to Disneyland. Parking is free, unlike hotels closer to Disney. Overall, this hotel was clean and modern, and the room and bathroom were large. Breakfast was substantial, and the staff at breakfast were very accommodating. The only problem I had is that the tub was slippery and there was no bathmat. Otherwise, this was a perfect stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for selecting the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent trip to Disneyland. We hope you had a great time visiting the parks and local area. We appreciate you sharing your feedback and we are proud to hear you enjoyed our  breakfast buffet and free parking. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Meeting grandson for the first time!!!
Summary: Hampton Inn was great. We stayed at the Hampton Inn Pensacola last summer and it was awesome! Hampton Inn Cypress was conveniently located just a hundred yards from target and just 5 minutes from the 405. It's also 20 minutes from Huntington Beach one of the nicest beaches I've been to. The hotel is also close to plenty of eateries like El Zarzape the best Mexican food in the LA valley.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal Hampton Inn guest and selecting the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent stay. Sounds like you had a great time visiting family and the beach well you were in the area. We are proud to hear you had a great stay and hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: This is a great property located near plenty of restaurants and stores.  Great staff that clearly liked their jobs and were committed to delivering good service.  I would definitely stay hear again if I am back in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. I really appreciate you recognizing the staff they do an amazing job and I look forward to sharing wonderful comments with them. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Great one night stay at Hampton Inn. Our son had a band clinic in CA and we stayed here for one night. Everyone we encountered on staff were very friendly. Cookies in lobby in the evening were yummy. Lots of choices on their included breakfast. Water and coffee available in lobby all the time. Would stay on a future visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent visit. We hope you had an amazing time visiting California and the local area. We appreciate the wonderful comments about your stay with us and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Son and I booked this trip late for a baseball tournament.  I have stayed at many Hampton Inns and this is probably the best of them.  Quiet street, comfortable beds, very clean, friendly staff, free parking, great breakfast, clean pool area, I think you get the point.  Also you can walk to dinner and shopping! Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent visit. We hope your son and his team did well in their tournament. We appreciate and are proud to read your wonderful comments about your stay with us and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Staff here is very friendly & accommodating. Rooms are clean. The complimentary breakfast is better than average. Beds are a little firm for my taste, but are comfortable. The comforters are thick and a little warm for me, but there is a thinner blanket provided in the closet.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent stay. We appreciate you taking the time to review your stay with us and thank you for recognizing our staff. We hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: Great place for comfort and overall great experience. Great parking, great staff, rooms and water and coffee all day. Breakfast is great and it's in a terrific location next to shopping and a Starbucks. We always stay here when we are in town.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so proud to hear you enjoyed all of our amenities and thank you for being a loyal guest of ours when traveling to the area. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: the hotel is clean and provides great hospitality with a moderate cost.The staff was helpful and pleasant. This is a good option for business travelers as it is set back a bit off the main road which keeps it quiet.
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so proud to hear you had a pleasant stay with us and hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: This Hotel is close to Knott's Berry Farm and Disneyland. Super quiet area. Very clean and Staff was very professional and courteous. The breakfast was great and the food was plenty! We will stay here again!
Manager Response: We appreciate you choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent stay. We hope to welcome you back again soon. Thank you for taking the time to review your stay.

Summary: Overall stay was great. Did not get a chance to take advantage of all the amenities. Free breakfast was good but could be better. Coffee could be better as well as even Robust was very weak. Lots of good restaurants nearby.
Manager Response: We appreciate you choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent stay. We hope to welcome you back again soon. Thank you for taking the time to review your stay.

Summary: I love the Hampton Inn I know that I will always get quality service and quality room.  Added bonus is that you always get a chocolate chip cookie that makes "mrs.fields" jealous!!! The services is wonderful and the food in the morning will get you on your way!Enjoy your stay!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for selecting the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate your loyalty to the brand and are so proud to hear you had a wonderful stay with us. Thank you for the 5 Meows!! Hope to see again soon.

Summary: The property is new, the common area is really nice and the quality of breakfast was great along with the staff that served it.  The rooms were clean, beds comfy and most importantly, the water pressure in the shower was awesome too.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. It's wonderful to hear you had a comfortable stay with us and you had the opportunity to join us for our breakfast buffet. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: We've stayed at many Hamptons over the years but this one is by far our new favorite. Staff is so friendly and welcoming. Room was spotless, modern and spacious. Hot breakfast offered a variety of choices. Location was quiet yet close to shopping and eateries.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We love being your new favorite Hampton and truly appreciate you being a loyal Hampton Inn guest.  Thank you for your time to share some comments about our location and staff, I look forward to sharing your survey with the team. We hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: The rooms and bathrooms are always very clean. As with most hotels, the pillows are kind of meh but the cleanliness makes up for them. They have plenty of great options for breakfast and a lot of seating in the breakfast area. The staff is always helpful & courteous. I've stayed here twice and will definitely choose it again for my annual trip to the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal guest of the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback, and recognizing our staff. We look forward to welcoming you bsck again soon.

Summary: The Ac didn't work and the fridge didn't work and the room above us was really loud. But over all it would have been a decent room if not for these issues.  It was fairly close to disneyland and not a lot of traffic.  Breakfast was decent.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay we appreciate you taking the time to complete a review. We are sorry to hear that you had some concerns during your stay, I hope we were able to address those items prior to your departure. It means a lot to us that all our guest have a relaxing and comfortable stay with us and that should take place right at check in. We again apologize for and hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back on your next Disneyland trip.

Summary Heading: Nice quiet location in business area
Summary: We liked that it was in a business area and away from the noise.  There was plenty of parking spaces.  Although they need better lighting in some of the parking lot.  Overall satisfied with our stay.  I appreciate being acknowledged as a Hilton Honors member and having hospitality items for members.  Nice!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent trip and thank you for being a loyal Hilton Honors member. We appreciate you taking the time to share feedback about your recent stay. We hope you enjoyed your time visiting the local area and hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: My husband, son and I stayed at this location from August 9th to August 11th and the stay was perfect! Check in was fast and convenient using the hilton app! The room was clean and well prepared for our stay. The complimentary breakfast was good and there was plenty. The staff was kind and helpful!! The prices per night were much more affordable than anywhere else that we looked. It is about an hour away from Universal Studios but we did not have an issue with that. It was a great stay and I will definitely stay again if I find myself in the area again!!!
Manager Response: We hope you had an amazing time visiting Universal Studios, its such a fun park to experience. Thank you for choosing to at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so proud to hear you had a great stay with us and you used the Hilton Honors App to check in with us. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon, we love our loyal guest and Hilton Honors members. See you soon.

Summary: I was here with my daughter while she attended the OC Tap Festival nearby.  The facility was clean, had great breakfast, had friendly and professional staff, and excellent customer service.  I would strongly recommend staying in this property.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments in regards to your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate you recognizing the staff they are amazing and we are glad you seen it too. We hope to welcome you back again soon. Thank your for the recommendation!

Summary Heading: Great Staff and Central location for our Trip
Summary: My 2 teenage grandsons and I had a great 6 day stay at this Hampton.  When we arrived room was not ready but we expected that.    Davanage at the front desk was very welcoming and helpful.  During our entire stay she was friendly and provided good information to help our stay become more fun.  The breakfast is great and made even better by Norma, the lady that runs the breakfast and does the work. These 2 ladies made the stay even better.  AWESOME people. The location is close to all you could want and as others mentioned there is a Target within a 2-minute walk that proved to be very helpful. All the staff did their job and the boys, and I had a great time using this location as the center of our 6-day adventure.  Baseball, Dolphin watching, Flight Simulator test flying, CA
Manager Response: We are proud you selected to stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate the wonderful comments and you taking the time to recognize our amazing staff. Devanae and Norm are amazing team members and we are so proud to hear they took care of your needs. We hope you had a blast visit the local area and theme parks. We hope to welcome you back again next summer.

Summary Heading: Great Location - Free Parking - Great staff
Summary: Awesome location (There's a Target right across the street and many places to eat), Great Staff - Very Helpful. Awesome Free Breakfast - They even had Steamed Rice! Rooms look to be recently remodeled however the bathrooms should have been remodeled a bit more. At least rooms were very clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed our breakfast buffet an hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: This is one of the best HILTON properties we‚Äôve stayed at.  Clean and comfortable rooms, very friendly staff, great breakfast selection, and free parking!! I would definitely stay at this hotel again!!
Manager Response: We appreciate you choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent travels. We are so proud to hear that we are one of the best Hilton hotels that you've stayed at, what a great compliment. I look forward to sharing your feedback with the hotel team, we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: Wonderful relaxing hotel and great location
Summary: The hotel is certainly nice. Thick cushioned carpets in hallways making it quiet and much less noisy due to foot traffic. Hallways are cooled and feel great with ice machine on each floor. Room is very comfortable in every way.  The main door is noisy when it closes due to the lock. So it wakes the kids up if we exit or enter. Room wasn't noisy and enjoyable.  Breakfast was good. I felt bread could have been fresher.  Felt too dry and crumbly. Hot water for tea was warm on all days.  Good selection of items. comfortable and nice eating area.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton located in Cypress. We are pleased to hear you had a comfortable stay with us and enjoyed the hotel amenities. We appreciate your honest feedback and will take noticed on your breakfast notes, it is important to us improve where we can. We hope to the opportunity to welcome you and your family back soon.

Summary: This place has everything.  Great service, clean, comfortable and spacious rooms and great amenities.  Target, Starbucks and restaurants are across the parking lot.  The breakfast is expansive and fresh.  I'm diabetic and I had lots of options which I really appreciate.  Laundry room was helpful too.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to leave comments about your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. It's great to hear you had the opportuinity to join us for breakfast and we were able to meet all your needs. We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: We traveled to the area for a business meeting and a "long restful weekend."  The room we requested was available and well cleaned.  The whole weekend that we were there, staff was constantly cleaning. Floors, carpets, windows, counters common areas, exterior areas. Kudos to the staff.  Reception at THIS Hampton was excellent as with our previous visits.  We'll be back . . .
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent business trip. We appreciate you recognizing the hard work our amazing team does to keep looking it's best. We look forward to welcoming you back and thank you again for being a loyal guest.

Summary Heading: Good hotel. Look like new. Great amenities. Good location.
Summary: I prefer to stay at Hilton Hotels because it is a no brainer generally, when you need to book a hotel online and don't know the area. The hotel chain keep a consistent standard on its hotels. At this Hampton Inn was no different. Room was very nice, overall hotel was like new. Great amenities. The only thing I would say is if you're travelling with kids, trying to book a 1st floor room, since the building is very noise while stepping on the floor. We were very satisfied with our stay.
Manager Response: We appreciate you selecting the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress and thank you for being a loyal Hilton guest. We are so proud to hear you enjoyed your stay and the hotel amenities. We do our best to keep the property looking it's best and we are happy you noticed. Thank you again and hope you'll be visiting us again soon.

Summary: Stayed here multiple times in the past. This hotel is definitely one we always try to book. The rooms are always clean and comfortable, the staff is always friendly and helpful; the complimentary breakfast is delicious; and we enjoy the quiet location nearby to stores and restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal guest of the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so happy to hear you had a great stay and enjoy visiting our breakfast buffet. We appreciate you taking the time to share comments and hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Great location and overall very good experience - Rooms were clean and very satisfied. Staff was very helpful and bunch a freebies for kids!  Breakfast made it super great and I will consider staying here again!
Manager Response: Thank you visiting the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so happy to here you and your family had a great stay and enjoyed our breakfast buffet. We appreciate you taking the time to share comments and hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Great hotel and staff clean rooms pool was great breakfast was delicious shower was huge bed was so contortable location is amazing close to shops and plenty of places to eat . I highly recommend this place for a great staycation
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience regarding your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress.
