We are so happy to hear you had a chance to relax by the pool and take part in our breakfast buffet. We hope to welcome you back again soon for your next staycation.

Summary: We booked this hotel having never been to the area, or hotel before.  We need to stay the night so we would be on time the next day for our cruise and wanted to make sure we were in a safe area with access to restaurants and the freeway.  Since this appeared to be in a somewhat industrial district I was hesitant but the rates were excellent compared to other hotels and Hampton Inn's are generally a good place to stay.  We were pleasantly surprised when we got with a few miles of the hotel as the area was comprised with companies like Yamaha, Mary Kay, and Speedo on finely manicured campuses.  The hotel was tucked away of the main road so it offered a semblance peace and tranquility without all of the noises of the cars from the main road.  The hotel was clean and the room was
Manager Response: We are so proud you selected to stay with us at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress and s happy to hear we exceeded your expectations. We understand how difficult it is to choose a hotel without knowing the area and we are so happy you chose to stay with us. Great to hear you had a chance to join us for our breakfast buffet before heading out for the day. Hope you had a fun and relaxing time on your cruise and we look forward to welcoming you back again when traveling to the area.

Summary: My family had a long day at the beach, and during check in, the young lady at the front desk offered my family water bottles, and snacks to help curb our hunger.  She also gave us great directions to see a fireworks display along with tips on the best place to park to avoid crowds.  The next morning the complimentry breakfast provided us the energy we needed to crush the amusement parks!  Clean rooms and great staff!
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so glad to hear our front desk team was able to provide you tips on the best spot for the Disneyland firework view. Thank you for staying with us we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Much nicer than other Hampton properties I've stayed at in the past. Room has updated furniture pcs w/usb ports. Bed was comfortable enough. Refrigerator...  Bath amenities are what you would expect from a Hampton.    Was able to sample some of the breakfast items.  Wish I had had more time to spend in the dining area. A few hot items to choose from & they all looked good!  Not too far from Long Beach Airport. Took surface streets & was able to get there in 15+ mins.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so happy you enjoyed the hotel amenities and had a chance to stop in at the breakfast buffet. We hope you come back to stay with us and have some extra time to enjoy the local area. See you soon!

Summary Heading: The place to stay, when in town.
Summary: Hampton Inn is always our goto when traveling. Every location is clean and comfortable. The Cypress location is especially great. Check in is quick and easy. Staff is kind and helpful, especially our breakfast attendant (Norma) she went above and beyond for everyone. We saw her rush around to keep the area clean, food stocked, and help all with their requests. Don't think people know but breakfast attendants can receive a gratitude. We happily tipped her but still felt like she deserved more for her hard work. Please  keep their hard work in mind when visiting. No complaints, we highly recommend this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for selecting the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are proud to hear you had an enjoyable visit with us. We are glad to hear you got meet Norma! She is amazing and makes all of our mornings even better, I look forward to sharing your review with her. We appreciate the recommendation and hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: Great hotel.buffet was excellent,friendly staff,room was spacious for 3 ,bed were comfortable ,shower was great,internet adequate.close to disney 15 minutes Fault.noise from room above was so loud went from 9pm till 1230am on our last night.not hotels fault cheaply constructed, just annoying when trying to sleep.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your recent stay. We are happy to hear you enjoyed the hotels amenities and our breakfast buffet. So sorry to hear you had a noisy guest above you, we understand how that can disturb your relaxation. We hope we have the opportunity to have you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Great Place to stay! Especially if going to Disneyland!
Summary: Upon our VERY early arrival (930am), Eduardo took bags and stored until room ready. We headed directly to Disneyland for the day. At approximately noon Eduardo called me to inform me my room was ready and if ok he would place our bags inside. When we returned to hotel (approx 1130pm) after a FULL day of Disney. We were greeted very nicely and given our room keys whereby we went and collapsed after such a full day. Big THANK YOU to Eduardo and his staff for such unexpected attentiveness. Great Job!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so pleased to hear you had an enjoyable visit and we were able to accommodate your early arrival. We hope you enjoyed your trip to Disneyland and we hope to welcome you back again soon when traveling to the area.

Summary: Everything as far as speed and friendliness for check in was great. Rooms are clean. Staff was friendly. Problem was checkout day. Woke up to an overflowing toilet. Called front desk, they shut off water and fixed the toilet fast. The problem was the overflow left us with no towels or bathroom to use for a couple of hours. We weren't able to shower, had to use lobby restrooms. Housekeeping didn't show up till we were about to leave for home. When they finally showed up they had no large towels to give us but said we could do a late checkout. That still left us with no way to shower since there were no towels. Not satisfied with how we left the hotel. Not sure if we will stay at this location again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your stay and recognizing the staff. I‚Äôm very sorry to hear about the inconvenience experienced prior to your check out. I hope we have the opportunity to make thing right from this experience so we can welcome you back for a future stay with confidence.

Summary: Cypress location is wonderful location (away from the Disneyland traffic).  All staff are very nice and accommodating (front desk, maintenance person, cleaning staff and breakfast lead person).  Rooms and bathrooms were very clean.    Always will pick this location over all the others.   Continue to keep the prices affordable too.
Manager Response: We are proud you select the Hampton Inn By Hilton Cypress and thank you you so much for being a loyal guest. I‚Äôm very happy to hear you had an enjoyable stay and appreciate you recognizing the staff we are so lucky to have such a great team. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: We truly enjoyed our stay. We were there for a track meet and we were very impressed with the hotel. It was really close to everything we had interest in. The hotel was very clean and nice. The complimentary breakfast was delicious.
Manager Response: Thank you for selecting to stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress and taking the time to share feedback regarding your stay. We are so glad you found things easily accessible from our location and enjoyed the comfort of your stay. We hope you‚Äôll be back again soon, we look forward to welcoming you.

Summary: The hotel was very nice and the location was excellent.  We enjoyed the many restaurants in the local area.  We had a funeral to attend and the location was perfect.  Weather wasn't so warm so we weren't able to swim.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are happy to hear you enjoyed the local area and your time at the hotel. On behalf of the entire team we would like to send our condolences for your loss.

Summary: This hotel was spotless, clean smelling and lovely. Staff was friendly and room was excellent! Bedding smelled fresh and clean.  Housekeeping does a fantastic job!  I would recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the area.  Tucked away and quiet as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing comments about your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are proud to hear you had a clean and quite stay with us. We appreciate the recommendation  and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Can't go wrong with this Hampton!
Summary: Great staff from front desk to the breakfast area. One of my best stays at a Hilton Hotel. Hotel is close to a ton of food places as well as other activities in the area. Close to El Dorado Park as well.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are happy to hear everything went right during your visit with us and being one of your best Hilton stays makes us very proud and we look forward to serving you again soon. Thank you for recognizing our amazing staff.

Summary: This has over a period of time has become the Hilton family hotel of choice in the greater Los Angeles area. It's in a very quiet area. Remarkably, MO-FR they offer simple Japanese food to appeal to the many Japanese corporate clients who stay at the hotel, which is a very very diplomatic gesture of diversity appreciation. There is a wonderful House Curry (from Japan), Starbucks, & a Target store right behind the hotel premises so you don't need to drive anywhere. Moreover, so many other eateries and shopping amenities nearby. I'll continue to count this Hampton in Cypress (Orange County) as my first choice of accommodations in the area, bar none!
Manager Response: We are so honored to have you as a loyal guest at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress when traveling into the Orange County/Los Angeles County area. We are happy to hear you enjoy our Asian breakfast option when staying with us. I look forward to sharing your feedback with the staff, we look forward to welcoming you back again when in the area.

Summary: I liked to stay this hotel.  1. Clean the room 2. Friendly and nice staffs 3. Very good hot free breakfast. (Specialy they provide miso soup and rice) 4. Easy to access hotel from parking lot. 5. Quite place 6. I recommand this hotel to stay with kids
Manager Response: We are proud you selected to stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. Thank you for being a loyal guest and taking the time to share some feedback and the recommendation. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: I hate to give up hidden gems in the area.  This is a good hotel. Staff is friendly, breakfast was fine. Construction is a little poor but the place is clean. No microwave in the rooms. $$ for a Hampton
Manager Response: We are happy you selected to stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent travel needs. It's so great to hear you enjoyed your visit, we appreciate you taking the time to share some comments and we hope we can welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Stayed at this property and was extremely satisfied. Room and bed were comfortable and very clean. Service was excellent. Front desk staff was knowledgeable and courteous. Complimentary breakfast  choices were very good. Housekeeping was efficient.
Manager Response: Thank you for selecting the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent family trip. We are so proud to hear you had a comfortable stay with us. We are glad you were able to join us for our breakfast buffet we hope we were able get your morning off to the right start. Hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Sometimes it's hard finding a hotel when booking from another country so having stayed at a Hampton in England UK decided to find one near Disney and we couldn't have chosen a better one,stayed here 2 nights we had two rooms me and my partner plus our daughter and boyfriend the two rooms were very clean beds very comfy had everything we wanted ,hotel also came with free parking which was a bonus a free buffet breakfast which had everything hot and cold items and was really nice,so finally the staff from the front desk to the ladies who clean the rooms and the ladies which service the breakfast room all so polite and had a smile on there faces no matter what time of day so well done to them and yes we would recommend the hotel to friends from the UK if there ever in the area.
Manager Response: We are so proud to hear you had a comfortable and enjoyable visit when choosing to stay with us at the Hampton inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate the wonderful comments about your stay with us and your recommendations. We hope you had a wonderful trip to Disneyland and enjoyed the local area. I look forward to sharing your comments with the staff they will be so happy to hear they made a difference in your stay. We hope when your visiting from the UK you will be back to stay with us and we hope that's soon. Thank you again!!!

Summary Heading: Hampton Inn - we're glad we stayed
Summary: The Hampton Inn in Cypress Ca was clean, well serviced and a good value for the money.  The staff was very friendly and greeted us every time we met.  Our room was well appointed and very clean - who can ask for more in a hotel?   The breakfast buffet was very large and had oodles of selections.  The Hostess for the breakfast area during our stay, Norma, was everything a hostess should be.  She was friendly, warm and efficient.  It's very evident she takes a great deal of pride in her work and it shows.  She went out of her way to make us comfortable and sincerely excelled at her job.  Were that there were more people who treat their customers as she did.
Manager Response: We are so glad you stayed with us as well! Thank you for taking the time to share feedback about your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We love hearing that you had a great stay and enjoyed our breakfast buffet. I am so proud to hear that the staff greeted you and you had great interactions with the team. Thank you again for taking the time to recognize Norma, she is so kind and has the biggest heart and we are so lucky to have her energy at breakfast getting us all off to the right start in the mornings. We hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Clean, Good location and good breakfast
Summary: Clean and convenient location to many local businesses. Included breakfast is very good and features a lot of various foods. On-site fitness center is small but was never crowded. Very walkable to many places to eat and/or shop.
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your visit with us. We are happy to hear you had a clean and enjoyable visit and hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: I was really impressed with the whole staff.  They were super helpful and friendly.  They took pride in thier jobs and it showed!  This was not just with me and my family, the interacted this way with other guest, great hospitality! The hotel was clean inside and out.  Seriously, no complaints!  I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent visit to the area. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to having back again, we hope that's soon!! We appreciate you recognizing the staff they do an amazing job and we so happy you seen it too, I look forward to sharing your wonderful comments with them. See you soon.

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay, made us feel at home
Summary: We had to plan a last minute trip to visit relatives in the area and the staff at this Hampton Inn were wonderful.  Especially Norma, who treated us like we were family.  She made our breakfasts quite enjoyable and started our days (and our kid's days) off with a smile!
Manager Response: We are proud you selected to stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent visit to the area. We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your stay with us, we hope you had a comfortable stay. Thank you for taking the time to recognize Norma and the rest of the staff for their hospitality. I look forward to sharing your feedback with them.

Summary: Always stay at this hotel. Close to everything and free breakfast. Great location. Pillows are a little softer than usual  and bed is a little firmer than before. I'm use to them having a pillow top. The people are always friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for selected the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent travels. We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your stay and for recognizing the staff. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: We spent 4 nights at the Hampton Inn and had a wonderful stay. The rooms were very clean and the beds were very comfortable. The hotel itself is not on a Main Street which made for a very quiet stay. The hotel staff were all very helpful. I do want to give a shout out to Norma who work‚Äôs  in the breakfast area. Norma is a very wonderful person. She greeted us every morning with a big smile and a good morning.  She kept the breakfast area spotless. When a guest left she had the table cleaned in a jiffy‚Äôs. She wound not let us throw away our stuff she would take it from us to dispose of. She would always tell us to relax she would always tell us it was her job to take care of us because we were on vacation. If Hampton inn has an employee of the month Norma has my vote.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton. We appreciate you taking the time to recognize Norma, she is an amazing breakfast attendant and we are so lucky to have her. I look forward to sharing your comments with her and the rest of the team. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: We picked this hotel as it was a last minute trip to California for a funeral. The hotel is conveniently located and was not too far from the mortuary. After reviewing the pictures from the Hilton app and through Yelp it looked nice so booking the room using the Hilton app; was simple and we got a good rate.   We were able to check in through the app and also pick our room. The rooms have digital kids so we use our phone to access our room. We only had to interact with the front desk if I have a question regarding the area. We also checked out through the Hilton app.   Upon opening the room first impression was that the entryway was large and the room was spacious. The room was clean and the beds were nicely made. The pillows and blankets for comfortable as well as the bed for
Manager Response: We are proud you selected the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress and we are so happy to hear you had a clean comfortable stay. We appreciate you being a loyal Hilton Honors member and are glad to hear you enjoyed the benefits of using digital key. We are so sorry to hear about your loss and want to send our condolences to you and your family from the entire team at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We look forward to welcoming you back again when traveling to the area.

Summary: Short over night trip - used my Hilton points so the price was right. But the value was fantastic. Great room. Small but never felt it. Comfy king size bed, great bedding. HUGE restroom area. Great shower. $15 Uber ride to Angels stadium then a $10 Uber ride back from downtown Disney.
Manager Response: We are so happy you selected to stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent travels. Thank you for taking the time to share feedback, it's great to hear you had a comfortable stay with us. Hope you enjoyed your visit to the Angels games and downtown Disney, those are some great Anaheim local attractions. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Nice hotel with very good staff!  We were in Southern California for birthday celebration for a 100 year young amazing lady.  I have been happy with Hampton Inns in the past and we were not disappointed in this property.  Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress while in the area for such a wonderful celebration. We appreciate the recommendation and hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: We had a basketball tournament in the area and stayed in this very nice Hampton Inn. Spacious rooms, nice pool area, very convenient location (walk to Target, tons of places to eat), laundry room for those well worn uniforms, nice breakfast and incredible staff. Every person at this hotel is friendly, helpful and just great. The only reason I didn't give this hotel 5 stars is that the walls are paper thin - you can hear everything your neighbor is doing - but that isn't really anyone's fault but the construction quality. The rooms themselves are clean, big and very comfortable, so it really just depends on whether you have noisy neighbors. The hotel itself just had a makeover so it is nice and modern. We would definitely stay here again...we'll bring some earplugs just in case
Manager Response: We are so happy your team selected to stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent tournament. It's great to hear you found the hotel to be clean and convenient for your needs. We are sorry to hear you had some noise concerns, we do have ear buds available as well for future stays. Thank you for taking the time to recognizing our staff, I look forward to sharing your comments with them. We hope to welcome you back again soon when traveling to the Orange County area.

Summary: „ÅÑ„Å§Ê≥ä„Åæ„Å£„Å¶„ÇÇ„Çπ„Çø„ÉÉ„Éï„Åø„Çì„Å™„ÅåË¶™Âàá„Åß„Åô„ÄÇÈ£ü‰∫ã„ÇÇÊ†ÑÈ§ä„ÅÆ„ÅÇ„ÇãÊúùÈ£ü„ÅåÊèê‰æõ„Åï„Çå„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„ÅîÈ£Ø„Å®Âë≥ÂôåÊ±Å„ÇÇ„ÅÑ„Å§„ÇÇÊúâ„ÇäÊó•Êú¨‰∫∫„Å´Âêà„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so happy to hear you had a nice stay and enjoyed our breakfast buffet and our Asian breakfast selection. We hope to have you back again soon when travels bring you to the area.

Summary: The quality of this hotel is outstanding. Everything was clean and functional. The location is good and there was plenty of parking. The area felt reasonably safe; we didn't observe anything usual or concerning in terms of security. The staff is especially excellent. Everyone we spoke to was so friendly and willing to help us without it seeming like we're imposing. That's hard to find these days. 5 stars for sure. I wish it was cheaper to stay but I know that's not really possible given the level of quality present here.
Manager Response: We appreciate you selecting the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent stay. Thank you for the wonderful comments we are so proud to hear you had a wonderful stay and our staff took care of your needs. We hope to welcome you back again soon on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: Surprisingly nice location, close to everything.
Summary: We loved our time there, though while on vacation one desn't stay in the room all that much. First off, THE STAFF - GREAT STAFF! Regina at the front desk when we checked in the evening of our arrival. Tired people and she made the check in process easy, abd made us smile severla times. We needed that. Thank you Regina. Breakfast was handled by Norma and Cameren... Lots of smiles as Cameren went about her morning seeing to everyone's needs and keeping the place stocked. That wasn't easy being last weekend of spring break near Disneyland. Thank you Cameren! (Tell the boss I said you need a raise!) Breakfast, by the way was really good and plentiful! Crystal checked us out the morning of our departure - She had been a 'wake up inspiration: every morning we were there. Big smile and
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. I am so happy that my amazing staff left a lasting impression on you that you remembered all their names. I look forward to sharing your comments with them and the rest of the team at our morning huddle. So glad that you were able to join us for our breakfast buffet and coffee bar the Norma and Cameron do wonders in their keeping it ready for that morning rush. Also we appreciate you sharing our areas to improve so we can keep the hotel at it's best, We have started our carpet cleaning project, we are sorry we did have that done prior to your stay. We appreciate hearing you'll be back and we look forward to welcoming you.

Summary: Hotel Staff is friendly and professional, rooms are spacious and clean, breakfast is exceptionally good and the food staff especially "Norma" is friendly and dedicated to presenting the best breakfast experience for the hotel guests. Norma runs the best breakfast I have ever had at a hotel, everything is hot, serving area stayed clean and the atmosphere was enjoyable for all guests.
Manager Response: Thank you Tyrone for taking the time to share comments about your resent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We love Norma and we are glad you seen her doing what she does at breakfast, she is amazing and we are so lucky to have her on our team. I look forward to sharing your review with her and the rest of the team at our morning huddle. Hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Great Place for Disney and family vacation
Summary: While it's not right next door to Disney, this hotel was perfect for my family vacation. It was 2 miles from the 605 freeway and 5 miles from Disneyland and in the perfect location for our needs. The front desk staff were super nice. The breakfast was tremendous, with waffles, eggs, breakfast meats, and just a full variety of food. The two ladies that worked the breakfast, Norma and I didn't get the other lady's name, but they worked SUPER hard and deserve a raise for how hard they worked.  The rooms were clean and very large for our needs with a family of 4. Housekeeping needs to make sure to do a bit better, but were ok. The pool and hot tub were outside and a bit small, but ok for our needs. This is a great Hampton property and I would HIGHLY recommend it. We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share feedback on your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress, I look forward to share your comments with the staff. I am so proud to hear you made it down for breakfast and our amazing team was able to take care of your needs. We appreciate you being a loyal guest and your recommendation means a lot to us. We hope you had an amazing time at Disneyland and we hope to welcome you back again soon

Summary: This hotel is exactly what i have come to expect from a Hampton Inn. My family traveled here for Disney and reserved 3 rooms. Check in was a breeze, all the rooms were close together and clean. Staff was friendly and helpful. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for selecting the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent trip to Disneyland. We are so proud to hear your family had a smooth check in and comfortable stay with us. We appreciate the recommendation and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon when travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: We love everything about this hotel service was great location perfect only few min  away Disney they charge $17 dollar for parking but we never move the car  breakfst was great and change the next they bkeep it nice and fresh , bedsand roon very confortable
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your recent stay. We appreciate the wonderful comments and are proud to hear you had a good stay and enjoyed our breakfast. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Had a great stay, room and bathroom were nice and clean. Staff was friendly. Great location next to Target, Starbucks, and restaurants. Only down side was the breakfast wasn't that good. The potatoes, eggs and sausage were cold and looked undercooked. Overall our stay was good. My family and I will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so proud to hear that you enjoyed your room and the local area. Ask us about our local favorite resturant suggestions on your next visit. Hope to see you soon.

Summary: The walls are super thin. We tried to sleep but our loud neighbor was on the phone for hours. We wore earplugs but it didn't help, we could still hear every word clearly. We called the front desk and the agent said she'll call them to quit down. The talking continued for another hour or more. It seems as if she did not call him as promised. He didn't pause from his conversation. Also, the dining area's carpet was filthy. It looks like it hasn't been vacuumed for days. We went down for breakfast every morning at 6 when they opened and the carpet was still dirty. Other than the two issues, this hotel was nice. The location and price with free breakfast was great. We were able to get an early check in too, that was a plus. I would recommend this property but bring earplugs.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your stay. We are sorry to hear that you had some noise concerns during your stay, we hope all our guest are able to relax and have a quite place to sleep. It was also very concerning to hear about the carpet not being attended to in the dinning room, this is something we are jumping right on. We are glad to hear you did enjoy the breakfast buffet and we appreciate the recommendation. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again soon when traveling to the area.

Summary: My family stayed 5 nights. We spent our days at Disneyland and it was just a short distance to drive each morning. The Hampton was friendly, clean and quiet. We were truly blessed by the incredible SERVICE provided by Norma, each morning she cheerfully greeted my family she changed the feel of the environment with her joyful service that she provided. We ate breakfast one morning that she had the day off and service was still good. But it was obvious that the feel was totally missing Norma. She made you feel welcome and was very personable.  She started each morning as a bright light that never dimmed! She didn‚Äôt just do a great job but she went above and beyond! We would definitely stay here again and look forward to seeing her again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate you taking the time to share comments and to recognize the staff. Norma is amazing at breakfast and she definitely can brighten up the day for anyone, I look forward to sharing your comments with her and reminder her how lucky we are to have her. We look forward to welcoming you back again on your next visit to Disneyland or the Orange County area.

Summary: I really liked it here. The staff was quick with the check in process and also my departure ! The room was very clean and spacious ! All in all , this was a great experience and I would recommend this hotel to friends and family
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so proud to hear that you had a great visit with us. We have an awesome front desk team, it's great to hear they were able to take care of you quickly. We hope to welcome you back again soon when traveling to the Orange County area.

Summary: I was required to stay at this hotel due to an event I was attending. The room was not clean at the time of my arrival (I arrived an hour before check-in). It was still not clean at the check-in time, so I was assigned another room. The staff was friendly and very accommodating. My key stopped working twice during my stay which required several extra trips to the front desk. It was very frustrating, but the staff was great to fix the problem. The bathroom was very large, but the closet was tiny with only 6 hangers. There were three small wire basket drawers as well. If you don't mind living out of a suitcase, the room will probably be adequate. I like to unpack and have a place for my things. I wouldn't stay here again based on the lack of storage space.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your resent stay. We are sorry to hear you were not completely satisfied with your stay. We wish we could have done more by providing additional hangers or a back up room key. Our staff does their best to ensure all our guest having a great stay and if we were made aware of your concerns may have been able to do more. We appreciate your feedback and we hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back when traveling to the area.

Summary: The cleanliness of the rooms was fantastic as well as the comfort. It was 15-20 minutes away from Disneyland, which was great since that was our purpose for travel. The breakfast was delicious and varied everyday, which is something you don't get everywhere. The breakfast attendant, Norma, was very welcoming and helpful when we asked for other places to visit. I loved it!
Manager Response: We appreciate the wonderful comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so proud to hear that you had a comfortable stay with us and you enjoyed our breakfast buffet. I look forward to sharing your review with Norma, she is simply the best and we are so proud of her. We hope your trip to Disneyland was a great one. We look forward to welcoming you back to your second home when traveling back to the area, thank you again for staying with us see you soon!

Summary: My go to hotel whenever I am in the area. The rooms are spacious and new. The lobby and breakfast is wonderful. Never a problem with parking and the hotel is centrally located near the  beach and lots of shopping
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments regarding your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so happy to hear you are a loyal guest when traveling to the area. We hope to have you back again with us soon when travels bring you to the area.

Summary: Staff is great. They were very nice and welcoming; rooms look clean but are are not pristine clean. Poor quality towels and wash cloths; so thin, I could see my hands through the wash cloth. Comfortable beds; great free breakfast that start at 6am.
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent stay and you taking time to complete a review. We are sorry to hear you were not completely stratified with your stay. I will be following up with my housekeeping department on the condition of linen placed in your room. We inventory and purchases linen monthly to avoid any concerns on condition. We hope to have the opportunity to have you back again soon.

Summary: Norma, breakfast attendant, made my daughter's basketball team made a special effort to make sure the girls had what they wanted for breakfast before their tournament. They were serving sausage patties that morning. A few girls mentioned that they really wanted some bacon. Norma overheard them and made them a big plate of bacon. It was such a nice thing for her to do. Customer service was excellent the whole time we were there.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share comments regarding your recent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so glad to hear that you and the team enjoyed our breakfast buffet. Norma is over the top amazing and we are so lucky to have such a caring person on our team. Thank you again and we hope to welcome you all back again soon.

Summary: This is a good place if you are travelling on a budget.  No Restaurant, only small area to buy snacks, but some frozen lean cuisine , Chinese or pizzas to put in their microwave.  Snacks and ice cream there too.  Coffee/tea available in the lobby 24-7.  Breakfast buffet is quite reasonable and includes options for hot breakfast and protein as well.  Good for kids; cereals, waffle maker, etc. Exercise room very basic but clean.  Outdoor heated pool gets sun.  Target, Starbucks and other shopping near by (walking distance).  Hotel staff friendly and rooms updated. They have laundry facilities.  I was there for business and used to something a bit more upscale, but great on a budget or for families.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate the feedback, glad to hear you were able to join us for our breakfast buffet and we appreciate you taking the time to recognize the staff. We hope we have another opportunity to welcome you back when traveling to the area for business or pleasure.

Summary: All I can say is the room is very clean and organized. I minus one rating because of the stomping noise I heard from upstairs. I believe the ceiling/flooring and the insulation was thin between floors. I keep hearing it all night and I believe there were kids in the room above us. Otherwise, it was a pleasant stay. We chose this hotel, because it was close by to Knotts Berry Farm and other convenient eateries around. The breakfast selection was great like all the other Hampton Inn. The location is also very quiet, which is a plus. I would recommend for those who want a quiet stay with their family. I think it's also close by to Disneyland as well.
Manager Response: Thank you choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent visit to Knott's Berry Farm. We are happy to hear that you had an overall great experience and enjoyed our breakfast buffet and the local area. We wish we could do more regarding the noise concern coming from above you. We appreciate the recommendation and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: I stayed at the Hampton Inn Cypress for 3 nights.  The rooms were clean with lots of room.  Beds were very comfortable.  The free breakfast was awesome!  It wasn't the same menu everyday, which I appreciated.  Norma was very attentive and kind.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for stay with us at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. Great to hear you were able to get a comfortable nights rest.  Norma at breakfast is awesome I look forward to sharing your comments with her.  Hope have you back soon.

Summary: During my week stay: Excellent service from the front desk, house keeping and of course breakfast; everyone were very friendly and genuine nice, no attitudes. The lady that does breakfast is super kind!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress.  We are proud to hear you had an enjoyable experience during your recent stay. We are so lucky to have such an amazing staff and appreciate you recognizing them for what they do.  We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Excellent staff. Rooms are good. And, of course, the breakfast, especially the make your own waffle, is delectable.  I also appreciate the chocolate chip cookies in the evening. They're delicious!!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so proud to hear that you had great service and enjoyed our breakfast buffet, the waffles our favorite as well. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Longtime favorite, even better after remodel
Summary: My husband and I laughed together this morning after a good night‚Äôs sleep, agreeing that, indeed, this hotel feels like our second home when we travel down from the Oregon Coast to visit family and friends here in Southern CA.  We‚Äôve been staying here on trips ever since the hotel opened.  These are a few of the things we enjoy here: Comfy beds with clean duvet covers for each stay;  Beautifully remodeled rooms with chaise, good reading lights, and multiple, convenient charging ports; Clean rooms; Fresh, modern furnishings; Nice complimentary breakfast selection served in attractive eating area; Quiet, safe neighborhood; and Restaurants and shopping nearby.  We typically are greeted by name by friendly, professional front desk staff.  All staff go out of their way to help with
Manager Response: Wow, thank you so much for being a loyal guest of the Hampton Inn Cypress. I truly look forward to sharing your comments with the team they work really hard and will enjoy hearing all the positive compliments. We are so proud to hear that you like the outcome of our renovation, we were so excited to share the updates with our regular guest that known the hotel over the years. We hope to continue having you as a guest when in California and hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Newer HI with very nice decor in rooms and public areas.  Very quiet, and off the busy street so zero traffic noise.  The staff were quite helpful and courteous. I was traveling on business, and this was easy to find and close to all my meetings in the Cypress area.  Typical Hampton Inn breakfast...utilitarian.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate your wonderful comments and are so happy to hear you had a great stay with us on your business trip. We hope to welcome you back again soon when in the area for business or pleasure.

Summary: My room and the hotel overall was very clean. It is conveniently located away from busy streets and walking distance to some stores and restaurants. The staff were friendly and anxious meet my needs. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for selected to stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress for your recent travels. We appreciate you taking the time to share feedback and we are proud to hear that you will back to stay with us again. Hope to see you soon.

Summary: First time staying at this particular Hampton Inn.  What a find!  Booked through Costco because it's a little cheaper (esp if you pay in advance) AND you still get your Hilton Honors points AND as an executive member, you earn your 2% from Costco.  Hotel was remodeled in the last year and it shows.  They have 4 floors.  We booked 3 king suites.  Clean, comfortable, spacious and although the bathrooms in the king suites don't have a tub, they do have a beautiful walk in shower that is big enough for two :).  Plenty of counter space, a little shelving cubby to store things.  The closet is built into the wall behind the mirror.  Almost missed it.  Rooms have mini fridges that work really well (cold). The rooms have the wall unit cooler/heater BUT you control it from the thermostat
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review and stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate you being a loyal Hilton Honors member and it's great to hear that you were able to take advantage of our Costco partnership discount. We are all very proud to be your go to hotel when traveling to Disneyland and that we were able to meet all your needs in at breakfast and in your guest room. I'm excited to share your comments with the rest of the team here at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: This is a great hotel.  The room was clean and quiet; the breakfast was good.  Used the laundry and it was clean.  The location is great as it is near a strip mall, food and shopping in walking distance.  Will stay again if in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your stay with us. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon when you come back to the area.

Summary: I spent over three months working in the Orange County area. This Hampton and their incredibly friendly staff made this hotel a great home away from home. The rooms are extra clean, beds were exceptionally comfortable and each room I stayed in had great pillow selections. To top it off, the kind kitchen staff always provide a great breakfast selection. Let's face it when your away on work, you just want a great nights sleep and the comfort of a friendly hello when you come in for the evening. Thank you to Team Hampton in Cypress.
Manager Response: We are so proud to hear you were comfortable during your extended travel time spent at our Hampton Inn Cypress. We are really lucky to have such a great team to represent our hotel and I am excited to share your wonderful comments with them. We appreciate you being loyal guest and hope to welcome you back again soon when business or pleasure brings you back to the area.   Thank you from the entire team!!!

Summary Heading: Very good Hampton Inn, exceeded expectations
Summary: Hampton Inn's aren't at the top of the hotel pecking order, but this Hampton Inn was very well put together.  New and well furnished.  Desk people are extremely nice and helpful. Even gave me a bottle of water with my name on it (kind of freaky because I didn't notice that till I was drinking it).  Close to plenty of food places (although not great food places)  but the location in good. I will stay there again when in Cypress.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your recent visit to the Cypress Hampton Inn. We appreciate you recognizing the staff for there hard work, they will be ready to welcome you back when you in the area. Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Clean hotel, friendly staff. It said 20 min to Disneyland but took only 10. Straight shot from katella. It's a lil plain, but free parking and free breakfast makes it worth it. Digital key worked perfect
Manager Response: Thank you for you recent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate the review and hope you had a wonderful time visit Disneyland on your recent visit. Hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: I believe that Hampton provides the best value of any hotel bar none. Hampton was recommended to me by my supervisor, and he was right. I did stay at one of your competitors facilities recently, and felt like I needed to visit a decontamination facility afterward.
Manager Response: You Rock!!! Thank you for the review and awesome comments. We appreciate your recent visit with us and hope to welcome you back again soon at the Hampton Inn Cypress.

Summary: This hotel is my first choice in the Hilton family whenever I need a place to stay in the greater Los Angeles region. On the backside of the hotel is a shopping center, and there many fine restaurants and retail business within short distance. I was surprised to learn the even offer a few Japanese breakfast items, for corporate visitors from Japan working for Yamaha Motors and Mitsubishi. The hotel is in a very quiet section of Cypress and the staff is very friendly and helpful. I highly recommend this Hampton!
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent visit to the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so proud to hear you are a loyal Hilton guest and enjoy the Hampton Inn brands. Thank you for joining us for our breakfast buffet, we are glad to hear you enjoyed the Asian breakfast options. We look forward to welcoming you back when travel brings you back to the Orange County/Los Angeles area.

Summary: We stayed with 3 children 6 and under and they stay was enjoyable. The free breakfast was key. Clean rooms, kind and helpful staff and nice accommodations. Will look into staying here for our next Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Great to hear you had a nice family vacation and enjoyed your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so glad to hear the kids enjoyed themselves and our breakfast buffet. We look forward to welcoming you back for your next Disneyland trip. See you soon!

Summary: I do not have anything to complain about this hotel. This hotel is clean, well maintained, and staff are friendly. Breakfast was also good and there was a lot to choose from. Wi-Fi is also very good. Will definitely return again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so proud to hear we were able to meet all your needs. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Excellent one night stay. Check in was quick and easy and during the evening there are chocolate chips cookies which were quite delicious! The room and bathroom are huge and the biggest of any of the Hampton's that I have stayed in. Bed is very comfortable as is the norm for the Hampton brand and also had a nice chair in the room to stretch out on. Very good breakfast in the morning with a nice variety. Hotel is located off main road in a quiet location with ample free parking. Very short drive to Knots Berry Farm as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress, we appreciate the wonderful comments about your stay. Glad to hear you were comfortable in our spacious guest rooms and you were able to join us for breakfast. Hope you had an amazing time at Knott's Berry Farm. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary: I would recommend this hotel 100%.  Staff are extremely friendly, helpful and accommodating.  Rooms are clean and comfortable.  Free breakfasts are a plus. Overall, impressive hospitality and customer service!
Manager Response: We truly appreciate the wonderful comments regarding your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Thank you for recognizing the staff on a job well done we are so lucky to have such an amazing team. We hope to have you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel! Loved the fitness room!
Summary: I am Hilton Honors member and like staying at the Hilton family hotels, but had never stayed at the Hampton. During check in the staff asked me if I am a member and made sure to find me in the system. Nice to have had the option to get my points for the stay! Most importantly this hotel exceeded my expectations. It is located close to the Yamaha plant and I noticed many business travelers during the week we were there. There was always coffee including decaf and hot water for tea available, breakfast was great and of good variety. I was impressed by the cleanliness, the staff making sure guests are comfortable, the fitness center was well supplied with new equipment, tv monitors, and other additional fitness items that allow for a complete workout. I wish more hotels were paying
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share comments about your recent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate you being a loyal Hilton Honors member, we are so proud to know we are your first Hampton Inn stay and so glad we represented the brand well. We look forward to having you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary: This hotel is amazing! The check in was very smooth.  I was able to check in on my phone and go right up to my room. The breakfast had a good variety and everything was replenished quickly. The lady working in the breakfast area Norma was amazing and helpful. They served warm cookies in the lobby at night which was a nice snack! Coffee, tea and water in the lobby was fresh!  Safe and Clean hotel.  Good location off a main road.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate the feedback and you recognizing Norma, she does an amazing job and we are so lucky to have her. We hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: Great place to stay, the hotel was clean, quiet, staff was awesome. and helped with directions and anything else I needed. Even recommended a sushi place within walking distance. I would stay there again, I would recommend shuttle service in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your recent stay at Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate the feed back and hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: Loved the rooms. Beds were big and comfortable. Breakfast was very good. They had a different selection of hot items everyday. My 8 year old loved the waffles and the toppings that had there for them.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so excited to hear you had an excellent stay with us. It's also so great to hear you were comfortable in our new Hampton beds. The waffles and toppings are always a hit in the mornings at our breakfast buffet. We hope to have you back again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: The staff at this hotel is extremely nice and helpful. The rooms were very clean. We were able to check in early, which was very helpful. Hotel is close to everything. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us. Great to hear we were able to accommodate your request for an early check in. I am excited to share your feedback with our team they will be thrilled to hear they made a difference in your stay. Hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: Stayed here one night on a business trip, and found this property to be very nice. This location is very similar to many of the newer Hampton properties which boast a large lobby/dining area and upgraded guestrooms. The staff were exceptionally pleasant, and helped with meal suggestions. The guestroom and bathroom were both very clean, and everything was functional. I liked that the property is set off the main road by a block, which certainly helped with the noise - this hotel is very quiet. The breakfast was standard Hampton fare, but it was attended to by a couple of ladies that worked well with the guests. They engaged the guests and willingly picked up used plates/utensils, etc. This extension of hospitality helps differentiate and goes a long way to ensure a guest's
Manager Response: We are so proud you selected to stay with us at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress on your recent business trip. We appreciate the wonderful feedback, we do our best to ensure our guest are welcomed and are well taken care of during their time with us. I am excited to share your comments with the team to let them know they are making a difference in our guest experience. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the area. Hope to see you soon!

Summary: The overall trip from start to finish was amazing. My grandson's really enjoyed the trip and in looking forward to another time with you all. What I like most about the hotel was that it was not far from the gym where he had to play in his basketball tournament. You're all your stuff was amazing but I'd like to give an extra shout out to Crystal at the front desk. The cleaning staff was also amazing as well this is the first hotel that I did not have a problem with. Keep up the good work.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share feedback about your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We really enjoy having the sport teams stay with us, the kids love staying at hotels and are so excited to be with there teammates. We are so pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable experience and thank you for taking the time to recognize the cleaning staff and Crystal. I look forward to sharing your feedback with the team, hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: Had a great stay here, staff was very friendly and loved the complimentary breakfast and wifi. Thanks everyone especially Maritza and Norma from the breakfast staff, thank you for your amazing service and hospitality.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress, we think our staff is amazing too! Norma and Martiza do great work preparing breakfast for our hotel guest and making them feel welcome. I am so glad to hear you had the opportunity to chat with them and I look forward to sharing your comments with them. We hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: great place with clean rooms and great people. have stayed here before and would stay here again. staff here is friendly and polite. would definitely recommend this place to anyone coming to stay down here plus it's super close to places to restaurants.
Manager Response: We are proud to hear that you are a return guest and had a great visit at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate the wonderful comments about the staff they do their best to ensure our guest have a pleasant stay. Thank you so much for the recommendation, we hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: The property is in a quiet area. The staff was friendly.   There was complimentary breakfast and Wi-fi.  However, having stayed at other Hilton Properties, I think that this property would benefit from updating their beds and ensuring that the rooms are really ready.  The bathroom smelt like someone just had used it.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your recent stay. Thank you for taking the time to recognize our amazing staff. We are so glad to hear that you had the opportunity to join us for breakfast. We hope to have the pleasure of having you back again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: First time in this hotel to celebrate our 50th.  Selina GM and her staffs are super friendly and helpful! Hotel is in the best location close to Disney, Anaheim, Garden Grove and other Orange County access. Room was clean and spacious. Will definitely coming back to this place!
Manager Response: Dr. Maing, we appreciate you choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your 50th anniversary trip. We are so excited to hear that you and your wife had a wonderful visit with us. I appreciate you taking the time to share comments and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the area. Thank you for being a loyal Hilton Honors Diamond member, see you soon.

Summary: The hotel was perfectly located by Knotts Berry Farm! :) Phenomenal service from arrival to departure. Extremely happy with the level of services that was provided. Was very happy... The bed was extrmely comfortable. I hate being forced to write 200 charaters. :(
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We hope you had an enjoyable trip to Knott's Berry Farm, the area theme parks are such a fun experience this time of year. We are proud to hear that you received great service from our team. Hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: I stayed at this Hampton in 2016 on my way to Disneyland. I decided to stay again at he same hotel and the service and amenities were even better than last year. Hope to stay here again in 2018. Added bonus is the Complimentary breakfast and internet.
Manager Response: We are proud to hear that you are a loyal guest of the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress when traveling to the Disneyland area. We hope you enjoyed your family trip to the parks. We look forward to having you back again next year, hope you have a wonderful holiday season.

Summary: Stayed during Thanksgiving holiday.  Hotel has been renovated.  It‚Äôs clean and modern style. Check in/out was simple and the staff were friendly. Room was comfortable and clean.  Breakfast was good.  Would recommend this Hampton to family and friends.
Manager Response: Thank you your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so proud you selected to stay with us, we hope you had an amazing Holiday. We appreciate the recommendation and so grateful to hear you enjoyed your visit with us. We look forward to having you back again soon.

Summary: Great hotel. Has a awesome breakfast.The rooms are very nice and there is great service! The breakfast had lots of food and the people there were very nice. The hotel rooms  had two full beds, were very ‚Äúroomy‚Äù and the room service was very consistent.
Manager Response: Thank you choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent travels. We are so glad to hear that you had a chance to join us for our breakfast buffet. I look forward to sharing your awesome comments with our team, I know they will appreciate the compliments. Hope to have you back with us soon.

Summary: Amazing place! Perfect place for a hockey tournament. I couldn‚Äôt ask for a better stay. It was also a great place to go to the beach. Plus the beach is so clean. The hotel had complementary cookies tea.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We hope you and your team had an amazing time at your hockey tournament. We hope you had a blast visiting the area and beach. Hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: The service here is fabulous! My favorite part about it was the customer service; Aerin, Daljit, and Regina were all very helpful in assisting in our needs! 10/10 recommend and would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so proud to hear about the fabulous service you received from some of our amazing front desk team. We appreciate the recommendation and we look forward to having you back again soon.

Summary: This was the best hotel I have ever stayed at! Crystal, at the front desk was very helpful, making fire that all of my needs were met! The breakfast was amazing, and the maids made sure my room was spotless!
Manager Response: We appreciate the wonderful comments regarding your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast buffet. I look forward to sharing your comments with our housekeeping team, I know they will appreciate hearing they provided a spotless room for you. Hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: Daljit and Aerin were the best front desk representatives that have ever lived. The french toast sticks were amazing. And I love the snack shop and fluffy blankets!! Crystal is the best person in the entire world!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your visit to the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so proud to hear that you had an amazing stay with us and were able to join us for breakfast. Thanks for taking the time to recogbize the team on a job well done. We hope to have you back again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: I loved the service! The people at the front desk were so sweet and caring. Daljit and Aerin were so helpful and the best of the best. The breakfast was great; the French toast was bomb. The snack shop was awesome!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate you taking the time to recognize some of our awesome front desk team we also think they are the BEST! Hope to have you back again soon!

Summary: The hotel is very nice and beautiful. The beds are very comfortable and the comforters were extremely comfy and full. The service was amazing because of Daljit and Aerin! The breakfast was full of options that were so delicious!
Manager Response: We are so proud to hear that you had the best stay ever at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. So glad that you were able to get a comfortable nights rest with us, we recently replaced all our mattresses and get so many wonderful comments on the comfort of them. Thank you for recognizing our awesome front desk team members Daljit and Aerin I look forward to sharing your comments with them. Hope to have you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Perfect hotel for a Disneyland experience
Summary: Love this hotel. My family and I had stayed there for the past 3 visits to Disneyland and our experience had been amazing every time. Rooms are clean, breakfast is very good and location is very convenient for a visit to Disneyland parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent Disneyland trip. We are so excited to here that you are a loyal guest when coming to the area. We hope you an amazing and memorable visit to the parks. Wishing you and the family a happy holiday from the whole team at the Hampton Cypress. Hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: The hotel itself was great. The exterior,  interior were well maintained. The rooms were spectacular. On another note,  Wi-Fi was bad and couldn't log in for a day and a half. Plus,  the AC unit kept us up all night (room 303).  Horrible noise it was making everytime it was on. So i woke up and turned it off. Also,  the people that stayed right above us didn't let us sleep at all. He/she walked around there room stomping and walking hard.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments regarding your recent stay. We had an unexpected outage to our buildings internet server that caused the unit to catch fire. Our service providers were able to get the service back up in just over 24 hours. We apologize that this had to happen during your recent stay and wish we could have recovered prior to your check out. We hope to have another opportunity to have you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary: The staff was very nice. However, at the time of checkout, I was not offered any bill adjustments or future nights free for the loss of internet service during my stay. I had to find a fedex (overnight) in order to complete my report and email it by the morning deadline. This was a great inconvenience. I didn‚Äôt say anything at checkout because I should not have had that burden as a customer. The  burden should be on the provider.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments regarding your recent stay. We had an unexpected outage to our buildings internet server that caused the unit to catch fire. Our service providers were able to get the service back up in just over 24 hours. We apologize that this had to happen during your recent business trip and wish we could have recovered prior to your check out. We hope to have another opportunity to have you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Best hotel in the area for your money. The staff was amazing and extremely accommodating. I was able to check jn early and it was a flawless experience. Definitely staying here the next time I‚Äôm in town!
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. Thank you for taking the time to complete a review. We are so glad to here you had the best stay, and that we were able to accommodate your needs for an early check in. We look forward to welcoming you back as a return guest on your next visit to the area.

Summary: I stayed for at this location for two nights on business. I thought it was great location and the rooms were clean. I also loved the complimentary breakfast as there were many options. I will definitely return if I am in the area.
Manager Response: We are so happy you selected to stay with us at the Hampton Inn Cypress on your recent business trip. It's great to hear you enjoyed our breakfast buffet, hope it got your morning off to a good start. We look forward to having you back with us on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Nice and professional staffs, Clean and comfortable room and bed, and convenient location.(I could walk to shop and eat to small mall were big plus for me.) I had a very nice stay at this hotel for my business trip. Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: We are so excited to hear that you think our hotel is Excellent! We appreciate you taking the time to recognize our staff and thank you for the recommendation. We hope to have you back again soon at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress.

Summary: Would definitely stay here again. The 15 minute, $7.50 lyft ride to Disneyland was worth it. The rooms were clean, the staff was friendly and helpful. I love staying at Hampton hotels and this one certainly did not disappoint.
Manager Response: Thank you taking the time to share comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress and thank you for your loyalty to the Hampton Inn brand. We are so pleased to hear that you had a great stay with us on your recent trip to Disneyland. hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: The Staff was friendly.  The Room was clean.  There was Free Coffee, hot chocolate, tea and all the accompanying amenities & a continental breakfast in the morning. What else do you need?!   Would stay here again!  . . . . .
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your stay with us at the Hampton Inn Cypress. The 24 hour coffee bar is a big hit especially as the weather starts cooling down. We are so glad to hear that you will be back to stay with us again, see you soon.

Summary: This was my 1st time at a Hampton hotel and I was quite surprised.  It was better/nicer than I thought it would be.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  I would definitely return.  I liked that the hotel had many entrances around the building.  I didn't have to park in the back of the hotel and walk all the way to the front.  I don't like doing that when it's late at night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are glad that you selected to stay with us on your first visit to a Hampton Inn and we're so glad you were impressed. We hope we made you a Hampton Inn fan and we look forward to having you back on your next visit to the Orange County area.

Summary: Nice location, quite area. Breakfast service was very well stocked and even at 10 mins before the end of service there were fresh scrambled eggs. The staff and receptionist was helpful and efficient. The property is new and very well kept. Room and furnishings were up to date.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your wonderful comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so happy to hear that you were able to having a relaxing stay with us and had time to joy us for breakfast. Glad we were able to meet your needs and hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: Enjoyed our stay. 20 minutes drive from Disneyland quiet area and free complimentary breakfast was delicious. Room was clean and was always replenished with new towels soap and tissue. Staff was always there when needed. I like how‚Äôs there was coffee water tea 24 hours of the day. Located near restaurants and shops for convenience. Will come back to this hotel when visiting Disneyland again since we are annual pass holders
Manager Response: we are so proud to here you selected to stay with us at the Hampton Inn Cypress for your recent trip to Disneyland. We hope you had the best time visiting the parks. It's so great to hear you enjoyed our 24 hour coffee bar and our breakfast buffet. We hope you make it back to Disneyland soon we can't wait to have you back with us.

Summary: I looked over hotels for weeks for our family‚Äôs visit to see family in Lakewood.  I finally choose Hampton because of the reviews, breakfast, outdoor pool and location. We were not disappointed! The staff were very friendly, the room was clean and the breakfast was great. We will stay here again next time we‚Äôre in the area.
Manager Response: So glad to hear you had a fantastic stay with us on your recent family trip. Thank you taking the time to share some comments. We look forward to having you back at the Hampton Inn Cypress when visit the area.

Summary: We arrived late @ 11:00pm. We checked in and after unloading our luggage and getting to our room , exhausted, our assigned room was open with tools left and a thermostat on a bed. We went back down with our luggage and proceeded to wait 30 more minutes while the desk attendant searched for another room, mumbling the entire time. There were no apologies given and no explanations; very poor customer service. I might add that it was now after midnight and the hotel was not busy.
Manager Response: I am so sorry to hear about your check in experience. I appreciate you sharing your feedback, so I can address with our team and we can get to work on being better. I hope that we have another opportunity to have you back on your next visit to the area. Our team is amazing but seem to have dropped the ball, I hope to have the chance to show you we are better then this.

Summary Heading: Great stay in a good location
Summary: Very nice hotel in a good location at a very reasonable price.  Hotel is short drive to Disney attractions and about a 45 minute drive to the coast depending on traffic .  Many restaurants close by and the hotel is very quiet on weekends given that it is in a corporate area with many fortune 500 companies nearby.  Front desk staff was very friendly and helpful and rooms appeared larger than average.  Plenty of parking and just off the main road.  Overall would not hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Hampton Inn Cypress on your recent trip to Disneyland. We hope you had an amazing time visiting the parks and local beaches, the weather has been great for a day at the beach. We hope have you back again soon on your next trip to the area. Thank you for the great feedback.

Summary: We have family in Seal Beach, and the Seal Beach Hampton Inn costs $40+ more per night than the Cypress property. For an extra 10-15 minute drive, you can find the same accommodations for less money. We were really grateful to the staff for their care during our stay. We have food allergies and the breakfast crew went above and beyond to help us find things to eat.
Manager Response: We are glad to hear that you choose the Cypress Hampton Inn! So happy to hear that our amazing breakfast staff was able to accommodate your breakfast needs. We hope to have you back again soon when visiting family and enjoying the Orange County area.

Summary: I‚Äôve stayed at this place a few times in the past and while it isn‚Äôt my favorite Hilton property in Anaheim, it is one of my preferrred locations in the area. I really like the free parking and the breakfast. While it‚Äôs not an mega brunch buffet, it has some pretty good items I enjoyed like the hard boiled eggs and create your waffle. There‚Äôs usually other items such as potatoes, egg mini omelette, and a protein (bacon, sausage, etc).  What really made this most recent visit nice was the front desk team who worked to accommodate a special request for me as well as Crystal in the breakfast area. Crystal was amazing, hope you get a chance to meet her and you‚Äôll agree that her customer service skills are on point! Other than that, I‚Äôll probably be back at this location in a future
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to share your comments and for being a frequent guest of the Hampton Inn Cypress. We'd love to be your preferred and favorite place to stay in the Anaheim area and thank you for letting us know we still have some work to do to gain that. Crystal is our assistant front office manager and she is awesome I'm so glad to hear she made a great impression on your stay. I look forward to sharing your review with her and hope to see you on your next visit to the property.

Summary: Our stay at the Hampton Inn was incredible. We were greated immediately at arrival and offered complimantary items for being Hilton Honors members. When checking in online the only room available was on the 1st floor we decided to wait and happy when we arrived and were placed in a cornor room and on the third floor. Once entering our room it immediately smelled fresh and the a/c was keeping it nice and fresh. The bed and pillows were so comfortable we slept like a baby. Only got up the next morning for complimwntary breakfast that was delicious! Waffles are a must! We will definetly be returning to this location as the pricing was great for all the ammenities offered and near The Honda Center where we went to the concert we were attending.
Manager Response: It's so great to hear you had an enjoyable and relaxing visit on your resent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We LOVE the waffles too, hope you enjoyed all the toppings. The Honda center is a great venue, I bet you had an amazing time. Thank you for being a loyal Hilton Honors member and we look forward to having you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary: The hotel and the room was clean. The location is very nearby to the LGB airport. The front desk staff could be of more help. I saw they were giving water bottles to customers who checked in before me. So I went downstairs to get a water bottle. Front desk showed me the vending machine and I walked back all the way to my room to get my wallet. I dont have a problem in buying the water bottle from vending machine. I just didnt understand why I was treated different being a Hilton Honors member !
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave comments regarding your stay. I am very sorry to hear about your disappoint regarding not receiving Hilton Honors benefits upon arrival. Gold and Diamond members can elect their myway options via the Hilton honors website as the system defaults to bonus points. We do our best to make sure all our Hilton Honors guest feel welcome and I am sorry you didn't. We hope to have another opperunity to have you back again soon.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a trip to Disneyland. It‚Äôs about 15 minutes drive from the park but well worth it. The staff was friendly and the hotel was very clean. We paid half the price staying here rather than the Hampton down the street from Disney. Parking, Internet and breakfast are all included in your stay.   I would stay there again and recommend it to my friends.
Manager Response: We are so proud to hear that you selected to stay with us at the Hampton Inn Cypress on your recent trip to Disneyland. We hope you had a great visit to the parks, the weather has been great for it. We truly appreciate the recommendation and look forward to having you back again soon in the near future.

Summary: Very clean property both inside and out. Staff was excellent. We have stayed here several times and will definitely stay again. The only complaint I have were the pillows were flat but everyone has different tastes in pillows.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share feedback about your recent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Thank you for being a loyal guest when traveling to the area. In the future please let us know if you need additional pillows we will be happy to replace them for you. Hope to have you back soon.

Summary: I was leery about staying here because the price was so cheap and I associate that with dumpy hotels. I was blown away, I loved everything about this hotel. Clean, staff was nice, beds were so comfy, good location, quiet and the complimentary breakfast was sooooo good. I couldn't stop eating lol. I can't recommend this place enough. I won't stay anywhere else when I am out there in the future. Thank you for knowing how a hotel should be run and keeping the price affordable for the average person.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments regarding your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We our so proud that we are your new home away from home traveling to Cypress. So glad that you enjoyed breakfast with us. We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: „É™„Éé„Éô„Éº„Ç∑„Éß„É≥„ÅåÈÄ≤„Çì„Åß„ÅÑ„Å¶Ê∞óÊåÅ„Å°ËâØ„ÅÑ„ÄÇÊúùÈ£ü„ÇÇÁæéÂë≥„Åó„ÅÑ„ÄÇËá™ÂàÜ„ÅØÈ£ü„Åπ„Å™„ÅÑ„Åë„Å©Âπ≥Êó•„ÅØ„ÅäÁ±≥„ÅÆ„Åî„ÅØ„Çì„Å®„Åµ„Çä„Åã„Åë„ÄÅÂë≥ÂôåÊ±Å„Åå„Åß„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ
