Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are happy to hear you had time to visit breakfast. We hope to have you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Rooms wonderful took forever to check in - rooms were not ready until after 5pm . Property was new and redone - great food  staff was just ok .. hotel was pricey for the area . Yet rooms were big and very nice
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your recent visit. I am very sorry to hear about your delayed check in. I will be addressing this with my team as we work hard on ensuring check in time is met. We hope we have another opportunity to have you back when traveling to the area.

Summary: Stayed at this place for 4 nights in July. The floor in the room was very creaky both in our room as well as the room above, as we were able to hear the person upstairs walking. The A/C fan kept switching off very often, eliminating the white noise which was masking the noise from the room upstairs. The front desk staff was quite friendly. The location is pretty good with lots of restaurants close by. This place is pretty close to Disneyland, which was our destination for the weekend.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share feedback about your stay over the summer. We hope to have the opportunity to have you back again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: I Felt right at home... This was such a great place to stay :) Very convenient to restaurants and places to go.  I would recommend this place to my friends and family. I know they would love this place just like I did!!!!
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your recent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so proud to hear that you will be recommending us to your family and friends coming to the area. We hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: Stay is very good ; other than, Breakfast related ; everything else is perfect   This is finest hotel , not seen before ;   Thanks for caring guests well ; wishing  good luck to Hilton group ;  will prefer this group to friends and families without any doubt
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback regarding your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress and we are proud you selected to stay with us for your trip. Thank you for the recommendations we hope to see you back again soon when traveling to the area.

Summary: This is a clean, friendly, and comfortable location.  It appears that the hotel was remodeled recently.  The breakfast staff was quick and efficient.  The housekeeping staff did a great job keeping the my room fresh.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your visit and our newly remodeled rooms. Thank you for taking the time to compliment the staff I can't wait to share your feedback with them. We hope to having you soon when travels bring you back to the Cypress area.

Summary: The Hotel is very clean the room is spacious and smelled very fresh. I will stay again when I am in the area. The hotel staff was friendly and quick when I had to call for additional towels. Literally delivered in minutes.. Thank you again.
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. Thank you for taking the time to share feedback about your stay. We are very happy to hear the staff was able to meet your needs. Hope to have you back again soon when traveling to the area.

Summary Heading: Hampton Inn by Hilton in Cypress California
Summary: Stayed 2 nights, room is very clean, 2 queen beds very comfortable, good complimentary breakfast, friendly staff. My wife and I are very pleased. Location is good. Easy access to 605. We will definitely stay there again when we visit southern California.
Manager Response: We are proud you selected the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your Southern California trip. We appreciate your feedback and are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable visit. We look forward to having you back again soon.

Summary: Just as I have said I want my money they held out back.  My reservation was for a ground floor room they were going to give me a upper floor room. I asked if they could see my reservation so then I did get the ground floor room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review. We appreciate your feedback and are sorry to hear that you had a less than pleasant experience on your recent visit. We hope we have another opportunity to have you back in the near future.

Summary: My 5 day stay at this hotel was wonderful. The room was clean. The bed was very comfy and there were plenty of pillows.  I especially liked the Cleopatra couch. I couldn't believe the number of outlets and usb ports there were! Maybe 22? I didn't count them all. The breakfast was wonderful,  too. Can't recommend them highly enough!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress on your recent travels. We appreciate the positive feedback about the property and are so happy that you enjoyed your visit. We hope we have the opportunity to have you back with us soon.

Summary: The customer service was the BEST EVER... the location was PERFECT .... loved everything from the HOTEL .. the STAFF.. THE ROOM and the complimentary breakfast was amazing. I can't wait to STAY there again... and I will tell everyone about it.
Manager Response: We are proud you selected the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for you recent travels. We are so pleased to hear you had a great stay and appreciate you sharing your positive feedback. We look forward to having you back and appreciate the loyalty.

Summary: This is a very good hotel.  The staff is friendly and welcoming, it has a great location and there are ample connections for all your electronic devices!  The room was VERY clean and well laid out.  Quiet location so no street noise.
Manager Response: We are proud you selected the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent hotel accommodations. Your feedback is important to us and we are thrilled to hear that we were able to provide you a clean and quiet place to relax. We look forward to having you back again in the near future.

Summary: This hotel ticked so many boxes. Reasonable rates. Friendly (check in) staff who seemed interested in ensuring we had a lovely stay. Nice room and breakfast. Well maintained guest laundry. Lovely cookies. Plentiful restaurants nearby albeit we ate at the Olive Gardens both days. We had a problem with noise from the room above with parents who thought it was acceptable to let their children run around their room until 10.30pm and from 7 in the morning. Not the hotels fault but if we came again we would opt for a top floor room.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Hampton Inn Cypress team we would like to thank you for your wonderful review and rating. Your feedback is important to us and I look forward to sharing your comments with the team. We look forward to having you back in the near future when traveling to the Cypress area.

Summary: Very clean, nice employee, free breakfast was great. Target,dollar tree, and many food place right within walking distance. We would diffently stay there again. 10 minutes to Huntington Beach & Knotts Berry Farm.
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent visit to the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We hope your team did well at the soccer tournament and you enjoyed visiting the local area. Can't wait to have you back again. See you soon.

Summary Heading: Great location for both knotts and disney
Summary: This is the best hotel in the area, came here after leaving the knotts berry farm "hotel" a day early due to disgusting conditions. This hotel is an outstanding stay option for business and resort visits. Very satisfied!
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit to the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We hope you had a fun trip to Knott's berry farm and visiting the local area. We hope to have you back when traveling to the area.

Summary: We stayed here for a Labor Day weekend soccer tournament. Hotel stay was great from check in to check out. The kids (and me) loved the breakfast options and the coffee all day fresh and hot with plenty of creamer options was great. Pool area was nice and the parking was great. Will definitely stay there again if I'm anywhere in the area.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback about your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are pleased to hear you and your soccer team had a wonderful time visiting the hotel. We look forward to having you back again soon.

Summary: We were here for our son's wedding in Norwalk with the luncheon following at the Original Fish Co in Los Alamitos. I enjoyed the location of this hotel. It was in a commercial area with plenty of shopping and restaurants within walking distance. My only disappointment with the Hilton brand has been that I never receive the type of room that I book. I travel with my handicapped mother in law and in the last year I have booked 4 different rooms with Hilton.com and I have yet to be given the accessible room that I booked. It happened to me in Scottsdale, San Diego, Seattle and now Los Angeles. It has caused us a lot of frustration. I was told in San Diego that the room I booked was given to someone who had been in it the night before and decided to extend. How was that my fault? In
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments regarding your recent accommodations at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the cleanliness of our guest rooms and that we were able to find reasonable accommodations that would meet your family needs. We apologies that the room type reserved was not available on your arrival as we understand what kind of challenges that could bring. We hope we have the opportunity to have you back again soon when traveling to the area. A special congratulations to your son and new extended family from the Hampton Inn Cypress team.

Summary: This was our first time staying at this hotel. We had a total 7 rooms for a nearby soccer tournament. They were nice and helpful from the moment we called and asked about 100 questions before booking the rooms. Check in was fast and easy especially for a group.  All staff was very friendly and helpful..from the front desk staff..housekeeping...the staff that ran the breakfast in the morning (which was great and had many options).  The pool area was great...always clean and had towels. The all day coffee they provided was amazing and always full and fresh.  Parking was easy and there was an entrance no matter where you parked. Honestly I can't  even think of one bad thing to say and I'm not even really one to write a review but I really wanted to share how great our stay was. The
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to recognize our team at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate all the kind comments and I am excited to share your review with the rest of the staff. It's not always an easy task to house sport tournaments but we are always up for the challenge as we enjoy seeing the excitement on the kids faces to stay at a hotel with their teammates. We also enjoy chatting with the parents about how exhausted they are from a day on the field and how they are happy to back at the hotel. We are so glad to hear your group stay was a great one and hope your team did well. Look forward to having you back again soon.

Summary: Fast in and out, great location for me.  It is very close to my office and I stayed in the area for a morning seminar. I could not stay for the breakfast or even the to go bag they provide instead but I see the reviews on breakfast were good too
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write comments about your stay at Hampton Inn Cypress. Hope we can have you back again soon when business or pleasure brings you back to the area.

Summary: Although the pool was only 5ft at the deepest inenjoyed the pool for over 3 hours my self the morning before I left. Towels where available and there was a covinient dollar tree a few feet away for snacks and drinks
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about our pool area and so glad you were able to enjoy some relaxing time prior to your departure. We recently did some upgrades to make our pool a more inviting area, it's great to hear you were able to take some time to enjoy. Hope to have you back at the Hampton Inn Cypress next time your in the town.

Summary: The bathroom was a nice size. The room was nice and cozy. The breakfast hit the spot. The hotel is nice and secluded from the main rode. Lots of local restaurants near by. They offer free snacks to my kids which was a plus. It a plus that they save a sign in the bathroom that they offer free toiletries.  Will definitely be back.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that you had a pleasant visit with us on your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate you taking the time to share some comments and hope we will see you again soon when traveling to the area.

Summary: We've been using this hotel for better part of 6 years and have recommended it to family and friends. The rooms have always been clean and the bathroom clean and plenty of towels and bath accessories. The AC is not noisy like other chains. Carpet is clean to barefoot feel.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal guest of the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress when traveling to the Orange County/LA area and we appreciate the recommendation to family and friends when they come to the area. We are so glad to hear that you continue to have enjoyable visits when staying with us. Hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: We stayed here while dropping our daughter off at CSULB. Very happy with this hotel. Staff was very nice, the hotel was clean and modern, the pool area is nice, and the breakfast was good. The rooms were large and comfy. Many restaurants, etc, close by. We will definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share feedback about your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. Congratulations to your daughter and best wishes to a successful school year. We just completed some upgrades to our pool area so we are so glad you enjoyed your time by the pool. We hope to see you again and be your home away from home well visiting the area.

Summary: We stayed at this Hampton during the week.  When we arrived we were amazed at how beautiful this property was.  The lobby is updated with beautiful artwork, the restrooms are clean and our room was cleaned well everyday.  I left out jewelry, iPads etc. very well updated hotel.
Manager Response: We appreciate you choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress on your recent trip to the Orange County/LA area. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed our location, our housekeeping team does a fantastic job keeping up with the rooms and property. I look forward to sharing your review with them. Hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: This was a great Business hotel. it also caters to a very good family atmosphere for short weekend trip. The rate was good . the rooms were very clean & relaxing. The breakfast was great, specially with kids.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress and for taking the time to share your feedback. We are happy to hear you and your family had a comfortable stay with us. We hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: We have stayed here many times.  It has always been good.  We will surely stay again.  The staff was very friendly and the room was extremely comfortable.  I like that there are many outlets and places to charge phones etc in the rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the to share comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate you being a loyal guest when traveling to the area. We look forward to having you back again soon.

Summary: I love this hotel. It feels safe and clean and quaint. I will stay at this hotel every time I am in town. It's located near many shops and restaurants within walking distance. It's not too big and not too small. There is always parking available. My only concern is, there are not bathtubs, just showers. Some people might want that, or have a toddler they might need to bathe. Maybe some rooms have them. To me, that part didn't matter.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate you taking the time to share your review of your recent stay. All our king size rooms have standing showers and our 2 queen rooms have a tub/shower. We love that you love our hotel and hope we see you again soon.

Summary: Love this Hotel 's cleanliness, bed/pillows quality and spacious room size. Excellent service . I love the good quality of breakfast complimentary. Free Parking and Good Internet. Good location in Santa Ana. The hotel room looks much better than in the picture.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your visit with us and had time to join us for breakfast. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: Excellent Stay/SoCal Theme Parks and Anaheim
Summary: We had a wonderful stay at the Hampton Inn Los Angeles Orange County Cypress for 4 nights.  The hotel was very clean, parking was plentiful and the service was amazing.  We enjoyed the personal attention that Crystal and her staff provided to my family.  The location is a 15 minute drive to the Disneyland Toy Story Parking Lot...very easy via Katella Ave. There is no Disney shuttle from this hotel.  If you stay at one of the hotels closer to Disneyland, you have to pay to ride their shuttles (per person) so it actually was cheaper to pay to park the Disney lot ($20).    The pool was well kept and guest laundry made it easy to do a quick load ($3 per load).  The breakfast was well stocked even at 9:30am.  Within one block is a Target, Olive Garden, Super Mex.   I would return to
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your recent stay with us at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so happy that you and your family chose to stay with us for your Disneyland trip, we hope you had an amazing time at the parks. Thank you for taking the time to recognize Crystal and the staff for a job well done. I shared your review with the team at the mornings team huddle. We hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: Crystal is my favorite, she is the nicest most awsome employee there, you come to this hotel she'll make your day 1000√ó better, I wish every front desk person was like her. ‚ù§Ô∏èmost definitly coming back here in the near future
Manager Response: We also think Crystal is awesome! Thank you so much for taking the time to share comments about your recent stay and for recognizing our assistant front office manager Crystal. We can't wait to have you back at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress on your next visit to the area.

Summary: We were greeted with a warm friendly welcome and throughout our entire stay the staff were very attentive to all of our needs. Needless to say Crystal at the front desk was the kindest out of everyone. You'd think she'd have a halo above her head for how nice she is to not only us, but every guest that checks in and staff including old and new.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your comments as well as recognize our staff. Crystal is definitely a gem at the front desk and loves to treat everyone with special attention. Your comments lit up her day so thank you for your kind words and wonderful review. Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We generally stay at the Hampton Inn due to the quality of the breakfast, availability of coffee, comfort and peace. However, this particular stay was sub-par. We asked to be on the first floor because of the amount of luggage we needed to drag into the room so as not to leave it in the car overnight. We were placed in room 205 which, unbeknownst to us, was directly next to the kitchen, dining area, and laundry room. We were kept up late by families hanging out in the dining area playing games or such. We were then awoken before 5 to banging and clanging and could not rest after that. If we had been informed about the level of noise associated with that room, we would not have chosen to move our 4th floor room to the 1st floor. The breakfast was very low quality with powdered
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share feedback about your recent stay. We are so sorry to hear that you had a less than peaceful nights stay with us and were unable to enjoy breakfast. We definitely work hard at providing the best breakfast and atmosphere to our loyal guest, again I am so sorry to hear things weren't great. We hope we have another opportunity to have you back soon.

Summary: We booked this hotel as a last minute add-on when we extended our tip to Disneyland. Fortunately for us all the hotels closest to Disneyland were booked because of the D23 convention.  We usually look into Hampton hotels because of the breakfast and they typically have good reviews for cleanliness.  I travel with cleaning supplies and inspect my rooms from top to bottom for anything that should not be there.  This hotel was clean inside and out! It looks new or may have been recently renovated.  The rooms are large with very comfortable bedding.  The sheets were crisp and clean. The AC worked great. There were plenty of outlets and surfaces to place your bags if you chose not to place on the floor.  The bathroom was also spotless!  The breakfast area was large with a great
Manager Response: We are so happy to read your wonderful review of your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate all the feedback, we did complete our full renovation in January this year and our housekeeping team is doing an amazing job keeping things clean and looking great. So glad to hear you had time to join us for breakfast and were able to explore the local area on your way to Disneyland. I look forward to sharing your review with our team. We hope to have you back again soon on your next travels to the area.

Summary: Location was close to restaurants,  beaches and amusement parks. I like how everything is well kept through out the hotel. Free parking. Although breakfast needs to have a lot improvement. Overall I would stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share feedback about your resent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We hope you had a great time exploring all the local attractions. We hope to see you back again soon.

Summary: I love this hotel. By far one of the best experiences I have ever had. The complementary breakfast was awesome, and being able to access our room through a digital key made things hands free and easy. We were here for disney, and loved how close the hotel was, just a quick drive!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking time to share comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate the feedback about using digital key and are so happy to hear that you had an amazing stay with us. We look forward to having you back soon.

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay for Family!
Summary: Great Place to Stay for Family! The location is perfect near a business district, next to restaurants, pharmacy, and shopping centers! The hotel is clean and the staff were friendly and accommodating!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so happy to hear that our place was perfect for you needs. Hope to see you again.

Summary: Great stay! Friendly employees... great customer service! Undoubtedly a grat hotel and highly recommended!  Away from the busy areas... but close enough for easy access to fun activities! Our housekeeper was a great and very friendly individual!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to send a shout out and recognize our wonderful staff, we are so glad to hear that you had great interaction with our housekeeper as well. We appreciate the recommendation and looking forward to seeing you again at the Hampton Inn Cypress on your next visit to the area.

Summary: My wife and I stayed here while visiting family.  It's kind of tucked back behind a strip mall off of Katella and Knott.  It had a very newly built hotel feel.  We love staying at Hampton's and this one is one of the best that I've stayed at.  Upon check in, we had an issue with a very loud neighbor.  We were only in the room for about 5 minutes and decided to call down to the front desk and ask to change rooms.  The attendant was very helpful and accommodating.  Our new room was roomy, comfortabe and well appointed.   The complimentary breakfast had many choices, both hot and cold, and was well maintained during the breakfast hours.  All in all a great stay for us.  We'll be back for sure.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us on your recent trip to the Hampton Inn Cypress. Glad that we were able to get you situated in a comfortable quite room and we appreciate you letting us know so we could help. We did recently remodel and we are also loving the new look. Can't wait to have you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: Great stay and value for Disneyland trip
Summary: Stayed here on a last minute trip to happiest place on earth, about a 15 minute drive to Disneyland but so worth the drive. Hampton's don't usually disappoint and saved our feet my driving to the park over walking to a hotel that might have been over priced and no where in comparison to this hotel. Staff was very friendly, our room nice a clean and complimentary breakfast off the hook. The Asian in my was super excited to see miso soup and steamed rice as a breakfast option, yeah don't laugh till you try it. The family has already looked into visits for the future since it was such a pleasant surprise. Not to mention although the restaurant around the area close earlier than the Disneyland area the food is a better value and taste so much better. Highly recommend and can't wait
Manager Response: Thank you for all your wonderful comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so happy to hear all your awesome feedback we appreciate you sharing. We are so glad that you enjoyed our breakfast buffet and our Asian breakfast option as well. We look forward to having you back again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Very busy hotel, many unsupervised children who were running and yelling - probably not a good weekend for non-family stay.  Its proximity to Disneyland probably accounted for the full  house.  Usually we encounter more business type stays.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with during your holiday trip to Disneyland. We hope you enjoyed the amazing fire work show they do for the 4th. We hope to have you back at the Hampton Inn Cypress on your next visit to the area.

Summary: I've been to a lot of Hampton Inns and the Hampton Inn Los Angeles / Orange County / Cypress is one of the best!  The folks at the desk were great.  This is Top notch hotel!  Thanks to the staff for making our stay excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to recognize our awesome staff. They do an amazing job making sure everyone feels welcomed. We are so happy to hear that we made your best hotel list at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We can't wait to have you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary: I liked this hotel a lot. Very spacious, very clean. Breakfast area is undoubtedly far better than many hotels at that price. Quality of breakfast was great. Lot of parking space. Location is great and close to airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so glad to hear your enjoyed your stay and our breakfast buffet. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: We stayed here to be close to Disney and it was a straight shot. About 15 minutes away. Staff was fabulous rooms very clean. The only thing was no microwave in the room and no closet. But I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress on your recent Disneyland trip. We are so happy to hear that our staff was accommodating. For future reference we do have microwaves available in our breakfast area and in our gift shop, also behind the tall mirror is a closet. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: I stayed here with my daughter, before taking her to her freshman orientation at Cal State University Long Beach. We had a great experience. The Staff was amazing- they were very attentive, professional, and welcoming. The hotel was very clean as were the rooms. I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments regarding your visit to the Hampton Inn Cypress. Congratulations to your daughter on her first year of college. We are glad to hear that our staff took care of your needs, we have some great front desk clerks.  Thanks so much for the recommendation! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: All hotels should be like this!!!
Summary: Stayed here after a long day at Universal Studios. (Wish i would had booked here for my pre-cruise stay too!) This place is fantastic! Free breakfast, free parking, clean and spacious rooms! They have the best coffee too!   Comfy beds and pillows. Mini fridge in room. Clean, modern room and decor. Not sure if it was recently renovated, but it was nice!   The lobby, the halls, the rooms...all very nice! Prepaid $113 per night! Such a deal!   Next time I'm in the Anaheim/OC area, this will be my #1 choice! It's not far from Knott's Berry Farm, plus it's a 15-20 minute drive away from Disneyland...but, i like staying at hotels a tad away from the tourist crowds. Very quiet too!   Next to a Target too!   I'm impressed! Love this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your awesome comments about your most recent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so glad that you selected our hotel for your trip to the Southern California theme parks. I hope you had lots of fun, and enjoyed Harry Potter land at Universal Studios I heard its amazing. We are so glad to hear that our hotel was able to provide the amenities  to meet your needs and you enjoyed our newly remodeled guest rooms. We hope to have you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Nice and clean hotel in a good location
Summary: The hotel was super clean and the staff were all very organized and friendly. The room was really clean and nice upon arrival.The location is good. I felt like it was in a safe area and I wasn't nervous about walking into the hotel late at night. It is about a 15 minute drive from disneyland so it was a bit more of a drive than we thought but the price made up for it.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. Thank you for all the wonderful comments, I can't wait to share them with the team. We are so happy that you enjoyed your visit and hope to have you back soon.

Summary: My husband and I stayed at this Hampton Inn on June June 16th.  We did not make advance reservations but we were treated as though we were their most valued customers. The price was very good for the area and the room was beautiful: generous sized bathroom, lovely bedroom with all the amenities, and very pleasant, accommodating hotel staff.  The breakfast was TO DIE FOR!  The area where the the Inn is located is lovely and safe.  If you are in this area, don't stay anywhere else!
Manager Response: We appreciate all your kind comments about your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so happy that you were welcomed with open arms from amazing front desk staff and you enjoyed the amenities that the hotel had to offer. We hope we see you again soon when traveling back to the area.

Summary: This was our third stay in as many years at this location. There have been a number of upgrades completed since last year (paint, wallpaper, carpet, furnishings) making a nice Hampton even nicer. Comfy beds in an oversized room worthy of a multiple night stay. What little interaction we had with front desk staff was friendly and professional. See you next June.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a loyal guest of the Hampton Inn Cypress when traveling to the area. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed seeing the changes since your last visit to the property. We really enjoyed the transformation ourselves and love that our return guest our loving the changes. We are excited to hear that you will be back again next June, we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Clean room and very spacious, specially the bathroom. Quiet at night whiche is great and sometimes not common in many hotels. Staff was always friendly and there when you needed them. Breakfast was standard with the usual complementary items.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear we were able to provide you with a quiet place to rest on your recent visit to the Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback and hope to have you back again soon.

Summary Heading: An Oasis and Great Value in a High Priced Area
Summary: We used TripAdviser to select our lodging and picked based on proximity to our location and tripAdviser Rating, this Hotel is a Gem, I would highly recommend staying here. The breakfast is phenomenal and the Gals at the Front Desk were FUN. The room and overall ambiance is gorgeous, if you need a good night's rest and a delicious start to your day, this is your hotel !!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. new are so pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable visit and liked the wonderful upgrades recently completed at the hotel. We appreciate the recommendation and I look forward to sharing your comments with our amazing front desk team. Hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: Did a one night stay while in the area for a family trip.  Very nice location in an industrial park area with nothing but buildings around.  That made for no road noise or traffic passing by the hotel. Hotel was a short walk to a Target, shops, and a few restaurants. Check in was quick and easy,  and the gentleman at the front desk was personable and friendly. Got to the room and saw that I was given a single king bed instead of two queens which I had reserved. Two adults and three kids were definitely not going to be able to squeeze into one bed.  Went back to the front desk and I was told that 3rd party bookings do not always reserve the bed type, only the room. That was my first time hearing that,  and had never had a problem booking through Travelocity, expedia, or any other
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share feedback on your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are glad to hear that we were able to make accommodations work for you and your family. We hope you enjoyed the area and can't wait to have you back again soon.

Summary: Al principio pense que la ubicacion del hotel nos iba a cusar problemas de logistica para nuestro viaje. pero al llegar observe que seria todo lo contrario. Realizamos nuestro viaje de negocios con mucha agilidad y dentro de los tiempos.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments and rate your recent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so happy to hear that the hotel worked out well with your local business needs. We hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: This facility is very nice and with smart room accomodations.  Beds are comfortable and rooms are well air conditioned.  My family loved it!!  It accomodated 4 of us and our luggage very well.  Also, had a good selection of cable channels.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you had a wonderful stay and you and your family were able to rest comfortably on your recent visit to the property. We look forward to having you back at the Hampton Inn Cypress on your visit to the area.

Summary: Center of everything and best value are the reason why I stayed there and I it was not one bit disappointed. 2 time stayed. I would highly go again and recommend to anyone. The only thing need improvement are  variety of food selection and free internet keep cutting off.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to complete a review of your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so happy to hear that you are a return guest, we appreciate your loyalty when traveling to the area. We look forward to having you back again soon.

Summary: Hotel was easy to find, had shopping and restaurants nearby and was accessible to Disney. The staff were very welcoming and fun. Lots of charging stations for our devices and neat wheeled ottomans for our suitcases. Nothing disappointed us. Weekend travelers will enjoy lower prices.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress for your recent Disneyland Trip. We hope you had an amazing time at the park and visiting the local area the weather has been great for a day at Disneyland. Can't wait to have you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary: The Hampton in Cypress staff was friendly, helpful and attentive.  The room was clean and well laid out.  The bed was very comfortable and the bath room shower was huge.  The room was quiet making it easier to sleep.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing the Hampton Inn Cypress for your recent stay. We appreciate you sharing comments and taking the time to recognize the amazing staff. I can't wait to share your feedback with them. We hope to have you back soon.

Summary: This Hampton location is no different than other Hampton Hotels I have stayed.  They were all spotless and very clean.  The pillows and sheets were fresh and you can smell it.  Bathroom was very clean and neat.  The breakfast was great as always.  Many items to pick from and the coffee was hot.  The staff working during the breakfast made sure tables were cleaned and the floor swept when needed and all food items stocked promptly.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear we were able to provide you with a spotless stay on your recent visit to the Hampton Inn Cypress. Great to hear that you had time to join us for our breakfast buffet, and you enjoyed the comfort of our newly remodeled rooms. We look forward to see you again soon.

Summary: New looking, Clean, Neat, Attractive, Comfortable, Courteous Staff, I could go on. If you are needing a place to stay in Cypress, CA area for a day or an extended stay you would do well to consider this hotel. Wow, did I ever enjoy my stay.
Manager Response: Hello from the Hampton Inn Cypress! We appreciate you taking the time to share your wonderful comments about your recent stay with us. We are so glad that we met all your needs and hope to have you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Hampton Inn, Orange County, Cypress, CA
Summary: We have stayed at this hotel before and really liked it, however, this time the room was very dated.  Towel service was odd, we only had one towel each.  Housekeeping didn't show up to make up the room until 4 pm on Monday, probably getting ready for the new guests, too bad for existing guests.  All around I was very disappointed in the stay this time, probably won't stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your stay. Sorry to hear that you did not have the best experience on this visit. We do our best to turn around all the rooms in a timely manner to accommodate all our guest needs. We appreicate the feedback as we always want to do better. We hope we have the opportunity to have you back again in the future.

Summary: Great new property . Live the clean , new design , bathroom is great size ave a standing shower . 20 min drive to beach and South Coast plaza . Seal beach is also close by . This property is in a business center
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton. We hope you enjoyed yourself exploring the local area. What a great time to enjoy the beach hope you had lots of fun in the sun. Hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: This is our second stay at this hotel. Comfortable, QUIET, easy to get to, staff is very friendly. Not too far from the parks. The Habit burger joint is just a short way down the road - delicious food. Shopping isn't too far either. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you had an enjoyable experience during your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate you being a loyal guest when traveling to the area. We look forward for your next visit.

Summary: I attended a conference nearby and was put into this hotel by the conference host.  Although it was not my choice, it perfectly fit my need during the stay.  The room was really clean and well maintained and organized.  The only regret I had was that there were no actual drawers for me to put my clothes.  The bathroom was nice as well.  But the shower head needs to be replaced because it was too hard to switch between modes.  Breakfast was good including hot and continental menus.  The attendants frequently filled empty dishes working diligently.  The seating area felt a little small though.  The hotel front was also nice and kind.  For internet connection, they preferred Hilton Honors members. If you're not a Hilton member, it might be hard to use internet unless paying extra.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are very happy to hear that we were able to provide a clean space to rest well traveling for your conference. We appreciate the recommendation and I look forward to sharing your survey with our team. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel dozens of times.  On this occasion I was greeted by name by the desk clerk--that just doesn't happen too often these days even though I have stayed in other hotels numerous times as well.  The rooms have been redecorated and are very nice.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your recent stay. Thank you for being a loyal guest when traveling to the area. So glad to hear our amazing front desk recognized you as a return guest and that you enjoyed our remodeled rooms. We hope to have you back soon.

Summary: If you looking to get a good night rest, I suggest you bring a blow up mattress or mattress topper.  Beds are extremely rigid.  Location is decent and there are plenty of restaurants closeby and a Target next door to the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. I am so sorry to hear that our new mattresses did not suit your comfort. We hope to have another opportunity to have you back in the future when traveling to the area.

Summary: For the price this place is a good place to stay. Came with family over the weekend to visit Disneyland and this was a good choice.  Dind't see or hear any construction as some reviews I read pointed out. The drive to Disney is about 15-20, not to bad. Also, there's places to eat around and shops, if needed. Updated hotel with clean room, free breakfast and free parking, what else you need? I will definitely consider staying here next time I come again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing comments regarding your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We hope you had lots of fun visiting Disneyland on your trip and spending time with family. Great to hear you had time to join us for breakfast during your stay. We look forward to your next visit. See you soon!

Summary: Extremely friendly staff and super clean facility. We had things to do in Seal beach and this location was an easy commute Friday- Sunday. There are good food choices close by and the staff at the Hampton are very helpful. I reccommend the Hampton.
Manager Response: We appreciate your recommendation!! It's so great to hear that you had a nice stay with us and that our awesome staff took care of your needs. We hope to have the opportunity to see you soon at the Hampton Inn Cypress.

Summary: Rooms were very spacious, hotel staff was extremely helpful and accommodating and breakfast was great.  We were very early for our check in and they gave us a room right away which was so helpful.  Great place for a family to stay!
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments regarding your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are happy to accommodate early check in if we have the availability, it's great to hear this made things easier for your first day with us. Hope to have you back soon when traveling back to the area.

Summary: This hotel has all you will need. From the friendly service at check in to the "have a nice day" or "Have a great night" when you come and go to the fantastic breakfast and great accommodations. You won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your wonderful comments about your recent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so happy to hear it went well on your visit to Cypress and we look forward to having you back.

Summary: Friendly staff, Clean Room with great bed. shopping and restaurants in walking distance. and the hot breakfast was delicious. the pool was fully stocked with towels. overall I enjoyed my stay and would come back again.
Manager Response: We are very pleased to hear that you had a pleasant stay on your recent visit to the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We have recently replaced all our mattresses and we are happy to hear you were able to get a good rest and enjoyed our outdoor pool. We look forward to your next visit when traveling back to the area.

Summary: excellent customer service upon arrival. our roon was nice and clean room very spacious, housekeeping does a very good job in keeping the whole facility neat and clean. hotel is hidden but the area over the weekend is great no traffic coming in and out of area.. its located around industrial buisnesses over weekend the offices are closes. nearby shopping centers and resturants. would return again, Highly recommend for families with children complementary breakfast is good nice lay out
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing comments about your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so happy to hear that you and your family had a great visit with us and had time to join us for breakfast. We truly appreciate the recommendation and look forward to seeing you again when traveling back to the area. I can't wait to share your comments with my team I know they will also appreciate the Love.

Summary: A little high priced for the area.  Has a few restaurants close by.  Not easy to see from the street.  Staff was friendly & helpful.  Was told that they recently renovated the hotel but really could not tell.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share comments about your stay. We are happy to hear you had great interactions with the staff and we hope to have you back soon on your next trip to the area.

Summary: Nice and clean Hampton Inn.  The staff was friendly and pleasant.  The room was pretty large and spacious.  The location was off the main road and close to the event we travelled to.  We might try this hotel on the next Disneyland visit, since it is not that far away.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay with us, our housekeeping team works hard to keep our rooms fresh for each guest arriving. We look forward to having you back for your Disneyland trip, see you soon.

Summary Heading: Nice staffs, Clean and comfortable stay
Summary: Stay in this hotel few times for business purpose. Staff are nice and helpful especially one gal named Crystal! Room is spacious and comfortable. Breakfast is so so just ok, not much choice of hot food.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your stay and thank you for being a loyal guest when traveling in for business. Crystal does an amazing job at the front desk and I am so happy to share your comments with her. Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We had stayed here before and enjoyed the our stay. Not so much this time. Very noisy neighbors. The front entry was being rebuilt, so parking was messy. Luck of the draw I suppose, but didn't get much sleep and didn't enjoy our stay nearly as much as before.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share feedback on your stay. We are very sorry that you were inconvenienced due to the main entrance being closed off. We are working hard to make improvements to enhance the overall appearance of our hotel and we hope we have another opportunity to have you back on your future visits to the area.

Summary: I stayed here one night using points before a flight home out of Long Beach.  It was convenient and comfortable.  I slept well on the comfortable bed.  The hotel shows a little wear and tear, but it seems well maintained and the room was clean.  No complaints, I would stay here again if in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Glad to hear your were able to get a comfortable nights sleep with us prior to your flight. We hope we have the opportunity to see you again soon on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Flawless stay.  I highly recommend it to others.  Good central location south of Los Angeles.    Hotel staff/front desk was very helpful on my arrival and check in.  Enjoyed the morning breakfast buffet.  Hotel room was very clean, and the central heating/cooling worked very efficiently.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so pleased to hear you had an enjoyable visit with us. We appreciate you taking the time to recognize our awesome staff. Hope to have you back soon.

Summary Heading: Room's good for a quick stay (and not swimming).
Summary: The pool wasn't that great, it looks nice and it is okay for like thirty minutes or so but it isn't comfortable because there's some green stuff that I don't want to touch. And it's so cold! Brr! Also, the elevators smell so bad of this stinky laundry thingy. But the room isn't that bad, it's decent.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback regarding your resent visit. We are sorry to hear you did not enjoy your time at the pool. Wish we had the opportunity to turn things around prior to your check out. Hope we have another chance to have you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary: We found the Hampton Inn Cypress after pricing in downtown Long Beach hotels kept increasing during Grand Prix Weekend. Cypress is a short drive from Long Beach and the Hampton Inn here is more competitively priced. We have always had a nice room and the hotel is quiet and away from traffic.    Our most recent visit was on a weekend with a lot of high school age kids in the hotel for an athletic event of some type. The front desk manager, Nicole, did a good job of setting expectations for the kids about the need for quiet for the other guests.  She even remembered our checking in when all the kids came back in from their activity and she asked us the next morning if the quiet level was acceptable and we assured her it was and thanked her.    A good choice if you are in the area
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your resent visit to the Hampton Inn Cypress and thank you for being a loyal guest when traveling to the area. We love having our groups stay with us and we know some of the kids can be very excited to be traveling with their teammates. We do our best to work with the group leaders to keep the groups and all our other guest happy. Sounds like Nicole was doing her best at ensuring everyone had a great visit with us. We hope you enjoyed your time at Long Beach Grand Prix its always a fun time. Hope to see you again soon. Can't wait to share your comments with Nicole.

Summary Heading: Great value and stay for the $$
Summary: The staff and facilities were excellent.  All my issues were promptly taken care of and alleviated quickly.  I would definitely recommend staying here when in the south LA/north Long Beach area.  Close proximity to the PCH and access to San Diego while enjoying the beautiful weather of southern Cali without all the smog of the big city.
Manager Response: We appreciate your resent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton and for your recommendation. So pleased to hear that all your needs and issues were resolved in a prompt manner and our amazing staff took care of your needs. You right! The weather has been beautiful so glad you were able to enjoy it with us. We sincerely hope to have you back soon on your next visit to So Cal.

Summary: 15min from Disney but well worth the short drive, breakfast was great, we stayed 4 days and each day they had something different  and the overall Hampton experience you'd expect. Price was 125 a night.
Manager Response: We appreciate your resent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Thank you for sharing comments about your stay. Wonderful to hear you had time to join us for our breakfast buffet. Hope Disneyland was lots of fun, the weather has been great for days at the park. Hope to have you back soon.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for Disneyland or Otherwise
Summary: This hotel is just around 10 minutes away from Disneyland, making it a great choice if that is your destination. Crystal at the front desk was exceptional in checking us in speedily and with such friendliness. When my honors amenities were not in the room, she remedied this with grace!  The hotel is extremely clean, the lobby is well-kept, and the breakfast area is divine and comfortable. The rooms themselves were also clean and had everything you'd need for a safe and comfortable stay.   I would highly recommend this property if you have business or leisure to do in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your resent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress and taking the time to share feedback about your stay with us. We appreciate you taking the time to recognizing Crystal, she does an amazing job making our guest feel welcome and is one of our front desk stars. We hope you had an amazing time visiting Disneyland and we know you have a lot of hotel options when traveling to the park thank you for making us your hotel of choice. We appreciate the recommendation and hope to have you back soon.

Summary: quiet, clean.  love the round the clock coffee & tea- The fitness room could be better; some of the balls were deflated.  but other wise good,  located close to restaurants, convenience stores, and Target.  all walking distance. Bed was terrific...so comfortable -Thanks
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to comment about your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Great to hear you enjoyed the local area and our coffee bar. Hope to have you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Great hotel for Anaheim area.  you are 6 miles from the convention  area and approach the area against the flow.  Works out great.   I will stay again.  Lots of restaurants and and FED EX are nearby.   Staff was great and welcoming, I would repeat when in the area.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to complete a review of your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We hope you had a great visit with us and enjoyed the local area. We appreciate hearing that you will be back to stay with us when traveling to the area. Can't wait to have you back.

Summary Heading: Everything you need they have it!
Summary: Excellent customer service & comfy bed!!  Quiet area and so nice to be away from the hectic traffic of the highways, freeways and byways!  Will highly recommend to others especially those wanting to be close to the beaches for a reasonable price!!  Bang for your buck!  Worth every cent!  Pool is great and so is the breakfast!!  Housekeeping is great also!!  So attentive to detail!  Thank you for making our family stay pleasant!!
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you and your family had a wonderful stay with us on your recent trip. So glad to hear you were able to visit our pool and enjoyed our breakfast buffet. We appreciate the recommendation and can't wait to have you back at the Hampton Inn Cypress on your next trip to the area.

Summary: Friendly staff, good location. Shopping/food available nearby. Disgusting breakfast options at buffet. Pool unavailable for the portion of our stay that we would have had time yo use it. Front desk staff very warm and friendly. A bit stingy on the towels!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your stay. Sorry for the inconvenience of the pool closure, our pool filter went down and we needed to close it for repairs and to avoid any health concerns. We hope to see you again soon when traveling back to the area.

Summary: I went a little out of my way because this hotel was $50-100 cheaper than most choices closer to Los Angeles. The location would be quite convenient for visitors to Disneyland or Knott's Berry Farm.   Like virtually all Hamptons, this one was solid in the stuff that really matters: immaculate room and a very comfortable bed. The location, set off a block from a busy street, seemed quiet; the hotel itself certainly was. Check-in and check-out were quick and courteous.  I neglected to ask about my room's particular features. Mine did not have a microwave. No big deal on this trip, but if you like to heat up things in the room, ask at the desk.   This inn's breakfast came up a little short by Hampton standards, I thought. The sausage patties had a greasy, pre-cooked taste. There
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your recent stay. I am very sorry to hear your stay was less than perfect on this visit. Our hotel rooms are newly renovated and we are not currently offering microwaves but we have one available for 24 hour use in our breakfast area and soon in our market. Glad to hear you enjoyed our coffee bar and our local area. We hope to have you back soon.

Summary: My daughter has many softball games in This area of So. Cal and this is my favorite overnight stay.  Clean, Quiet, and safe and although it is not a bargain it is reasonable.  Would recommend to families or business travelers.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. Thank you for being a loyal guest when traveling to the area. Hope your softball tournament went well and you were able to take home the win. We have a lot of fun when the teams come in seeing the excitement on their faces. Hope to have you back soon.

Summary: Close to great spots like Olive Garden, Starbucks, target, dollartree, etc.  great for families on the go, especially if it's a driving trip as they have a laundry facility for a quick upkeep of clothes and a water slide for the kids and a complimentary breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your recent stay. It's great to hear you were able to join us for breakfast and enjoyed the local area shopping and dinning options. We hope to have you and the family back soon.

Summary: This hotel is very convenient.  I can access multiple locations, there is every type of shopping in a short distance. Now, one of my favorite locations.  And, Coffee 24/7.  I  do not really eat their food, but there is so much good food nearby, who cares.
Manager Response: Thank you for making us one of your favorite locations. So glad to here you enjoyed the local eateries and our 24 hour coffee bar. We can't wait to have you back at the Hampton Inn Cypress on your next visit to the area.

Summary: This Hotel has a very friendly and personable staff. The property is newly renovated and rooms come equipped with a fridge, and has also includes a complimentary hot breakfast that is served daily from 6am -10am.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your recent stay. We appreciate you recognizing our amazing staff. So glad to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast buffet and our newly remodeled rooms. Hope to have you back soon.

Summary: Excelent service, very clean room and very good size of the rooms. I would stay in this hotel in my next trip to Cypress. I love the extra attention from the staff helping me even hours after my check out.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your recent trip to Cypress. Great to hear we were able to take care of your needs and proved a clean room to rest in. We look forward for your next visit at the Hampton Inn Cypress. See you soon.

Summary: I stayed again for a week, unfortunately the weather didn't really cooperate...Hardly the hotels fault! I love the new room renovations, very comfortable and up to date. Right next to the bed there are lots of USB and plugs for all of your devices. Same with the desk, lots of plugs and USB ports. With the online checkin and digital key, you can bypass checkin completely and go directly to your room..Love that! Staff as always is very friendly. See you again next year! The only reason why I don't give it a 5 is because I don't give 5's or 1's although they definitely get a 4 1/2.  P.S. Get some current photos of those beautiful rooms on your website.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal guest when traveling to the Cypress area. So glad to hear you were comfortable in our newly remodeled rooms. Thank you for using digital key, great to hear that you utilized it during your stay, its a great feature. See you on your next visit.

Summary: Loved our stay! Thanks, Carlos front desk for being so good to us. Gave me and my family the perfect room. Food was amazing and the Spanish lady I forgot her name helped my wife and my son with their foods! Amazing stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Thank you for taking the time to recognize Carlos he does great work in the evening welcoming our guest. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast buffet. Hope to have you back soon on your next trip to the area.

Summary: We stay here most often when we are visiting family. Our daughter lives in Lakewood and this is convenient to her home and her daughter's school when we come to attend school functions. The price is right and this hotel is always clean, comfortable and the staff is very friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your recent visit and thank you for being a loyal guest of the Hampton Inn Cypress when visiting your family. We are so happy to hear that you enjoy staying with us and can't wait to have you back.

Summary: We truly love the location. Carlos our front desk personnel who greeted us and gave us our room was very nice. He even updated us on the proximity to things we needed. We love the room as well. We definitely will come back here. It was close to Disneyland where we went.
Manager Response: We are so glad to hear you had an amazing stay with us and we hope you had lots of fun on your trip to Dinseyland. Carlos does an outstanding job during the evening hours taking care of things, glad to hear he was able to meet your request needs. We can't wait to have you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: Great Stay at the Hampton Inn
Summary: The staff are awesome and the hotel is super clean. The free breakfast is great with a huge selection. I have stayed here twice and loved it both times. It is very close to Knotts Berry Farm and Disneyland. For the price, there is no where better. I have nothing but great things to say about this location. Perfect for a family stay or if on business. Will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal guest of the Hampton Inn Cypress on your recent travels to the area. We appreciate you taking the time recognize our awesome staff they work hard to make sure our guest are enjoying their stay. So great to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast buffet. Hope you had fun visiting Knott's berry farm and we hope to have you back soon.

Summary: Perhaps the one of the best hotels in Orange County. Superb renovations (recent) and fabulous, friendly staff that seem to go out of their way for guests... Bed is the most comfy for any hotel I've ever stayed in. Description: soft and plush . Crystal was very pleasant and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your recent trip to the Cypress area. We are excited to hear that you had an enjoyable stay and loved the renovated rooms. Thank you for recognizing our amazing staff and Crystal is a star at our front desk we are glad she was able to take care of you. We hope to have you back soon at the Hampton Inn Cypress.

Summary: Very pleased with the quality and location of this Hampton.  It has just been remodeled and is essentially a brand new hotel.  Great price for LA. Convenient location.  I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank your for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress on your recent trip to Orange County/Los Angeles. We appreciate you taking the time to share some comments about your visit and we look forward to having you back soon.

Summary: We stayed in this hotel last April because of it's great location and were impressed enough to book it again when planning a trip this February. We appreciated the ample free parking, quick commute to Disneyland, proximity to downtown Anaheim and the beaches (20-30 mins away from each), and we especially loved being able to walk across the parking lot to Target, Dollar Tree, Starbucks, and several other stores and many dining options. Also, a big change we noticed at the hotel from last year was new carpets, paint, art, and decor in the rooms--very clean and modern. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The breakfast buffet was average--but we can't complain because it was free (a huge bonus that you don't get at hotels closer to Disneyland)! We would definitely recommend
Manager Response: We appreciate you being a return guest at the Hampton Inn Cypress and we're glad to hear that you enjoyed seeing the remodel from your last visit. Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your stay with us. We hope you enjoyed your time at Disneyland and we hope to see you again on your next trip to the area. Thank you again for being a loyal guest and recommending us. See you soon.

Summary: This hotel wasn't great! We had a wonderful stay. Rooms were really nice. Front desk was excellent. Breakfast was good also. Parking was easy and beds were good. We will definitely come back to stay again. It was close to target and habit burger. Lots ignorant food places to eat and close to Disney!
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. I am so glad to hear that you had a perfect stay with us and had the opportunity to join us for breakfast. Hope you enjoyed Disneyland and visiting the local eatery's while staying with us. We look forward to having you back again soon.

Summary: Very good hotel! Clean and Safe! Short drive to Disney Parks. I would book again. Hilton is our preferred hotel brand, because they stand behind their service guarantee. Low cost food and shopping options in the area.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We hope you had a wonderful time visiting Disneyland while you were here. Please come back and visit us again soon.

Summary: This hotel is in a great location - 20 minutes from Long Beach and 20 minutes from Disneyland.  It is surrounded by restaurants, stores, fast food and other services.  The remodeled room with new king beds are great for sleeping.  The staff was very helpful with our early departure and we were giving some snacks to take with us.
Manager Response: We appreciate hearing from you regarding your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. It's wonderful to hear that you had an enjoyable visit with us and visiting the local area. We hope you had the best time visiting Disneyland and hope to have you back soon. Thank you for taking the time to recognize the staff as well, see you soon.

Summary: Everything was great including breakfast, pool and sack lunch/snack to take to work! Perfect location for my work and parking was well lit for security. People were friendly and helpful. Loved the snack section where you can purchase snacks and drinks 24 hours!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress on your recent business trip. We are so glad that you had the opportunity to join us for breakfast and enjoyed our breakfast to go sacks. We just remodeled our suite shop and we also love the new space too. Hope to see you back soon on your next visit to Cypress.

Summary: Staff/service was great, location was okay, but everything else was far from exemplary.   Bedding cleanliness was questionable, and the light and sound from adjacent rooms was unbearable.   Bedding and pillows were uncomfortable so any sleep had was subpar.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback on your recent stay. It's great to hear that you had positive interactions with our team. We are so sorry to hear you did not have a restful visit with us. We hope we have the opportunity to have you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: Great find, close to the concert venue we were attending.
Summary: This hotel was 7 miles away from Cerritos Performing Arts Center, an awesome venue where we were attending a concert.  The hotel was in a quiet area and looks well-suited for business travelers. The desk attendant was very personable. The room was spacious, clean, and the bed was comfortable as is the norm for Hampton Inns.  If we travel to this area again, we will definitely stay at this Hampton again.  It was even better because we were able to use Hilton Honors points!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us on your recent trip to the area. We hope you had an amazing time at the Cerritos Preforming Arts Center, its a beautiful locations. Thank you for being a loyal Hilton honors member we know you had to stay often to redeem those points and we appreciate you choosing the Hampton Inn Cypress. Hope to have you back soon.

Summary: I have stayed at this Hampton before and appreciate the value offered. This location gives me everything that I look for in this level of hotel. I stay at Hampton's across the US on a regular basis and have had no negative experiences. This location is as good if not better than any other Hampton I have stayed. High recommendation from me.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal Hampton Inn Cypress guest when traveling to the area. We appreciate your awesome comments and are happy to hear that we provide everything you need when staying with us. We look forward to having you back on your next trip to the area.

Summary: The entire property looked new and was beautiful. Room was spacious and had everything we needed. Breakfast was good and always stocked. Loved that Starbucks was walking distance from the hotel. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We hear delighted you had a wonderful visit with us and enjoyed our newly remodeled guest rooms. It's also great to hear that you found time to join us for breakfast and found everything you needed. Hope you come back and stay with us soon.

Summary: The Cypress Hampton Inn is centrally located in Orange County and slightly off the main streets so offering solitude. Facilities are of the highest efficiency and very good for business trips and personal vacationing.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you had an enjoyable stay well visiting the Hampton Inn Cypress. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Hope to have you back soon.

Summary: I called to make sure I could stay on same room for my 2 nights stay(separate reservations, the agent who answered was very polite, she mention it could be done. Upon check in(arrived late with my sleepy kiddos on arms and my 10 year old zombie) it was confirmed to stay on same room, but not only that, the agent(I forget his name) went above and beyond by combining on same reservation and assigning the same room AND acknowledging my daughter by answering all her questions and also mentioning all of our Hilton honors benefits-honestly my daughter felt like a VIP when he mentioned them. Love to feel welcome that way and also welcomed by the pristine room. Our room, a few rooms away from elevator, was very quiet -no connecting door neither!
Manager Response: Thank you for your awesome review of the Hampton Inn Cypress. I am so happy hear that you and your little ones had a great stay and great interaction with our front desk team. We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback and we hope to have you back on your next visit to the area. Thank you for being a loyal Hilton Honors member see you soon!

Summary: It's a Hampton so you know. It's clean and inexpensive but, nothing fancy. Anyway there is a Curry House 50 feet away and it's good, there is a BevMo near by, and a Target in case you forgot the toothpaste (but you can always ask the front desk for toothpaste). It's in another one of SoCal's many soulless suburban waste lands so don't expect anything more than a 10 min drive to a freeway to then drive another 30 min to get nowhere interesting or do anything that is meaningful. There are a lot of Japanese business people who stay here so if you speak Japanese you might make a new friend.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay, we appreciate you taking the time to share feedback about your visit to the area. Hope to have you back soon.

Summary: The good: clean, sizable rooms and bathrooms, good AC unit, walking distance to a variety of restaurants and Target. The service is good The bad: Lots of construction, I can hear others in their rooms and above me I constantly heard stomping of feet and other sounds. One day they forgot to replace my towels.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share feedback about your visit. We are pleased to hear that you were satisfied with your room amenities and enjoyed the local area eatery's. Our remodel is wrapping up, we are sorry to hear that you were disturbed by noise as we did our best to keep it at a minimum. We hope we have the opportunity to share our newly remodeled hotel with you when traveling back to the area.

Summary: nobody warned us of the remodeling going on our floor we stayed 4 nights. the accomidations were horrible. it smelled like paint, two of the nights they didn't clean our room and  the hammering was so disturbing.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share feedback on your stay. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you experienced due to the upgrades to the hotel. We want all our guest to feel at home and to have an enjoyable and restful visit when staying with us. We understand during remodeling it may sometimes has a negative effect before seeing the beautiful end result and we are sorry your stay was effected. We hope we have another opportunity to have you back with us on your next trip to the area.

Summary: The rooms were newly renovated , the hotel was extremely clean. The staff was so nice . Location was great right next to shopping and eating places and it was such a reasonable price . I can't wait to stay here again !
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share feedback on your recent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Great to here you had a wonderful stay with us and enjoyed our newly remodeled rooms. Can't wait to have you back with us on your next visit to the area. Thank you for being a loyal Hampton Inn Cypress guest.

Summary: The toilet was not cleaned, although the toilet paper was folded as if it was cleaned.  In my case it was obviously dirty since it wasn't flushed. But I may have not noticed otherwise and this made me wonder if they actually clean the toilet after each departure.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your recent stay. I am very sorry to hear about your cleanliness concerns this is definitely something we will be addressing as we want to ensure all our guest are satisfied and provided a fresh room at every check in. We hope we have the opportunity to have you back on your next trip to the area.

Summary: I was able to reserve the room online without any problems. Excellent customer service. I had to wait about 15 minutes to check in because the room wasn't ready at 3pm. However, there was a big lobby with a TV that kept the kids entertained. It was cold outside, but the lobby had free hot chocolate.  The room was a clean and nice size for my family of 4. The room was stocked with the basic essentials. There is a mini refrigerator, but no microwave.  Complimentary breakfast was hot and offered a variety (waffles, oatmeal, cereal, eggs, sausage, etc). My only compliant was the sausage links weren't the best. They were huge but they were a little tough.  Hotel was under construction, but barely heard any noise. I would recommend this hotel to others.
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so glad to hear that you and your family had a comfortable stay in our newly remodeled guest rooms. Great to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast and our 24 hour coffee bar. We look forward to have you back on your next trip to the Cypress/Orange County area.

Summary: I am very particular about cleanliness of the place I stay. Also, I don't like old buildings. So, I seek out relatively newer places to stay when I am traveling out of town. This place didn't disappoint me on both counts. The bathrooms were especially very clean and big. Complimentary breakfast, internet and free parking were added perks. This place is about a 15 - 20 mins drive from Disneyland and we were satisfied with the price we got for the time of the year that we traveled (christmas break).
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share feedback about your stay with the Hampton Inn Cypress. So great to hear we met your important travel expectations. We hope you had an amazing time enjoying the parks over the holiday, it's such a special time to go. Hope to see you soon on your next visit to the area.

Summary: I have stayed at many Hampton Inns and always get treated well. No exception for this one. The room was really nice and clean. Bed is comfortable as always. This particular hotel is located in a business district and off the main road so it was very quiet. Breakfast was delicious.
Manager Response: We appreciate you being a loyal Hampton Inn guest and are so grateful to hear that you had a wonderful visit at our Cypress location.
