Our rooms have been newly remodeled and all our beds are brand new and so comfy glad you were able to rest well with us. Hope to have you back soon on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Everything about this wonderful hotel was top notch.  The hot breakfast they served in the morning was outstanding!  Loved the waffles AND the freshly baked chocolate chip cookies.  Our room was clean and comfortable and had a BRAND NEW look and smell to it.  It appears to have been renovated very recently.  We had one of the finest Front Desk clerks we ever encountered upon check-in, a fellow named Frank......and Frank was amazing!  Customer Service and hospitality at its finest.  We recommend this fine hotel to everyone traveling to this area, and we will certainly be returning to this property for sure.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share feedback on your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Guest love our breakfast buffet and we are so glad to hear that you enjoyed it as well. So great to hear you were able to stay in one of our newly remodeled rooms we love the new look and happy to hear you did as well. We look forward to having you back on your next trip to the area and we appricate your recommendation.

Summary: great hot breakfast (wish there was powdered sugar for the waffles). love the fresh baked chocolate chip cookies too. staff was very courtesy, helpful, and friendly. hotel location is tucked in a quiet place. sheets and bed was very clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are glad to hear that you had a great visit and you were able to join us for breakfast. Powder sugar is a great suggestion for the waffle station and will be something that we will look into. We hope to see you soon on your next travels to the Cypress/Orange County area.

Summary: The Manager named Frank was very hospitable.   When we first checked in and went to our adjoining rooms one of them were not ready due to construction.  When the Manager Frank found out he immediately found other adjoining rooms together.  I did also let him know that the Refrigerators were not working properly.  He immediately looked into the situation and had the repair man come to our new rooms to check the refrigerator temperature.  He even called to make sure everything was in working order.  I even advised him I did pay extra for one of the room being that one was for a double bed.  I actually wanted to kings adjoining on the 4th floor but was not available, until Frank accommodated us on what I actually wanted.  So, it did turn out for the best.  I always stay at the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your recent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate you recognizing Frank and his efforts on making sure you received a warm welcome and the correct accommodations to make your stay enjoyable. We are so pleased to hear you had a great stay and enjoyed our newly remodeled rooms. Hope to have you back soon on your next trip to the Cypress area.

Summary: The Hampton Inn is a have new remodeled rooms! They have a fridge in them, and they are very clean! The beds are so comfortable I didn't want to get out of it!!! Hot drinks available all day and night! Hot Chocolate, Tea, etc.. Their free breakfast was amazing! Bagel & cream cheese, juices, cereal, waffles, eggs, etc.. It's an amazing plus when you have kids! They are super nice! Would love to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress and thank you for taking the time to share comments about your visit. It's wonderful to hear that you enjoyed our newly remodeled room and that the kids enjoyed our breakfast buffet. We hope you had a great trip and look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: This is a newer HI so it's very nice. Some remodeling going on, but nothing that will put you out. Breakfast goes till 10 which is nice as most HI shut down at 9. Room 421 beds are new and firm. Location of Hotel is withing walking distance of several eateries and shopping centers.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. It's great to hear that you were able to join us for breakfast and that you were able to enjoy one of out newly remodeled rooms. Can't wait to have you back to see the full remodel.

Summary Heading: Good Hotel, Undergoing a Big Renovation
Summary: My 2nd stay here this fall and I was surprised to see a renovation underway, since the 1st time I stayed in September I thought the hotel was quite fine.  So far as of mid-December they've renovated the 4th (top) floor and are currently working on the 3rd, then will progress downward.  The lobby, little store and business center are also getting a facelift, in fact the business center was not available when I stayed. While the work didn't bother me in the room, there was some loud grinding in the lobby that intruded in on breakfast. Might be worth calling the hotel to see where they are with things if you want a specific room/floor or to see overall how things are progressing. I'm surprised there was no mention of this whatsoever on the Hampton website.   Back to the room, the
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments and feedback about your resent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so glad to hear that you are a loyal guest when traveling to the area. We are loving the outcome of the remodel and it's great to hear that you are as well. The rooms are coming out lovely and can't wait to have you back to see the finish product. See you soon!

Summary Heading: Not what we expected of a Hampton.
Summary: The food in the breakfast area was awful. The seating area is not big enough to accommodate familes. Very inconvenient that no microwave was available in our room to heat milk for our infant. Rooms very clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments regarding your resent visit. We are sorry to hear that you were unhappy with your visit to the property. We hope we have another opportunity to have you back in the near future we would love to regain your confidence in our property.

Summary: My husband and I enjoyed a night in an updated room on the 4th floor and were very pleased with the quality of the room. The variety of the fare offered in the complimentary breakfast was tasty and appreciated.
Manager Response: It's wonderful to hear that you were able to enjoy a night in one of our newly remodeled rooms. We appreciate hearing the great feedback about the room and our breakfast buffet. We hope to have you back soon to see the finished remodel.

Summary: The staff is absolutely remarkable. We had a family of 4 staying(2 adults and 2 kids) and the staff went above and beyond to make our kids feel special. While sitting at breakfast, before heading to Disneyland, one of the service people had a goody basket that our girls could pick something out of. The front desk was just as helpful with getting us extra towels. The breakfast is very impressive. Why stay at the hotel next door for the same price when you can stay here and have a wide range of food like eggs, waffles, pancakes, cereal and fruit. They also provide a wide range of coffee. The only negative was the pool area. They had just repainted and had massive overspray on the fence. There was also limited pool towels.
Manager Response: It's wonderful to hear that you had a great visit during your resent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your stay with us. So glad to hear you enjoyed our breakfast buffet options. Hope to have you back with us soon on your next trip to Disneyland or visit to the local area.

Summary: I called the hotel from the airport and was given very specific directions, and drove directly there. I was welcomed at the front desk, and provided a complimentary snack and personalized bottled water! The room was exceptionally clean and well appointed -great bed, and complimentary breakfast hit the spot.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to complete a review of your resent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. Thank you for being a loyal Hilton member! We are so glad to hear that everything went well during your stay and that we were able to provide you with a clean room and comfortable bed to rest on. Hope to have you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Hotel bem silencioso, √≥timo para dormir. Fica bem perto de um centro comercial que possui lojas variadas, dentre elas a Target. Al√©m disso, tem bons restaurantes pr√≥ximos a ele, como o Olive Garden. O caf√© da manh√£ e excelente, no estilo de todos os hot√©is da cadeia. Recomendo fortemente para estadia na Disney. Tamb√©m fica pr√≥xima √† Huntington beach.
Manager Response: We appreciate your resent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We hope you had a great visit to Disneyland and we are so glad to hear that your stay with us went well. It's also great to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast buffet options and were able to enjoy some of the local restaurants near by. We hope we have you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary: I selected this hotel due to it's proximity to Disneyland and I wanted to get the best value for my Hilton Honors points. This Hampton offers rooms for 20k points per night off peak. The park is only a few miles down the road which is about a 10 minute drive depending on traffic. The hotel is in an industrial area which is peaceful! No street or traffic noise will keep you awake here! There are plenty of parking spaces and check in was a breeze especially when using the Hilton app prior to arrival. When I made the booking I was informed there would be renovations going on. There are signs of this around the place but it didn't hinder our stay at all. It looks like they are starting by updating all the rooms on the 4th floor and working their way down. We stayed on the 3rd floor
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review about your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress and thank you for being a loyal Hilton honors member. We hope you had an amazing visit at Disneyland and glad you enjoyed visiting our location. Great to hear that the remodeling did not disrupt your stay, we can't wait to have you back to see the changes. See you soon.

Summary: Stayed here for 4 days with two toddlers. Only 20 minute drive to Disneyland. Room was clean and spacious. Beds were comfortable, plenty of free parking. Target and Dollar store within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review. We hope you had a great time visiting Disneyland with the littles ones, its such a great time of the year to go. We are very happy to hear you enjoyed stay with us and we were able to provide you with a comfortable bed to rest after a day at the park. Hope to have you back on you next visit to the area.

Summary: We stayed at this location per advice from a friend.  For us, the location was perfect.  It was clean, quiet and friendly. Breakfast was great and had lots of choices. We were very pleased with our stay here.
Manager Response: Great to hear back from you after your resent stay with us. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast buffet options and your visit was great. We can't wait to have you back with us at the Hampton Inn Cypress on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: A good location and great stay
Summary: I stayed recently for a 5-day business trip.  Check-in and out was quick and easy process.  All the staff at this hotel are friendly and helpful.  But most of my interaction was with Clarissa and she did a great job.  The breakfast was fine (cereal, yogurt, bagel, toast, muffins, bananas, apples, mixed-fruit, French-toast-sticks, breakfast potatoes, sausage, make-your-own-waffles, juice, coffee and tea).  The hotel property was well maintained.  Clean, well maintained and well lite parking lot.  The lobby and breakfast area is nice and clean.  Elevators were quick.  My room was clean with a TV, desk, phone, clock and plenty of outlets/charging ports.  But as some stated the rooms do seem a little dated and if you see the response from the hotel staff (I also appreciate the staff
Manager Response: Thank you for your resent visit, we appreciate you taking the time to share feedback and acknowledging Clarissa at the front desk she is awesome. We have begin working on our hotel refresh and the magic is starting to come along. We look forward to having you back on your next visit to Cypress.

Summary: We stayed here once my b-day and then gain for my husbands bday and it was great. Staff always treats us right and always makes sure our stay is welcoming. Will definitely book this hotel again when the price is right again whenever we head down to Buena Park
Manager Response: We appreciate you at the Hampton Inn Cypress for being a loyal guest during your visits to the local area. So glad you had an enjoyable visit, Happy belated birthday from the whole team. Look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: Great staff - change the fitness hours
Summary: The staff at this Hampton is great. The fitness room has limited hours. The staff will tell you the policy is set by the owners. If you don't want to work out when you are fighting jet lag this is the place for you. I spend enough time on the road that a place to burn off some treadmill time at 11 pm is a help.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We appreciate you taking the time to share comments, thank you for recognizing our amazing team I can't wait to share your comments with them. We just began our remodel and we have a plan in place to help noise control for the room next to the fitness center so we may extend the hours. We look forward to having you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Stayed here for sister's wedding. Very comfortable bed (King). Staff were friendly and helpful getting directions. Hot breakfast was very goid, could not pass making homemade waffle plus all the extra's you could put on it, even whip cream, yum yum!
Manager Response: Thank you for your resent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your stay. Congratulation to your sister on her special day. Hope to have you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland for a Good Price
Summary: All of the hotels right by Disneyland were sold out - surprising for a Wednesday night, but luckily I found this hotel which wasn't too far away.  It ended up working out for the best since the value was so good.   We checked in late, but the staff were still attentive and helpful - especially with our crib request. The room was great!  Nice and spacious and the bathroom was huge!   Breakfast was nice and I love how the staff went around to the tables to ask if we need anything or a refill on our coffee - nice touch.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your resent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are so glad to hear that you had enjoyable stay with us while visiting for your Disneyland trip. We hope you had a great time at the park. We would like to share we are currently working on our remodel and can't wait to have you back to see all the changes.

Summary: This is our second time staying at this Hampton Inn. Clean place, very quiet, and very comfortable beds. Breakfast was ok other the plastic looking eggs!  I especially appreciated the tray chocolate chip cookies and hot coffee waiting for us at the entrance when returned at night.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write a review about your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Thank you for being a loyal guest when traveling to the area. Can't wait to see you again soon.

Summary: The room needed an update. Both chairs in the room were worn ( torn apolstry etc.) and the room didn't smell fresh ( not stinky, just not fresh, like they forgot to febreeze). However, the staff was amazing!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your stay. I wanted to share that we are scheduled for a full remodel which begins next week and hope to have you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: Quiet, overnight stay in Orange County
Summary: I stayed here as part of an overnight business trip. The location is a little ways from Long Beach Airport, so it's best to have a rental car.   The hotel was clean and tidy. I was greeted by Carolina, who answered my questions and provided me with my room keys.  The room was fine. It was a basic king bed room. I was a little disappointed that the bathroom only had a walk-in shower and not a bathtub. It seems that many of the Hampton Inn's are moving in that direction with their properties.   The stay was very quiet. I had a room away from the elevators and heard no outside noise.   The breakfast bar was very fresh! The fruits and pastries were enjoyable and the hot foods tasted good too.  Crystal checked me out of my room and thanked me for being a HHonors member.  Overall,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave comments regarding your resent stay. All our king rooms have the walk in showers and our double bedded rooms have the tub/shower combo for future reference. We are scheduled to have a full remodel in a couple of weeks so we hope to have you back soon to see the changes. Thank you for recognizing the team Carolina and Crystal are great at the front desk and I can't wait to share comments with them.

Summary: Stayed here over a short weekend stay after a week of business. Over the years, I have stayed here around 6 times and found great value compared to other Hilton properties. Excellent breakfast buffet consistent with all Hampton hotels. The location is also ideal near restaurants and shopping venues. You cannot beat the price per night, as it consistently is lower than other hotels in the area.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your resent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. Thank you so much for being a loyal guest of ours when traveling to the area. We can't wait to have you back, we are working on some upgrades can't wait for you to enjoy them on your next visit.

Summary: Book directly with Hampton Inn to avoid receiving a higher rate with a crazy service fee!  Carpet in traffic areas very worn and dirty. Same with upholstered chairs in rooms.  Breakfast buffet selections contain anything you could want as well as a fresh fruit salad of cutup melons, oranges and pineapple. Best breakfast buffet of any hotel where I have stayed!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments regarding your resent stay. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast buffet. Our hotel is schedule to begin our remodel in just a couple of weeks. We hope to see you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: We had an excellent stay here. Check in was easy, room was clean and quiet. 15 minutes from Disneyland, 25 minutes Fromm Huntington Beach. Target right next door,  Starbucks was close. Staff was friendly. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share feedback on your resent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We hope you had a great time visiting the local area attractions and we hope to see you again when traveling to the Orange County area.

Summary: When you're traveling with stay to play organizations, you get stuck with whatever hotels they offer - at the rate they give you. This was on the higher end as far as team rates go. We've stayed all over the place because we're down for tournaments regularly in HB area - and the fields range from HB, Irvine, Fountain Valley, and Anaheim. This is a nice area, safer than some of the other stay to play places we've found ourselves in - and fairly centrally located as far as the varying areas of the fields. There are decent family restaurants, Target, Vons, and convenience stores within a 2 mile radius. Very nice.  The staff was very friendly, although not really "helpful" as far as actually accomplishing things. Nothing trip-ruining or anything, but I asked for extra blankets (it
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your resent stay. We are pleased to hear that your stay was enjoyable and your group of kids were able to enjoy our breakfast on the go on your way out to your early morning games. We hope your team did well and we have another opportunity to have you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary: We stayed here this past weekend for 2 nights on a trip to Disneyland. We prefer to stay further away from the park because it is quieter and we have noticed that the further away from Disneyland, the better prices are. The staff was friendly upon checking in (Clarissa was very helpful and friendly) and also with checking out. My husband and I liked that we could get some snacks to eat in the 24-hour shop connected to the front desk. Our room was very clean, updated and very comfortable. Whenever it is that we do return to Disneyland, we will come here and stay.
Manager Response: We are glad to hear that your resent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress went well. Clarissa is one of newest front desk members and we are so proud of her hard work and growth I can't wait to share your comments with her. We will begin remodeling in the next couple of weeks we can't wait to have you back to see the updates on your next visit.

Summary Heading: Overall it is a good hotel
Summary: Last week I spent five days in this hotel due to bussiness.  Overall I can't complain. The hotel is always clean.  It has a pool and gym.  And they offer complimentary breakfast.  The only thing would be that I am vegetarian and there are not a lot of options for me to eat. Plus a vending machine would not be a bad idea...  The price is right.  You can always ask them for water and there is always coffee and tee.  And it is a nice location... Kind of relaxing actually.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments regarding your resent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are glad to hear you had a relaxing visit with us and we are excited to share that we will be remodeling the guest rooms in the next couple of weeks. We hope to have you back soon.

Summary: The room is very dated and worn for $150 a night. In this day and age why is there no refrigerator in the room or microwave. For $158 down the street you can get a suite at the residence inn Marriott. The room feels dirty but I know it's not. The staff are very nice and friendly. The breakfast is nothing special and is typical continental style. The lobby and breakfast area is nice and updated. It is close to places to eat and next to a target. I spent 10 days here and if it weren't for colleagues I would have moved to another hotel. I would not recommend the hotel even though it is 6.8 miles from Disneyland. I fork out the extra cash for my family to stay across the street at the convention center from the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay and sharing your feedback. We appreciate your honesty and we are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with our location. We have started our hotel remodel with the exterior paint and will begin all guest rooms in the next couple of weeks which will include adding refrigerators. We hope we have another opportunity to see you on again on your next travel to the area.

Summary: I came from as part of a team trip. The hotel was very clean and the staff was friendly. It is also close to restaurants and shopping. I was only disappointed in the breakfast because everything else was so great.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time you share comments about your resent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton in Cypress. We are pleased to hear that overall you had an enjoyable stay and got to met some of our amazing staff. Sorry to hear about breakfast being disappointing for you. We hope to see you again soon on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Stayed here for our visit to Knotts Scary Farm. Great location, clean and friendly staff! The rooms were spacious and the beds comfortable. Outside pool was sparkling. Breakfast was decent. Our room did not have a refrigerator or microwave. Tins of shopping and restaurants very close! Target right across the street!
Manager Response: Thank you for your resent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your stay. We hope you had a spooky time visiting Knott's Scary Farm. We are glad that you were able to enjoy the hotel amenities. We are schedule to have a remodel at the end of the year, during that time we will be adding refrigerators and microwaves to all our guest rooms

Summary Heading: Affordable hotel close to OC hotspots
Summary: The Hampton in is located in a business park in Cypress, about 20 minutes away from the Anaheim resort area (Disneyland, Angel Stadium, and the Convention Center).  The rooms were roomy and were mostly clean except for a dark spot on the floor.  The bathroom and toiletries were very nice.  The decor is a bit dated but well-maintained.  The highlight is the continental breakfast, which had an organized and expansive spread.  The dining area was clean, roomy, and had a TV.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your resent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so glad to hear that you had a nice stay and enjoyed our breakfast buffet. We are excited to share that we will be having a full remodel of all our guest rooms at the end of this year. Can't wait to have you back to see the changes.

Summary: On Business trip to Huntington Beach, great location to food and shopping.  Excellent service, cleanliness and staff.  Complimentary breakfast was perfect for our needs and variety.  Free coffee and tea all day.  Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: We are so glad to hear that you had a great visit during your resent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We hope you had the opportunity to enjoy the beach well you were visiting and hope to see you again on your next trip to California.

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel many many times over the last 4 years. They have a nice breakfast and the staff is always nice and helpful. Rooms are clean and neat. lots of towels in the bathroom. Only negative I have is there is no hot tub.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a loyal guest of the Hampton Inn Cypress when traveling to the area. We are so glad to hear you enjoy your visits with us and enjoy our breakfast buffet. We can't wait to have you back on you.

Summary Heading: Over all a great value and I liked the location being a block off of Katella street.
Summary: Nice place to stay. Would return to this property on next trip to OC. Nice to be a block off of busy Katella street. Walking distance to food and shopping. Alexis hair salon did a great with my wife's color and cut. The owner of salon was very accommodating.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share comments regarding your stay with us at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Nice to hear that you were able to walk close by to get a great hair cut. We appreciate hearing that you will be back on your next visit to Orange County. We will be remodeling at the end of the year can't wait for you to come back and see the upgrade.

Summary: This Hampton in is very clean and the staff are very nice, the amenities are what you would expect for a Hampton Inn, the location is relatively new. Conveniently located in a quite location. Quality of service was excellent. Restaurants were close by.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments regarding your resent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. It's great to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us. I am excited to share your comments with the team on the great service they provided. We will be remodeling at the end of the year and we hope to have you back soon.

Summary: Hotel super centrico, tiene un mini centro comercial muy cerca con varios restaurants (6 mints), tambien esta cerca de varias atracciones turisticas  (11 mints Knott's Berry Farm, Pirate's Dinner Adventure, Medieval Times, 20 mints de Disneyland Resort, playa a 20 minutos)  Cuenta con desayuno buffet de 6am-10am, el check in es a las 3pm y check out a las 12pm  El cuarto que nos toco estaba en el 3er piso, super tranquilo, tranquilo, limpio, no se oian ruidos de fuera, lo unico malo fue que el cuarto no contaba con refrigerador (no se si los demas curators cuenten, pero este no tenia)
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Hampton Inn Cypress. We hope you had a great visit and enjoyed the local attractions during your visit. We hope to see you again soon on your next visit to the area.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay, and found nothing to complain about.  It was located in a convenient and quiet place.  My numerical responses say it all:  it was an excellent hotel with great service.  We would stay here again if we are ever back in the area.
Manager Response: We are so glad to hear that you had an enjoyable visit during your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We can't wait to have you back as a guest. We will be having a remodel at the end of the year and can't wait for you to see the upgrades.

Summary: Clean and comfortable rooms! Staff was friendly and accommodating. They take care of your needs and make sure you are happy. Also, convenient access to others places around. I enjoyed the peacefulness this location provided for me.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share feedback on your resent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Thank you so much for highly recommending us!!! We are very happy to hear that you were able to enjoy a peace visit and thank you for recognizing our awesome staff. Can't wait to have you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Very close to major attractions such as Knott's Berry Farm, Disneyland etc. Lots of restaurants less than a mile away.  Nice hotel with spacious room. Very comfortable mattress and pillows. Great hot continental breakfast with plenty of table for dining.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments regarding your resent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We hope you had an amazing time visiting the local attractions and we are so glad to hear you had a chance to enjoy breakfast. Hope to see you again soon on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Como siempre escogimos a la cadena Hampton para nuestro hospedaje de vacaciones, pero nuestra gran sorpresa fue que nos conseguimos a un Hampton muy distinto a los que ya hab√≠amos  visitado en Orlando, Miami y San Francisco. En los √Ångeles las habitaciones  est√°n desactualizadas, el closet es muy peque√±o para una habitaci√≥n de 4 personas, no tienen nevera ni microondas y solo te la proveen si las solicitas pero esto no te lo informan a tu llegada. Adem√°s las habitaciones no tienen caja fuerte. Nos vamos sin intensi√≥n de volver. Por la parte de los empleados no tenemos ninguna queja porque son muy amables. Saludos
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your resent stay. Our hotel is scheduled to have a full remodel at the end of the year at that time we will be adding refrigerators to all our guest rooms. We hope when traveling back to the Orange County/Los Angeles area we have another opportunity to see you again.

Summary Heading: Another Good Experience at the Hamption Inn Cypress
Summary: We stayed here a few months ago for my daughter's birthday weekend.  We liked it so much, we decided to stay at the same place for my son's birthday weekend.  Even though the hotel is actually in Cypress, it is close enough to Buena Park to stay here when we are doing weekend trips to Knott's Berry Farm and the other local attractions.  There are also several restaurants nearby (walking distance if so desired) such as Subways, The Habit, Chipotle, Five Guys, Olive Garden and Carls Jr.  Target and Starbucks are next door.  Just as the last time we stayed here, the staff and service was excellent.  The Hampton breakfast is always a plus.  Another fun stay.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share some comments regarding your stay at Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so happy to hear that we are your families birthday getaway spot. We hope you had a fun time visiting Knott's Berry Farm during your stay with us. We will be having a full hotel remodel at the end of this year and can't wait for all our loyal guest come back and see the upgrades. See you and the family soon!

Summary: We were visiting realities and needed z hotel that is in a central location close to everything.  It is close to Huntington Beach and airport and all the attractions and shopping.  The downside to this property is there was no fridge or microwave.  We were mainly traveling all over and so we needed a place to sleep only. CRhere was an occasion that we needed snacks and use of the microwave and the staff let us use the one downstairs.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments regarding your resent stay at Hampton Inn Cypress. Our location is a nice spot to stay in when traveling to local attractions. We will be having a full remodel at the end of the year where we will be adding refrigerators to all our guest rooms. We hope to see you again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Horrible stay walls are paper this so you can hear everything and service was horrible as well and dirty
Summary: Room and dirty once arriving which was horrible wish I can get my money back and I tried staying one more day and told me they didn't have anymore rooms which was really sad that I was willing to stay another night
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review about your resent stay. Sorry to hear that we were unable to accommodate you for an additional nights stay. We hope we have another opportunity to see you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: very clean and efficient hotel close to all orange county attractions target store and dollar tree literally located next door. This hotel though does not operate a shuttle service.  Staff is very accommodating and very friendly.  Asked and received late check out without hesitation.  Received reese peanut butter cups at checkout, a nice surpise
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so glad to hear that your stay was a great one, hope you had fun visiting the area. We will be undergoing a full hotel upgrade at the end of the year, we hope you come back and visit us on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: Very friendly staff and very accommodating for our early arrival and late check out because of a soccer tournament. We understand this cant always be done and were grateful for the help. thanks again!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so glad to hear you had a great visit with us. Hope you had a great time at your soccer tournament and we are so glad we were able to accommodate your early check in.

Summary: + H√¥tel confortable et personnel sympathique.  - Le petit-d√©jeuner manque de vari√©t√©, la moquette du couloir de notre chambre √©tait sale. Piscine monopolis√©e par une famille bruyante le premier jour: hurlements tr√®s d√©sagr√©ables sous notre fen√™tre.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments regarding your resent stay. We will be having a renovation at the end of the year and we hope we have the opportunity to see you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Absolutely loved this hotel that was recommended to me from a close friend. Very clean , comfortable beds, and decent free breakfast. We booked hotel so we could be close to Knottsberry Farm without paying the crazy prices of hotels closer to park. Situated only 10 minutes from park and easy direct drive there. Will definitely stay again. This hotel was higher quality than any hotels that we have stayed at outside the park gates.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share feedback on your resent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. So great to hear that you were able to get a comfortable nights rest before enjoying some fun adventures at Knott's Berry Farm. We look forward to your next visit to the hotel as we will be having a full remodel at the end of this year. Can't wait for you to come back and see the upgrades.

Summary: Diamond member here. I wanted to get away from the house for an evening.  I stayed on a Saturday and the big value here is the price and how quiet the premises are even though you are in Cypress.  There are plenty of restaurants within walking distance.  Standard Hampton Inn fare and accommodations. Staff was friendly. The only downside was no jacuzzi.  $97 was a great Hilton value for the room. You could do a lot worse.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review on your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate you being a loyal Hilton guest and glad to have you as a guest of ours. We will be undergoing a remodel at the end of the year hope to have you back with us soon.

Summary: Friendly staff that's always very professional each time I stay. Very helpful and willing to go the extra mile to make my stay enjoyable. Check in is very smooth and rooms are always reading and very clean.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your stay at Hampton Inn Cypress. So glad to hear that your a loyal guest with us and the team recognizes you as one. Hope to see you soon on your next visit!

Summary: This is a great hotel. The prices are reasonable. It's close to the Disney parks. Nice pool and great staff! This is one hotel that you'd keep coming back to when you're in the area. I almost want to say it's bad so I can keep it to myself but that wouldn't be fair.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress and thank you for our resent stay. We are so glad to hear you had an enjoyable visit and look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: The rooms are not cleaned properly daily. Staff acts like your a bother if you bring something to their attention or complain. I would not stay at the Cypress location again. I may even cancel my hhonors
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your stay. I am very sorry to hear your stay was not a pleasant one. Hope we have the opportunity to regain your business in the future.

Summary: Was there for a quick trip, the location is perfect and quiet as it a business area. There is a shopping area at walking distance which was helpful since I forgot a personal item back at home. Staff is very nice and make you feel welcomed. The hotel may look small in comparison to others but doesnt fall short on the quality and service.
Manager Response: We are so glad to hear that you had a great stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are schedule to have a remodel at the end of the year and we can't wait for you to come back and see the upgrades. We appreciate you taking the time to share your comments. See you soon!

Summary: Stayed in many Hampton Inns but this one isn't up to par.  Rooms and hallways need to be updated.  Breakfast was really terrible.  On the bright side the staff was very friendly especially the evening crew!
Manager Response: Thank you for your resent stay and taking the time to share your feedback. I am very sorry to hear that you were unhappy with your visit. We will be having a full hotel remodel at the end of the year which will include upgrades to the hallways and all guest rooms. We hope we have another opportunity to see you again.

Summary: Quiet location... Target is walking distance. Had a two queen bed room... It was very small .. No fridge or microwave included . Have stayed at other Hamptons where rooms were much larger and included fridge. I understand sometimes it depends on what you pay... But I paid $650 for 4 nights and did not have an option online to choose a larger room ... Would have gladly spent a lil more for a more comfortable stay
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments on your resent stay. Our hotel is scheduled to undergo a full hotel remodel at the end of the year where we will be adding refrigerators in all our guest rooms. We hope we have another chance to see you on your next visit to the area.

Summary: In need of a total make over in the rooms and hallway carpet and decor... But the bathrooms and breakfast area are awesome...the staff was very friendly clean sheets towels and bedding.... Beds slept superb!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments on your resent stay. The hotel is scheduled to have a full remodel towards the end of the year. So glad that we were able to provide you with a clean place to stay and that you enjoyed our breakfast. Hope to see you back soon.

Summary: Friendly staff, fresh clean rooms.  Details that make you feel welcome include Hilton Honors water bottle with your name on it and everything in your room that can be fancy folded, folded.  Close to very lots of eating place plus they'll provide you a list of recommend places.  Good internet.  Breakfast good but not great.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your resent at the Hampton Inn Cypress and for taking the time to complete a review of your visit. We are glad to hear that your stay was pleasant and thank you for being a loyal Hilton Honors member. See you on your next visit to the area.

Summary: It was a great place the property was very great my kids had a wonderful time in the pool do you know the fitness center we were exercise is great you know I would recommend to go back to any family members and myself I'll be going back thank you for your service
Manager Response: Wow we are so glad to hear the whole family had a great visit during your resent stay at Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. The weather has been perfect for some time at the pool glad you were able to enjoy. Can't wait to have you back on your next visit.

Summary: This Hampton was not unlike other Hampton Hotels I have stayed at throughout the years . Conveniently located , top condition and beautiful facility . Rooms are comfortable , very clean and nicely equipped. staff is efficient and very friendly . You cannot beat the value Hampton offers and this particular location definitely did not disappoint !
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your resent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate you recognizing the staff and are excited to share your comments with them. Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Another pleasant stay at the HI-Cypress
Summary: I've stayed at this HI several times now over the last 2-3 years. Its become my favorite HI in the Long Beach - Anaheim area. Its clean, quiet and easy to get to from most places in the area. I like that it has walk-in showers as opposed to tubs. If your going to Disneyland and want to avoid the crowds at the hotels closer to Disney, I'd suggest giving this a try, the parking is free and you won't have the crowds of an Anaheim Resort hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to complete a review for the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so glad to here that we are your favorite Hampton Inn property as we know you have many to choose from. We appreciate your loyalty and can't wait for you to see our upcoming hotel upgrades which we will start towards the end of the year.

Summary: Great staff, clean and comfortable rooms. Breakfast was perfect. The trip drive we made was long and tiresome, I am glad to say that this hotel made our stress level decrease 100%. We will definitely be staying here from now on when we are in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of your resent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. I am so glad to hear the we were able to provide you with a relaxing stay after your long trip. Great to hear that your enjoyed breakfast, I will be sharing your comments with staff as they do an amazing job and thank you for recognizing them.

Summary: Coffee and hot water at the Lobby was warm at best.  Not even mildly hot.  Ran out of wheat bread at complementary breakfast. Watch out. They only have 10 late checkout slots per day.  Get them early. At least that's what the front desk told me when I requested a late checkout. I think she just made it up.  Terrible service at check in and check out.  Bad food.  Bad coffee.  Bad hot water.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on your resent stay. Sorry to hear your were unhappy with our breakfast offerings. We appreciate you sharing were we can improve so we can make it right moving forward. We hope we have the opportunity to see you on your next visit to the area.

Summary: This hotel was situated in a great area that was easy to come and go from as we explored Seal Beach area.. It was quiet and convenient. Would definitely stay here again. The breakfast was hot and fresh. THe staff was very kind and helpful when we asked for directions to the beach.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback regarding your resent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. So glad to hear that you found time to visit the beach, the weather has been great for it. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: The staff was nice. We were greeted right away. The room was perfect. The bed was real comfortable. I can't complain. I love the quiet area. This hotel is located in a business area. Made my stay very peaceful. I slept well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are happy hear you had an enjoyable visit and were able to rest well. We hope to see you again on your next visit the area.

Summary Heading: Good place to rest after 800 mile drive.
Summary: It was almost like going home. Have used this facility on n off for about 5 years and the place is normally clean n front counter is manned with helpful folks. The beds are good to better. Shower is great for us handicapped with a walk in shower. Not a bad place to call home away from home.
Manager Response: Thank you for your resent stay at Hampton Inn Cypress and thank you for being a loyal guest. We are scheduled to remodel at the end of the year we look forward to you coming back and seeing the changes.

Summary Heading: No refrigerator and ice machines are broken
Summary: I usually like Hampton Inn, but this one is not up to par.  The staff doesn't seem to care either.  This location is in need of an upgrade.  The rooms are dated and do not have the amenities available that other locations have.  It is not even the cheapest rate for this brand.
Manager Response: Thank you for your resent stay, I am very sorry to hear your stay was less than pleasant. We are scheduled to undergo a full remodel at the end of the year. We hope we have the opportunity to see you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Nice hotel and good area for beach access.  If you are in the Long Beach area please do not hesitate to consider this place for your stay.  Good restaurants in the area and very convenient access to freeways but not noisy.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your comment. We are fortunate to have such great beaches available near our location. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: I had a good experience staying here every one was very friendly. Yes there where things that I didn't like. Like no finding a clean breakfast table, and my room having a little bit of dust. But other then that I enjoy staying at this hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We take great pride in our staff and it definitely shows from the comments we receive. It seems as though you may have stayed over a very busy time with families. We generally have plenty of seating in our lobby area and at times we have the option to open our meeting room adjacent to the buffet.  We will definitely keep a better eye on the situation. We hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Nice break in a busy area
Summary: This hotel is located near many restaurants and several major stores. Anything you need is nearby. My room was spacious and clean with a view facing north toward the mountains. It was easy to find, directions on the website were clear and off major streets and not far from the 22 freeway. They had a lot of choices for breakfast, there was something for everyone. There were even several coffee choices: regular, robust, and decaf. And there was hot water for tea as well. There are probably cheaper options, but in my opinion, you get what you pay for.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate your comments and hope to see you back again soon.

Summary: Rooms were dirty and noisy.  Common areas were also dirty and carpets old.  Room furnishings were dated and stains all over.  The walls are thin that you hear every conversation from rooms around and above.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to let us know of your concerns. They will be addressed.

Summary: Really appreciated the friendliness of the staff and the cleanliness of the hotel. We enjoyed the pool and the complimentary wifi access. We were also very grateful for the breakfast as that helped us conserve money for other activities during our vacation. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your resent stay at Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress and that your for taking the time to share your comments. We are so glad to hear you had an enjoyable stay and hope to see you soon.

Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights at the beginning of our trip to California. All staff were very friendly and after reporting when we arrived that the hairdryer in our room was not working , we returned to our room less than an hour later to find a new hairdryer and a bag of sweets . Hotel was always spotlessly clean and there was always a good choice for breakfast . Especially enjoyed the porridge . An excellent place to stay if visiting Disney. Would thoroughly recommend
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your comments regarding your resent stay at Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so glad to hear we could be apart of your California vacation and that you had a wonderful visit with us and at Disneyland. Hope to see you again on your next visit.

Summary: Have stayed here several times, it's close to shopping and restaurants, quiet, good full breakfast, better now that's it's part of Hilton, a little hard to find off Katella as it's not on the main street and you can't see it or it's sign.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review regarding your stay at Hampton Inn Cypress and thank you for being a loyal guest. Hope to see you back soon.

Summary: Staff are friendly and helpful. Bed is comfortable.   The hotel is in a good location. It's about 6.8 miles 10 mins to Disneyland - a straight road to Disneyland Dr (turn left to go north if you are going to Disneyland parking lot) and Harbor Blvd (turn left to go north if you are going to shops).   Hotel tax is much cheaper than those hotels closer to Disneyland. Hotel provides good quality complimentary breakfast, free wifi, free parking, good selection of hot tea and coffee in the lobby. All these freebie can save a fair amount if you are staying here for a few days and are on an average budget.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review regarding your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate your comments and hope to see you here again soon.

Summary: I had a good experience here. I use the digital check in and it worked great.  Staff is very friendly and helpful. I found my room to be clean and quiet. The location is great for  work in Los Alamitos area.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: When visiting Southern California, we wanted to find a hotel conveniently located between Disneyland, Medieval Times / Knots Berry Farm, and Seal Beach.  This hotel was right in the middle of all three.
Manager Response: You did a great job finding the perfect location for all of your plans. It sounds like you had a great vacation. Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress and we hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: Some of my co-workers and I recently attended a Luau at the Hampton in Cypress.  The food, entertainment, and hospitality were excellent.  The staff's enthusiasm and friendliness says a lot about this hotel.  The Hilton group also includes the Courtyard by Marriott in Cypress.  It was nice seeing Sammy Toa's involvement in both hotels.  She did a great job for our event at the Courtyard back in May.  I would highly recommend both of these venues for any special event.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing this review and so pleased to hear you  were able to join us for our Hampton Inn Cypress Luau. We are so fortunate to have Sammy at both of our hotels. She did a great job setting up this event.

Summary: I love this property everyone was so nice and accommodating from front desk to the housekeeping.  I wish I'd stay longer here than the other place I stayed at.  People are so warm and the location is great!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Your comments   will be passed on to our staff. We are very proud of them and glad to hear you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: it is roomy with two queen beds and location is very quiet during weekend. The location is very convenient. There are Target, restaurants and a strip mall right behind the hotel. The beds are comfortable and the room is clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are always pleased to hear our guests are comfortable. We hope you visit us again soon

Summary: Outstanding service, rooms and experience plus access to all local attractions and businesses. Hotel staff was very friendly and looking to meet all your needs. Breakfast included a wide selection to get your day started. Overall it was a very nice experience.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments in regards to your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: First off, let me say that the staff here is the same high quality I have experienced at other Hampton/HGI properties.  They were all friendly and eager to help.  They were very accommodating when I asked to check in early, and one of the maintenance staff heard me ask for a refrigerator; he volunteered to run one to my room right then, as they go quickly.  Unfortunately, the product they are representing is not up to the standards I expect from Hampton, especially at they rates they were charging for a hotel over 6 miles away from Disneyland (last-minute trip, everything was booked).                                              The room was clean and well appointed, as was the bathroom.  Smaller than the properties on Harbor Blvd, but still plenty roomy.  The wireless was easy
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and will review at our next staff meeting to see how we can improve in the future.

Summary: The location of the hotel is great. Lots of things around the hotel like restaurants and stores. Very quiet area allows for sleeping at a reasonable hour. Disney is only about 10 minutes away. The staff was nice and efficient in both check in and check out process.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to respond and add your review in regards to your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. The staff will be pleased to hear your comments and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I would rate this hotel higher, but I just did not have a very good experience there. My room nice & clean, but it was so cold, not to mention the hallways were absolutely freezing! I just don't understand why they would keep the halls so cold.
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing the air conditioning issue to our attention. We are having it looked at and adjusted. We apologize for the inconvenience.

Summary: We come to the Hampton Inn on an annual basis.  This is the first time the ice machines were not working and a certain area in the 4th floor hallway was extremely cold.  For some reason, the room rates are a lot higher than the past.
Manager Response: Thank you for for staying with us. Ww your e apologize for the inconvenience and will bring the issue with the ice machines and the air on the fouth floor to our maintenance department.

Summary: Really enjoyed my stay. Will definitely be booking again. Staff was extremely friendly and very helpful. Loved the location. Loved that it had a laundry room to use after our beach days. I highly recommend this hotel to everyone.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your comments regarding your recent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. Hope you had a great time visiting the beach during your stay, weather has been great for it. I'm excited to share your comments with the staff. We look forward to see you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: The Best Experience Always, make tjis Hotel your next Home away from Home
Summary: Clean, friendly and the staff are always ready to assist ! üëçüòÉ The rooms, fitness and pool are always clean and tidy! The Breakfast is always fresh and a vast variety daily. Coffee is better than Starbucks. Also its eitjin walking distance to a Target a d a few restaurants as well !
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate your great comments and will pass them on to our staff. We hope you are able to visit us again soon.

Summary: Hotel was clean and had a very friendly staff.  Breakfast Buffet was OK. but difficult to maneuver through.  Had a shortage of Towels and wash cloths, but received more when requested.  Good Location for access to business locations and highways.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Good to hear your request for extra towels was taken care of. Please visit us again soon.

Summary: Hotel is conveniently situated but their standards for cleanliness makes this a less than ideal choice. Breakfast is included and offers some variety. Gym, like most hotel gyms, is a joke. Mostly families here presumably because it's close to Disney. Fortunately, they did a good job with sound proofing things so sleep is undisturbed.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying and writing a review.

Summary Heading: Best hotel stay during my entire trip.
Summary: I just spent the last six days and five nights at FIVE DIFFERENT hotels.  This was the second hotel during my trip. I chose this hotel because it was minutes from Disneyland and affordable. Stayed on june 30, 2016.  As my significant other parked the car and was bringing in the luggage, I checked in. I was greeted by Frank. Frank was very personable. Asked me what brought me to the hotel. Where am I from? How do I like Anaheim/Los Angeles? ETC. Frank fulfilled every request I submitted with my reservation. I requested, if possible, not to be placed near the elevator (lots of foot traffic) and not to be placed between two occupied rooms, and again, if possible, an end of hallway room. The thing I cannot stand in hotels is when you can hear the conversations from other rooms as
Manager Response: Thank you for your review regarding your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Frank has been with us since the day the hotel opened and he is definitely one of our guests favorites. We apologize for the inconvenience of the ice machines not being filled at the time you needed it. Unfortunately, a lot of our guests fill their coolers and our machines sometimes cannot keep up with the high demand but we will work on this and should be able to come up with some type of solution.

Summary: Crystal and Arely were excellent ambassadors for the Hampton brand. This property is clean, well maintained and employs some of the nicest, most attentive, friendly staff I have ever worked with in a hotel environment.
Manager Response: It is wonderful that you pointed out two of our stars. We always like to know that the extensive training works however, these two are a natural when it comes to friendliness and professionalism. We hope you return to the Hampton Inn Cypress again soon.

Summary: Very good family place. Clean rooms, good continental breakfasts, friendly helpful staff, free parking & wifi, clean pool and pool area, and free shuttle to and from park.  We stayed in a family room decorated in Disney style with a separate area for bunk beds.  We always try to stay at a Hampton because no matter what Hampton we're at, we can always expect clean rooms, good staff, and a good breakfast included w rm rate. Always the go to place when going on vacations.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response.

Summary Heading: This felt like a vacation place
Summary: It was clean. Great to sleep in. All the staff was super friendly and helpful. Housekeeping keep on making sure nothing extra was needed in the room. When i asked for a refrigerator i got one within minutes. Service was awesome
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Your comments will be passed on to our staff and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: it was everything you would expect from a hampton inn.  I was disapointed with the condition of the bathroom floor in my room.  The ceramic tile were coming up and the grout was breaking apart, could not walk on the floor with bare feet
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. It can only make us better. We are in the process of renovating all of our rooms this year. We hope you are able to return and see the results.

Summary: The staff at this hotel makes this hotel outstanding!!  The rooms are very clean, beds comfortable and the pool was refreshing.  Would have been nice to have a refrigerator in all the rooms, however, they provided one when we asked but it didn't work properly.  There is not a hot tub at this location either.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your stay. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The room was more expensive than I expected and the building structure quality was not quite worth the cost.  The service was outstanding however the rooms need a renovation with wall design, ceiling design, and closet redesign.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are proud of our staff and receive many compliments on their service. We are slated for a renovation in the next several months and very excited. We hope you come back to see the results!!

Summary: The stay was amazing the hotel was great the staff makes you feel very welcomed. Room are very clean and housekeeping was friendly too. They're are many restaurants in walking distance. You also have about 25 minute ride to long beach. Great job Hampton Inn keep up the great work!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are happy to hear we made you feel welcomed. We will pass this on to our staff and please note, we have the famous Huntington Beach- Surf City as well as many others nearby. Hope we see you again soon.

Summary: I'm always staying in Hilton or Hampton inn, this Hampton is not make me really happy, so they have around more good hotels may be stay somewhere else next time, but breakfast is really good in this Hampton. So there is some good some bad is not really worth for money this time.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review. I am sorry to hear that you were not completely happy with your resent stay. We would love to have you back as guest please let us know how we can make that happen. The property is scheduled to have a full renovation at the end of the year and we would love for you to see the changes.

Summary: The staff is very courteous and helpful whenever we had a question.  The breakfasts were delicious with quite a few items to chose from.  We found the room to be clean and very comfortable, it had a great layout.  The bathroom was fairly large.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your resent stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. I will be sure to share your review with our breakfast and housekeeping team. Hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Well done, nice place to stay
Summary: Decent location close to many high-profile sites such as Knott's Berry Farm, Disney Land and California Adventure. Nice restaurants such as the Original Fish Co., Claim Jumper, Black Angus, Outback, California Fish Co., and Shenandoah at the Arbor. Friendly, efficient staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for completing a review about your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. I look forward to sharing your comments with our staff. Hope you had a fun time visiting the area, see you soon.

Summary: We left my laptop bag behind when we checked out. Within a couple of hours we received a phone call letting us know that we left a black case behind.  We came back to pick it up and nothing was missing in the case. It is great to know that Hampton has the best group of people working there.  Thank you Hampton & Staff for the exceptional services and honesty !!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We, on many occasions  have been able to return valuables to our guests. We are pleased to know that you received your laptop. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This hotel is one of the best I've ever encountered. The room was clean and comfortable. The staff was super friendly and helpful. The had an amazing breakfast bar in the morning and they even had pre made breakfast bags ready to go if you don't have to I've to stop and eat! That's amazing! I only paid $100 and for the quality, you can't beat that!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments on your resent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our breakfast and the breakfast to go bags are a hit for our business travelers that are usually rushing out the door in the mornings. We hope to see soon when traveling to the area.

Summary Heading: bad luck to me and to the hotel as well
Summary: after 1am, the smoke detector started chirping every 15 seconds. I called, someone came up. he's is not the maintainence man. because when he couldn't fix the problem, the just took the battery out and saying the maintaninance man will come in the morning to replace the battery. i thought it's the end of it. unfortunately the chirping started in  no time after the man left. i called again. this time, one staff came in. couldn't figure it out since there is no battery in there. he then just took the detector off....took the detector off....yes. he simply took the detector off. i know it's non-smoking 4th floor. but really? what's the whole purpose of having a smoke detector.
Manager Response: Thank you for your resent stay. We are very sorry to hear about your concerns with the smoke detector. We hope we have another opportunity to see you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: Pretty hotel - Unusable Internet, Very Understaffed Breakfast
Summary: Pretty room and lobby.   Internet was drastically slow.  So slow logging on took many attempts.  Breakfast lacked plates.  Bringing out food was VERY slow.  Crowds of people waiting for food to be brought out was not like being at a decent hotel.  It was awful.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know your concerns during your recent stay. We are looking into it and apologize for the inconvenience.

Summary: Tried getting work done online but internet connection was not steady, cut out frequently -- to much of a hassle to accomplish anything. Decided to give up and watch TV but that also kept cutting out.
Manager Response: We apologize for the issue you experienced with your connection to the Internet and TV during your stay. This is not a normal ocurrance and so sorry it happened to you.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for a few nights during a recent business trip. The hotel features spacious, clean rooms with good bathroom facilities. The hotel wifi is free and has a decent connection speed. Breakfast is okay, if you don't mind the plastic cutlery and such. There is plenty of parking space and as it's just off of one of the main roads, it is a nice quiet location. The hotel staff are very friendly! Beside the hotel, there is a Target store and a variety of smaller shops and restaurants. Within a short drive, there is a good selection of nice restaurants for lunch/dinner. As a place to stay for a few nights, I would recommend this hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for writing about your stay here at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Wwe are glad you enjoyed your stay and it sounds as though we had everything you needed. We hope you are able to come back and stay again soon.

Summary: I Chose this hotel as an alternative distance wise between Huntington Beach and Disneyland. I was not disappointed. The staff was courteous, room was modern and immaculate and breakfast delicious. Thank you for a great night of good rest!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review and staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Your comments will be passed on to our staff. We hope to see you back here again soon.

Summary: Average hotel in this category  They don't have a fridge and microwave in standard rooms. The staff is friendly and very helpful. The rooms are average and the hotel needs remodeling. Breakfast and other amenities are average.
Manager Response: Thank you for your reponse. We are scheduled to have a renovation before the year is up and we will be adding those items.

Summary: nice place,clean, great staff, quiet and welcoming to our Reg Service Dogs. Room was spacious for my powerchair bound husband to move about. Could use to have mini Frig's in room...we had to ask for one. Paying there type of rates one should get mini frig and microwave at least. We will stay here in the future however.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review in reference to your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Great news- we will be renovating our rooms and adding a microwave and refrigerator to all of them!! Looking forward to seeing you here agian.

Summary: Hampton Inn in Cypress provided the most convenient location for us.  Our granddaughter graduated from Long Beach State so visiting her at her dorm was not a problem.  This hotel is also located close to major shopping malls-- a favorite pastime of mine.  The staff here was super friendly.... offering warm cookies in the afternoon.  Will recommend this hotel to family and friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. You are right- we are conveniently located to shopping and restaurants within walking distance. Congratulations to your Grandaughter and we appreciate that you will be recommending us. This message will be passed on to our staff. We hope you come back to Cypress and visit us again soon.

Summary: Don't get me wrong, this is a great hotel with great staff but I was charged extra $50 on my credit card for reasons i don't know. No one told me of the extra charge  when i checked in. I'm guessing this was an incidental fee deposit (it better be) which they will refund? I left the room the way i entered and I'm hoping they take off the $50 or else this wont be the last they would hear from me.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We are glad to hear your stay with us was great. The $50 charge to your credit card is the customary (deposit) for incidentals in case you choose to purchase something from the market etc. It is automaticaly put back on your card within 3-5 business days. Please let us know if there was an issue with this. We strive to get 5 stars!!

Summary: This is a great place to stay when on business will come again next year and may come back with family the breakfast was a treat and helped to get a warm meal on the way to work. Three people from my company had never stayed glad that I recommended that we stay because of my experience with this brand
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review in regards to your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are pleased to know that you have recommended us to your co-workers. We would like to know which company you work for if you have a chance to get back to us and hope to see you again soon..

Summary: comfortable - friendly - quiet - great location - pool super fun for our boys - we were happy with how secluded and yet accessible to businesses nearby - great breakfast, good selections, wifi weak :{
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you back soon!

Summary: We were visiting a destination in Buena Park and reserved well in advance for an accessible room and used the online check-in feature. The room was ready and waiting when we arrived - quick check-in. The room was spacious, clean, attractive and comfortable - just what we expect from Hampton with no surprises. There was no fridge or microwave, so be sure to check the room details when you reserve if that's important to you. We had free "regular" speed Wifi with our HHonors membership and no issues connecting. This hotel is in an office park/business type area so it was mostly deserted on the weekend. Noise level was low and we got a good night's sleep. The breakfast had a good selection and we appreciate healthy options like oatmeal, yogurt and fruit. There's a Target adjacent if
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and the room you needed was ready for you upon arrival. It is always nice to hear such great comments about our hotel and you are right, we are the perfect location surrounded by restaurants, stores, theme parks, beaches and more. We hope to see you again and please note that we are going to have a renovation soon and will be adding microwaves and small refrigerators to all of our rooms.

Summary: The Hampton is a wonderful hotel in a beautiful location where there is minimal traffic.  I had a quiet and relaxing experience during my stay and definitely enjoyed breakfast and the convenient access of computers.  I would definitely suggest this hotel if you are traveling in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a great response in regards to your stay here at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate your business and hope to see you here again soon.

Summary: Nice clean rooms and awesome complimentary belly filling breakfast and free parking. Great staff and the baths and overall hotel is clean and friendly. Very close to Disneyland, about 10 mins drive to the park
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are definitely the perfect hotel for the Disneyland traveler. Just out of the way of all the traffic, lower tax rate, no parking fee and our staff is awesome- you are so right!! We appreciate you choosing us and hope you are back again soon.

Summary: Hotel regular com bom custo benef√≠cio. Staff da recpc√£o atencioso e estacionamento gratuito.  O quarto n√£o tinha frigobar, tivemos que solicitar. A cafeteira fica dentro do banheiro, o que n√£o passou uma boa impress√£o quanto a higiene do local para fazer um caf√©.  Aten√ß√£o: o hotel deveria dar um melhor tratamento ao staff de limpeza do hotel, a partir das 6h da manh√£ foi poss√≠vel ouvir as conversas, gritos e gargalhadas das camareiras, atrapalhando nosso sono.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and will share them with the staff. We are about to have our renovation and there will be refrigerators in all of the rooms. Hopefully you will be back to see the changes!

Summary: Clean, nice staff, great amenities, cost efficient. We stay at this hotel everytime we visit Orange County. The beach is only 15 minutes away, Disneyland and Knotts are super close, and the area is great.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. It sounds as though you took part in a lot of our wonderful surroundings. We are the perfect location for business and obviously pleasure!

Summary: If you're visiting the Orange County area (we were there for a day at Disneyland), we highly recommend this location. Staff is great, food was great and it was pretty central to things. We especially enjoyed the breakfast and being close to a Starbucks AND Target. THUMBS UP!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate your kind comments and will pass them along to our staff. We hope you stay with us again soon.

Summary: Have never ever been let down by the Hilton chain of hotels and this one in particular was clean, quiet, comfy, fully-staffed, and even had free parking!  We always look for the closest location to our sporting venue and hadn't stayed at this particular hotel before, but it was only 2 miles from where we were competing the next day!  Perfect for early mornings and lessened commute time!  Highly recommend for team hotels as well!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write review. We are pleased to hear you had an enjoyable visit and we are happy we were able to host your team. We look forward to having you back with us on your next team event in the area.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel while traveling for a business purpose. The hotel staff went out of their way to ensure that I was happy. I wanted a room that was far from the elevators and faced the East side of the building and they complied! They even presented me with a personalized bottle of water when I checked in. I really like the way that this location is tucked away from the main roads. It's on a little dead end street and it's extremely quite.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write a review about your resent stay. I am very happy to hear the staff was able to accommodate your request and get you in a nice quite location. We hope to see you soon when traveling to the area.

Summary: I was considering renting a movie that night, but the service was down. But overall my stay was very pleasant.  The staff were were great.  The complimentary breakfast was OK.  There was not that much seating.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and writing a review.

Summary: Exelente  servicio nos encanto  como nos resivieron  y nos atendieron  ..la avitacion  sienpre muy linpia y organisada . La comida muy buena . Las Savanas  y tuallas  muy linpias  .El servicio de reception fue muy agradable muchas gracias por aser Nuestras vacaciones muy agradables
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to review the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay and enjoyed our breakfast. We look forward to see you again on your next visit to California.

Summary: Paper thin walls. Adjacent room noise keep you awake all night. Horrible. Billing issue with hotel. Double charged by the hhonors advanced purchase and the hotel. Nope not staying here again. Stay away.
