Manager Response: Thank you taking the time to complete a review. I am very sorry to hear that you had noise concerns during your stay. We hope we have another opportunity to have you as a return guest. We are scheduled to undergo a full renovation later this year.

Summary Heading: Nice stay not far from Disneyland
Summary: My wife and I are retired, so our trips to Disneyland tend to be when schools are in session (generally avoiding weekends). We find the Hampton Inn-Cypress the perfect place to stay. We have stayed there a number of times over the last 8-10 years.  The location is convenient to Disneyland, just 5 miles away; we find our way up to Ball Rd and head east to the Disneyland parking garage.  The Hampton Inn-Cypress is far enough from Disneyland Park that the hotel doesn't charge the higher prices seen at the hotels nearer the park. This hotel caters more to businessmen visiting nearby office locations. Fewer families makes for a quieter hotel environment overall. The area offers a number of familiar restaurants of all sorts  Pricing tends to be higher on weekdays with the business
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. You seem to have the right formula for avoiding the huge crowds. We appreciate you staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress and hope to see you here again soon.

Summary: This location is very nice. The breakfast was very good and the pool was a welcome relief. In the future, if I visit the area again I plan to return to this location. I only wish that their rooms had mini fridges.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Great news- we are going to have small refrigerators in all of our rooms with our renovation just around the corner. Hope to see you back!

Summary: Always a pleasure to stay here. The rooms are clean the personel friendly and well trained.  Breakfast very satisfying with lots to choose from. We use this location because it is close to Los Alamitos racetrack and we come to watch our horses race.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and writing a review. We are conveniently located near the Los Alamitos Race Track and always appreciate our guests here at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We see the horse owners, trainers, jockeys and like you, those who come to watch them race. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: When I travel, I generally stay at Hampton Inn's because of the price point and amenities without "breaking the bank". With that being said, this was the BEST Hampton Inn that I have stayed at on the West Coast or East Coast! The hotel was located off the main road with easy access to local attractions (easy drives to Disneyland, Knotts Berry Farm, Los Alamitos Race Course, which were the purpose for my visit). The staff was always courteous, housekeeping great, and the variety for the free breakfast was great. I would recommend to anyone looking to stay in South California looking for a place to stay near the aforementioned attractions, at a reasonable price!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress and sharing your experience on TripAdvisor. We obviously had all that you needed for your visit. It is always great to be able to share comments like yours with our staff. We hope to see you here again.

Summary Heading: A PLACE THAT MAKES YOU HAPPY TO BE THERE!
Summary: ROOMS UPGRADED and maintained VERY WELL. Kept up landscaping and area beautifully.  Staff service was EXCELLENT.  Everybody was helpful, did not have bad attitudes, and were there to help you in any way you needed. Pricing was was not too steep and you feel like you got more for your money.  THIS IS HOW A HOTEL SHOULD BE RUN!   KUDOS TO "HAMPTON INN AND SUITES".
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your wonderful comments about your resent stay at the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. I can't wait to share your comments with our team. So glad to hear you had an enjoyable visit and can't wait to have you back, see you soon.

Summary Heading: did not grant my request for microwave. Very noisy
Summary: floor above us was very noisy. Request for microwave and refrigerator not granted. We needed to store milk in a frig but the hotel did not provide us with one even with a 3 day advance request. Needed a microwave to warm up my daughters milk but was not provided one.
Manager Response: Thank you taking the time to write a review. I am very sorry to hear that we were unable to honor your request for a refrigerator and microwave. We do have a limited supply and we do our best to honor our guest request, I'm sorry we could not meet your needs. We are scheduled to have a full renovation at the end of this year and we will be adding refrigerators in all our guest rooms. We hope to have the opportunity to see you again in the future.

Summary: This Hampton Inn is located in a very quiet area yet has access to many stores,  restaurants and main roads.   The breakfast is great and all staff are very friendly and professional and helpful.   I definitely recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write a review. We are so glad to hear that you had a nice stay and that you enjoyed our breakfast buffet. We hope to see you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Didn't find any decent hotels in this particular suburban area.  Everything worked well, everything clean, staff friendly and always helpful.  Neighborhood pretty quiet for southern California....not located on a busy arterial, yet close to many amenities and reasonably close to theme parks.  A little pricey for what they have, but then, this is Southern California.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your resent stay. We hope you had a great time visiting Disneyland. See you on your next trip!

Summary: We always choose this hotel when traveling to Cyrpess for work.  It has comfy clean rooms and a decent free breakfast.  Its walking distance to the office another reason for staying here.  Good lighting in the bathrooms :)
Manager Response: Thank you taking the time to share comments regarding your stay. We are happy to hear that you enjoy staying with us and we look forward to having you as a guest on your next business trip to the area.

Summary: We appreciated the cleanliness and size of the room. The room was very spacious and the bed very comfortable. The staff was very friendly and, as always, the hot breakfast was delicious and very much appreciated in the morning. This hotel is close to Long Beach Airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are always pleased to hear that our guests are happy with our hotel and service. We hope to see you back again soon.

Summary: Hotel is clean, staff is very nice. Carlos always greets me warmly and is very professional. Rooms are dated need to be redone they've been this way for as long as I can remember. Breakfast is as cheap as can be with very low quality food.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we appreciate you taking the time to share your comments. Our hotel is schedule to have a full renovation at the end of this year. Carlos is a great asset to our front desk team and we are happy to have him, I will be sure to pass on your comments.

Summary: Was in town for a conference which was in down town Los Angeles.  This hotel was about 35 minutes away.  Beds are super comfortable, staff was friendly and helpful.  Only down sides are  1. No refrigerators in room 2.  No hot tub
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share comments about your resent stay. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit. Our hotel is scheduled to have a renovation at the end of this year and we will be adding refrigerators to all our guest rooms. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Excelente hotel y muy buen servicio.
Summary: Magnifico hotel con un servicio de primera clase, sus empleados muy eficientes, mi familia y yo estuvimos felices de habernos hospedado ah√≠, en un area muy bonita y limpia. Si en el futuro tuvieramos que viajar para esa area, no dudariamos en volvernos a hospedar en ese hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. It was great to hear how much your family enjoyed it and hope to see you back again soon!

Summary: Great staff. Welcomed by name at front desk. All requests promptly met with a smile. Lobby attractive and remodeled. Room furnishings adequate but need to be replaced. Nice, safe, quiet neighborhood with several restaurants and shopping within walking distance
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn Cypress and taking the time to write a review here in TripAdvisor. Your comments are appreciated and will be passed along to our staff. Great news- we are  getting ready to renovate our sleeping rooms!!

Summary: The hotel was clean and spacious, with a good continental breakfast and plenty of seating in the public area for breakfast. The private room (we had a single king) was clean and roomy with an enormous bathroom. My only complaint was that the shower pressure and temperature were a little off, but definitely not bad. Overall, it was a great place to stay. The bed was one of the best I've ever slept in.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Your great comments are appreciated and will be passed on to our staff. We hope to see you here again soon.

Summary Heading: Great Location and Staff, no longer a good value
Summary: I've been staying at this hotel 8 to 10 times a year for quite a few years. The location is quite enough you can sleep with the windows open and the staff is great. Unfortunately, rates have recently increased from around $160 a night to over $200 (with tax) . There as so many alternatives in the area I can't justify it. Too bad.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. Please contact me at 714 484-2502 to discuss your rate. Depending on the days of the week, there might be something I can do to help for future stays.

Summary: Hotel has become way overpriced since new management took over. Will be considering alternatives on next trip to this area. Breakfast getting stale . Same old,same old. Nothing has changed since price increase except more profit to the management.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We understand your concern on the rate changes however, please note that we are going by the standards of hotel operations. It is the concept of supply and demand just like airlines. Our rates do fluctuate at times and we are very sorry to lose you as a guest. We will be going through a renovation soon and appreciate your comments.

Summary: This is a very beautiful hotel, staff is very friendly, and helpful. The complimentary breakfast is great. The bed is so comfortable and the comforter is so warm it was so hard to get out of it. Rooms are very clean I would definitely recommend this hotel to all who are staying in this area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review in regards to your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. It is always a pleasure to hear from our guests and we hope that you will be back to visit us again soon.

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights and were very happy overall. The location is excellent, close to shopping, restaurants and attractions. Breakfast was very good and the staff at breakfast were very helpful. Room was good, however the A/c was not sufficient to keep the room cool. We had to use a fan along with the a/c to sleep well.  I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone that visits the area and wants a good hotel. Since this is a corporate hotel, we got better rates in the weekend compared to week days.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We will be passing on your great comments to our staff. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you back here again.

Summary: We were going to Disneyland but didn't want to stay in a busy area close to it.  This was perfect.  It only took about 10-15 minutes to get there, took longer to park the car than to drive there.  This Hampton is in an industrial area so no restaurants within walking distance but plenty just right up the road.  This area felt very safe and the hotel itself was great.  We love staying at the Hamptons since you can pick your own room before getting there.  You can see what rooms are available and what floor and area you want.  The room itself was very nice with a king bed.  Would definitely stay again if in this area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We always enjoy hearing from our guests at the Hampton Inn Cypress. I am surprised you didn't notice that we are surrounded by more than ten restaurants just across the parking lot by Target!! We hope you come back soon and thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Almost perfect, except they left us stranded on the first day (no room)
Summary: On Jan. 28, 2016, I made reservations to stay at Hampton Inn from 3/22/16 thru 3/28/16.  I arrived at Hampton Inn on 3/23 (around 2am) to find that there were no rooms available. Carlos, the night-shift manager told me that Silena Blan, the manager, "gave" my room to someone else, that the hotel was full and there was "nothing that (he) could do about it". He said Silena overbooked "on purpose", that he didn't know why she overbooked and that Silena hoped I wouldn't show up, even though a few days prior, I called to notify staff that I would be checking in around 1-2:00 am, due to our late flight arrival. During that phone call, I was reassured by Hampton Inn staff that my room would still be available. I had my 3 children & granddaughter with me and had a class to attend at 8am
Manager Response: We apologize for any inconvenience this caused your family. As you had mentioned, you did receive an apology and a basket on your return the next day and we did take care of your charges so hopefully that helped somewhat.  Thank you for your great comments on your stay and the service you did receive on the night you did stay with us. We do appreciate it.

Summary Heading: Morning workouts - don't count on it!
Summary: Hotel has a good workout room but will not allow you into the room until 6am if someone is in a room next to it. Will let you in early if there is no one in the room. No understanding that 6am is not acceptable for those that work out in the morning and have meetings starting at 7am. Most Hampton's have migrate away from this policy, but this one seems to be stuck on sticking to it. Other hotel chains seem to more "friendly" to those concerned about health and working out in the mornings.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing your concerns about the hours available forn our excercise room. We would like to have you back again and if you will let us know ahead of time we can reserve the room next to the excercise room for you. Unfortunately in smaller hotels it is difficult to open the room earlier because it will disturb the guests. Larger hotels have the option to build this room further away from the guset rooms. We are sorry for the inconvenience to your routine.

Summary: clean, friendly staff, and about 20 min drive away from disneyland. will be back for our next disneyland vacation in two months. right next to shopping plaza with dollar tree, target, and lots of food places. totally recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We definitely have everything a traveler needs for business or pleasure. We are looking forward to your trip back in two months. Safe Travels!

Summary: We picked this Hotel because of location and Hilton Honors.  The breakfast has lots of choices and the rooms are very clean.  However, for the price $200 per night, the rooms are the bare essentials and very minimal.  No refrigerators are available. Essentially, a room with a bed.  The bathroom was large with few towels.  Nothing special.  Staff was friendly and tried to be helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments in regards to your stay. Please know that our rates are based on how many rooms are left to sell and just like airlines, they change all the time so the $200 rate could very well be $109 or higher on different dates. We are glad you chose our hotel and hope you will try us again when we have our lower rates available.

Summary: Nice big rooms and baths with shower only.  GPS took me to the back entrance and had to walk by 2 locked doors to get in.  But worth the stroll, nice bright hallways, coffee maker in room but no micro or fridge.  Good breakfast, helpful staff.  Noise from next room, hallway and HVAC.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton. We appreciate your comments. Good news- we are getting ready to undergo our renovation and we will be adding Microwaves and Small Refrigerators! The staff will see your post and will appreciate your mention of them.

Summary: We always enjoy our stays at Hampton Inn. It was 6 miles from Disneyland which was our desired destination. It was also close to the coast so we enjoyed the beach a couple days. Breakfast was always fresh and delicious.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about our Hampton Inn Cypress. We enjoy our Disney visitors. Your comments  will be passed on to the staff.

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel Not Far From Knott's
Summary: My family went to celebrate my daughter's birthday by taking a weekend and spending it an Knott's Berry Farm.  We wanted to get a decent hotel near the park, but we also wanted to stay at a brand in which we were comfortable and familiar.  This Hampton fit the bill.  It is about 4.5 miles from Knott's Berry Farm, but it is south of the freeway, so when you arrive or leave the park, you are opposite of the traffic flow, which is nice.  The hotel was clean and the staff was helpful.  We brought our daughter's friend along with both of our kids, so there were five people in the room.   The staff was kind and helpful and quickly brought in the additional roll-a-way bed for the fifth person.  Having the standard Hampton breakfast fare is always a nice way to start the day as well.
Manager Response: Thank you  for your great review and sharing your experiences during your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Our location is perfect for the vacationers visiting Knott's Berry Farm and Disneyland. We are located within many shops and restaurants and of course The Habit is a favorite! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Lost Rimowa Classic Flight Cabin Suitcase at the hotel side door curb!
Summary: I picked Hampton Inn based on my previous experiences and also this particular location is located behind few buildings from a busy road so it is quiet but still close to Disneyland.  When I checked in at night, the front desk didn't aware I checked in online so he didn't prepare key for me. Then I told him, I checked-in  online so I don't have key. Then he gave me the key.  The next day, I was tired from a whole day of disneyland so I woke up late and had late checkout at 1pm. When I checked out, there were nobody in the lobby and there were only 2 other cars in the side parking lot. Unfortunately, I left my suitcase at the sidedoor curb while pushing the baby stroller to load my baby and her stuff first to the car. Since I was in a hurry to the next sightseeing spot, I forgot
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty to our brand. We are aware of your unfortunate incident which is definitely not the norm for us. If we were aware that you needed help, one of our staff members would have been more than willing to assist you. We hope you have the opportunity to visit us again and we will make the effort to help you and your baby.

Summary: Excellent Team at a standard high quality Hampton Inn.  Highly recommend this property for the usual enjoyable stay.  Enjoyable because it was standard with no surprises or disappointments.  This property is an excellent example of why Hampton Inn is where I prefer to stay on the road.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a response referring to your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Being consistent and offering what the guest expects is key. We appreciate your stay here at the Hampton Inn Cypress and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Stayed at this hotel in the past and was quite satisfied. Called in advance to make sure that we were given a room on the top floor.  When we arrived our room was on the 2nd floor and we were moved up to the 3rd floor after an additional request.   Only 2 towels in the room, had to go to the desk again to get additional towels. Checkin now took 30 minutes  After voicing our concerns the hotel stood by its policy of 100.0% guantee
Manager Response: Thank you for writing your concerns about being on the second floor rather than the third. I am glad to hear you were eventually taken care of and your concerns will be shared with the management.

Summary: Hampton Inn Hotel has excellent service from time of check in to time of check out. Housekeeping was efficient and diligent. Breakfast is amazing! I love the bacon and eggs! Fitness room was always clean and well maintained. I definitely recommend Hampton Inn to family and friends. They would be my #1 choice in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for making us your number one choice here at the Hampton Inn Cypress!! I will be passing on your comments to our staff in regards to your praises to our housekeeping, front desk and breakfast. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Rooms are clean and free of any smells, the staff is extremely attentive, and the price is great.  Breakfast could offer more healthy options but overall, it was very good.  I appreciated the brown bags I could grab on my way out when I did not have time for breakfast - they had a cereal bar, a muffin, bottled water and an apple - great to grab on the go.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at our Hampton Inn Cypress. Your comments on the cleanliness and attentive staff is such a big part of what we are proud of here. I am glad to see our Grab N' Go breakfast worked well for you. Safe travels and hope you make it back soon.

Summary Heading: Great place for a family stay. Nice, friendly and super clean hotel.
Summary: I have stayed here a handful times and I would not stay anywhere else when I am in the area. The staff is amazing and very friendly no matter what time of the day. As we were sitting in the dining room, the general manager Silena Blan introduced herself and asked how we were enjoying our stay. I really appreciate that she cared enough to ask if we were satisfied and comfortable.  That shows a lot of integrity and pride. If you are in the area, this is a must stay hotel. Restaurants, Starbucks,Target and many other stores are in walking distance. Thank you Hampton Inn Cypress. See you soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review in regards to your stay here at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are very proud of our staff and after meeting our General Manager Silena Blan you can definitely see that the caring and pride trickles down to all of the employees. Wee have taken great strides in the training, resulting in the cleanliness and provisions of everything needed for our travelers. We hope to see you again.

Summary: I came down on the 2/24 for a family trip it was my 50 aniversery. We had a cruise to go to on the 26th so we left and didnt come back to the hotel for about a week. The stay was great at the hotel but what stood out to me was what happened when i came back from my cruise the girl working at the front desk valerie remebered that we had a cruise and remebered that it was our aniversery and asked us and really seemed to care about our trip. When we where leaving to head back to vancover she asked my girls if they wanted coloring books for the long 19 hour drive. I was a travel agent for 20 years i know good hotels and how great  customer service looks and thats it. The Breakfast was amazing it had alot of options for my 2 grandaughters and my husband aswel. The rooms where a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and let us know about your experience at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We will definitely pass your comments on to our management and staff with the spotlight on Valerie. We appreciate your comments and hope you visit us again soon- Happy Anniversary!

Summary: Our stay at the Hampton in Cypress, CA was great.   The rooms were clean, the bathrooms were roomy, beds comfy, staff very friendly and the parking was FREE!!!!  Would really like the breakfasts Hamptons offer to be healthier.
Manager Response: Thank you  for your review regarding your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Great staff, clean rooms, complimentary Parking, Breakfast and Wifi. Glad you  enjoyed your stay- It sounds as though we provided everything you needed!

Summary: We have stayed in this hotel before and with this most recent stay we found the hotel to be even better than before. The staff was most friendly and helpful. It is very quiet, clean and a joy to stay there. I do think the value for the dollar for all Hampton Inns is above what it should be and it continues to increase. They should do a price reduction even though they give 10% for AAA and AARP - especially for seniors on retirement income. Their business would increase tremendously!! I would recommend this hotel for anyone to visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review about your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We take great pride in our staff training to ensure our guests are comfortable during their stay. We have made several changes and it is good to see the improvements are showing by the comments we receive. We greatly appreciate that you will be recommending us to others. We hope to see you here again.

Summary Heading: Always a good stay- great breakfast
Summary: This hotel is consistently well run.  Good front desk, clean and comfortable rooms (the bed is especially good. Always consistent Hampton Inn quality, but never a glitch.  I stay here often when I am in the area. But, the free breakfast is really the winner here - they get it right!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience in regards to your stay here at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We take great pride in our hotel and staff and it obviously is showing! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: What Makes Good Sleep For You?
Summary: For my nephew, this room would have been perfect. He really likes a little background noise when he sleeps on his super soft bed. So he runs a fan in his room all night. But that's not for me. I like a quiet room while I slumber. And I like a bed with a little substance to it. This room was nice, having a frig and microwave and a small desk. Actually, the desk was super small. The bed, sold as a king size bed, was a problem. It was not long, my feet hanging over the end. And it was so soft, I sank in a good 4 inches. I like to sit on the bed and read email, play on my iPad, or what ever. But this bed was way too soft to sit on, no support. And the wood headboard was uncomfortable to lean against. And that noise my nephew likes so much? The mini-frig was 8 feet from my head and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review in TripAdvisor. We are always interested in what our guests have to say. It only helps us get better and provide what the traveler is looking for. We apologize for the issues you encountered.   Unfortunately it is not going to get back the sleep you lost but to let you know so you hopefully give us another chance, we are slated for a renovation this year and there will be all new mattresses. Again thank you for your input.

Summary Heading: Booked a Room & a Meeting Room for 3 days
Summary: Excellent stay & meeting room experience. The staff was very attentive to our needs. We are an established business looking for a Hotel to conduct future meetings along with Hotel rooms for visitors. We will call on these folks again based on our Excellent experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review in regards to your sleeping and meeting room at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We take great pride in our service. Thank you for the business and we hope to see you back soon.

Summary: The Room was HUGE, for a family of 4 it was great.  They were REAL Queen Beds. The bathrooms were clean and the beds extremely comfortable.  I would definitely stay at this hotel in the future.  For a business person, this would be a GREAT hotel also.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great comments in regards to our Hampton Inn Cypress. We are very proud of our hotel and all it havs to offer. You are right, we do cater to the corporate traveler during the week!

Summary: Used this hotel once again for a Disneyland trip, a good quiet location, nice standard Hampton room, good breakfast, friendly staff.  Only thing lacking was a hot tub in the pool area, other than that, it's a good place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are the perfect stay for Disneyland travelers- no hustle and bustle along with complimentary parking, lower sales tax and a great staff..We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Very comfortable, quiet and excellent value.  12 minutes to Disneyland and yet quiet and easy to access.  A new location for us when we are traveling to Disneyland! We have stayed at several Hampton Inns and this one is equally impressive and does not disappoint.  The kids loved the hotel, and breakfast was a plus.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to review the Hampton Inn by Hilton Cypress. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your resent visit to our property. Hope you had a wonderful visit to Disneyland and we can't wait to see you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: The hotel was very clean but the staff were not very friendly. Staffs are very short and not really to provide much help. But I had great experience with other Hamptons. The TV didn't for the whole time I stayed. It was supper ball weekend. I was very disappointed with that. Other Hamptons I stayed in always provided a bottle of water for the Hilton Honors. this one didn't provide anything.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review. We apologize for the TV not working, especially Super Bowl Weekend.I am not sure if you reported it and they were unable to fix it. We do provide bottled water to our Platinum and Gold Members as well as Silver if requested. I am hoping you give us another chance!!

Summary: We had great time at this hotel. Service excellent, front desk people very friendly.  Next door to a big shopping center. Spring time in early February, trees in blossoms and weather - 80-85 F degrees.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Your message will be passed on to our staff and we hope to see you again.

Summary: Hotel bastante pr√≥ximo ao parque da Disney.  Quartos espa√ßosos conta acomoda√ß√£o para at√© 5 pessoas que era o tamanho da minha fam√≠lia.  Limpo,  com funcion√°rios muito atenciosos e camaradas.  Pre√ßo dentro do esperado para regi√£o.  Ao lado existe um supermercado para fazer pequenas compras para lanches.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Glad to see you enjoyed your visit to Disneyland!

Summary: I had stayed this hotel several times, and this time used again for my business trip from Japan. Only 30 minutes drive from LAX and a few minutes for our on site subsidiary in Cypress. Location also very convenient to many restaurants there, and all staffs are very friendly to us foreigners, thus the other Japanese are using this hotel. I will stay for the next time also.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments on the Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate that you took the time to share your thoughts. We hope to see you again soon and appreciate your business.

Summary: The hotel is well maintained. Breakfast was a nice surprise with a large assortment of choices.  Our room was clean and the bed was very comfortable.  The staff is friendly and helpful.   Lastly, because the property is tucked away from Katella Avenue, so there was no traffic noise.  We will choose this property again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and your comments will be passed on to our staff. We hope to see you again soon.

Manager Response: Thank you for your comments. Hampton Inn is perfect for the traveler is looking for complimentary parking,breakfast and wifi.

Summary: I chose this hotel because of the location to my friend's residence. The room was clean and had everything I needed (towels, coffee) and the breakfast was delicious. I did like that people could sit and eat in the lounge with the Rose Bowl parade playing on the big screen. It was great to be able to eat early because we had to hit the road by 7 AM
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review and your stay at our Hampton Inn Cypress. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay. Happy New Year and hope to see you here again

Summary: The hotel was nice other than the room had no microwave or refrigerator, which is not good for a multi-day stay with family.  I was able to use the microwave in the breakfast room after talking with the staff.  The TV was also a bit on the small size.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are excited that a renovation of our hotel is in the plans for this year and we will be adding microwaves and small refrigerators. There is going to be a big change and we hope you will return to see it!!

Summary: Um bom hotel na regi√£o de Los Angeles, com caf√© da manh√£ inclu√≠do, o que representa um valor adicional √† hospedagem. Apesar de estar longe da maioria das atra√ß√µes de Los Angeles, o hotel √© bem localizado para quem est√° chegando de Las Vegas, com bons restaurantes nas proximidades e centros comerciais.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Hampton Inn Cypress. You are correct, we are closer to the attractions in Orange County such as Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm but the Los Angeles attractions are freeway close within 30-40 miles. We are glad you enjoyed the hotel . Happy New Year!

Summary: Stayed at this Hampton again for a quick Disneyland Trip.  Cheaper than most other like hotels in the area.  Typical Hampton where they are stingy with some things. But the basics (bed, building, area) are good, the rooms are clean, the breakfast is ok.  Good value overall.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review. Disneyland during the holidays is fantastic and being able to celebrate their 60th anniversary had to be a special event.

Summary: I chose this hotel because it was close to the location of the home of the friends we were visiting.  The hotel is clean the staff is very friendly and professional.  There is one small detail that I would change.  The window coverings should be upgraded to allow the drapes to be fully closed so there is not an abundance of light (in the morning) when you are sleeping.  I would recommend this hotel due to my overall experience.  I have no complaints.  The staff is very helpful, friendly and professional.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and great suggestion. We will be going into a renovation 2016 and this will be taken care of. We appreciate your comments and will pass them along to our staff.

Summary: Staff was very pleasant. The lobby was clean and modern. The room was large , but contained small old furniture. Beds were too soft for my liking and pillows were ridiculously small. Complementary breakfast was just ok.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Unfortunately you were not able to benefit from our upcoming renovation. We hope you will be able to return to see the progress we are making.

Summary Heading: Hospitality was wonderful. Felt like I was at home Ganey
Summary: I've literally been traveling and staying at hotels all throughout this year. Most have been pleasant, some okay, and some that were / are horrible. After staying at my last two hotels that were / are frustrating, especially Best Western Plus in Santa Ana which has the worst customer service that I've ever experience of all the hotels I've been at (over 100 this year),  I've had the pleasure of staying at the Hampton Inn Los Angeles/Orange County in Cypress.   I flew in from a trip at Puerto Vallarta, Mexico. Even though the flight wasn't long, it was a long day and I just wanted to relax and chill in my room.   I was pleasantly greeted by Arely, a front desk staff at the Hampton. She may have notice the frustration on my face due to my brand new iPhone that I just brought but
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a great review pertaining to your stay at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are passing the word on to our management team and staff and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Enjoyed our stay.  Friendly helpful staff, great breakfast and rooms were clean.   I would stay here again and I would recommend this hotel to others.   The front desk staff were able to find a binder I accidentally left and they saved it for me and returned  it as soon as I walked into the lobby.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about our staff here at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We take great pride in them and it is great to hear their ongoing training is not going unrecognized. Your message will be paased on to them.

Summary Heading: NO sleep because of noisy boiler.
Summary: I checked in on 24 nov 2015  . Hotel was presented well as was my room . I retired to bed , unfortunately it appears me room was next to the boiler room as i was not able to sleep with the noise of the boiler . Try as i did i could not settle so went to reception and it was confirmed to me that the noise that was keeping me awake was in fact the boiler. i had no choice but to leave the hotel and i checked out at 5am hence my lack of sleep and my very early start made my whole day very uncomfortable. I will not be staying here again.
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere apologies for your stay last week. I have passed this information on to our maintenance staff to look into why the noise level was so high. Again, we are very sorry for the inconvenience this had caused you.

Summary: This hotel is very close to Disneyland. Breakfast is very good just like the Hampton standard. However during our visit the Juice machine seem to be down and there were no substitute whatsoever. So either you drink coffee or nothing during breakfast. I feel bad for the kids who had nothing to drink during breakfast. Front desk was very prompt but maintenance was slow. Housekeeping did a great job in our room but there seem no cleaning crew for the public places throughout the breakfast area lobby , and pubic restroom. This property seems to be a off the Hampton standard when it comes to general areas. But Rooms were great!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your comments and will pass them on to the rest of the managemet team and staff.

Summary: Me encanta llegar a este hotel, su ubicaci√≥n, cercana a las oficinas de mi empresa, a diversos centros comerciales, lo hace ideal.  Ni hablar de las instalaciones, hotel limpio, confortable y con un personal profesional y amable, con un buen sentido de servicio al cliente.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review in regards to Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate your business and kind words. We take great pride in our staff and will pass your comments on to them.

Summary: This hotel is in a great location for my needs.  I have stayed there before and have been satisfied as well.  Quiet location in a Business District area away from noisy main roads, but within a couple of blocks to main stream roads where you can find a number of restaurants and stores.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate your buisness and it is always great to hear the nice comments. Hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: Friendly Staff, clean rooms, nice breakfast and very quiet rooms as it is not located near a noise freeway.  Easy access to Long Beach area,  Knotts Berry Farm, and Disneyland.  We will return again soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Hampton Inn Cypress. We appreciate your business and will pass your great comments on to our staff. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: So found a deal online and decided to book a 2 night stay. Here's a quick overview: - Area a little industrial but seemed quite safe. Lots of restaurants around though. - Lobby was very nice with unlimited coffee and tea 24hrs! (Loved this!) - We were given first floor (rm 127). Have a sneaky suspicion it is because we had a small child with us. Room was right next door to the gym where we could hear people running on the treadmill til late at night. (Gym closes at midnight) - Also was given a room for people with disabilities. The shower had no tub, just a large seat and curtain. When we showered the water went all over the bathroom floor and made it slippery. When we asked to move rooms, the staff didn't allow us!!! ***this is why I can't give more than 3 stars :( - Pool was
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I am very sorry that you were not happy with your room assignment during your recent trip. We strive to accommodate all reservations but occasionally cannot meet every room request. We hope you will consider giving us a second chance if you return to the area.

Summary Heading: Good place to stay to visit Long Beach, Anaheim and LA beaches
Summary: Good value compared to other hotels in area. It was good staging ground for me to attend my conference at the Anaheim Convention center. It was also an easy drive to Long beach, Hermosa beach and Santa Monica. Pretty easy drive to Carson. The only hard part is driving during that LA traffic rush hour. But if you manage to drive around low peak times it is easy. The hotel was pretty clean and I could not find fault. The staff was incredibly friendly and they put me on to the California fish grill. Thank you! The breakfast was great! I would stay here again when visiting the LA area. I just wish the Pool was bigger but they referred me to the La Mirada splash center which only 3 bucks and not far away. The carpet by the elevators was a little worn but they were replacing it
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review! We are located away from the hustle and bustle yet close enough and easy access to so many of the Southern California beaches and attractions. Thank you for staying atthe Hampton Inn Cypress and we hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: Highly recommended - great value, clean rooms, helpful staff, good hot breakfast.  Close enough to Disney parks to stay - no shuttle from hotel, but a close drive.  USA Today daily, hot coffee in lobby 24/7, coffee maker in room, quiet area of town.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We take great pride in our staff at the Hampton Inn Cypress and receive such wonderful comments. We hope to see you again in the future and will pass your comments onto our employees.

Summary: ‰ªï‰∫ã„Åß1ÈÄ±ÈñìÊªûÂú®„Åó„Åæ„Åó„Åü„Åå„ÄÅÁâπ„Å´„Ç≥„É°„É≥„Éà„Åô„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„ÇÇ„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇÁ∂∫È∫ó„Åß„Åó„Åü„Åå„ÄÅ„Ç≥„Ç§„É≥„É©„É≥„Éâ„É™„Éº„ÇÇÂ∞ë„Å™„Åè‰∏ç‰æø„Åß„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ ÊúùÈ£ü„Åå„Éñ„ÉÉ„Éï„Çß„Å†„Å£„Åü„Åë„Å©„ÇÇ„ÄÅ„ÅÑ„Åæ„ÅÑ„Å°„ÄÇ
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments on your stay with us for a week. Please let us know what we can do to improve on our Kedoma Breakfast, We enjoy learning from our guests and thank you for the business.

Summary: Upon checking in i found a toenail in my bed. had a night comped. also fridge and microwave are upon request. when room was cleaned only sheets were re-made no coffee refilled. fridge did not keep food cool.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay. We appreciate your feedback and we‚Äôre very sorry for the issue with your room during your stay. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again in the future

Summary Heading: Nicer stay than in Oakland but consistent in TERRIBLE breakfast
Summary: Room nice and clean plus a comfy bed. The wifi is also working well, I have purchased a premium connection in order to use FaceTime   The breakfast is still a joke, and insult to the concept of breakfast. Why is it so hard to serve something that is healthy? Terrible.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We always learn from our valued guest and any recommendations are always welcome. Along with a variety of items we offer fresh fruit, yogurt, and oatmeal hoping to please everyone's taste and dietary needs. Is there something you would like to see as an addition?

Summary: My wife and I have stayed at this property several times. On this particular stay there was a problem with the air conditioning unit in our room. When it could not be fixed quickly, we were moved to a new room without delay. The staff at this location is extremely attentive and quick to deal with any issues that come up. We have always been very pleased when we stay here.
Manager Response: We are always happy to hear from our pleased guests. We apologize for the problem you encountered but good to hear it was handled right away. Thank you for staying with us and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Price was great. Building was clean, easy to access, rooms were clean, spacious and comfortable. Breakfast was great, a good variety, hot food, cold food, fruits and coffee.  I plan to stay here in the future
Manager Response: Thank you for your review- we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I cannot say enough about the customer service at this hotel!  Carrington at the front desk was AMAZING!!!!  He was helpful, kind, considerate, knowledgeable, and observant!  He went out of his way to do the BEST at his job and it was noticed!!!  The breakfast crew was amazing!!  The food was so good and they were so kind and courteous!! And the breakfast room was kept SO CLEAN!!!  My only criticism of this hotel is the carpet!  Sad to say it desperately needs to be replaced!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words. I will make sure Carrington is copied on this. We take great pride in our customer service and conduct an ongoing training program.

Summary: Excellent hotel- very clean. Staff are all extremely friendly and helpful. Have stayed several times and this is a more reasonably priced hotel than others in the area- cleanliness matters most to us and this hotel fits the bill.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words. I will pass on your compliments to our staff  about your comments on friendliness and cleanliness. We are very proud of them

Summary: Slightly out of the way for dining but this is a very nice property, about 9 miles from LGB. Hotel has had some remodel, could use just a bit more but all in all a comfortable, friendly, nice hotel. Incredibly quiet for LA.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We get a lot of compliments on the new lobby area. It is very comfortable and spacious. We are slated for our room renovation soon. We appreciate your business.

Summary Heading: Closed to KONE Office at Cypress
Summary: Walking like two blocks you can arrive to our local office and it is well located for meals you can find a great variety of things to eat and to do It is an excelent option for a bussines trip. Ammenities are great and have very god service for internet, room service and different other supports that makes your staying a great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with the Hampton Inn Cypress. We always enjoy seeing your company Kone here. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I would recommend this Hampton in to everyone! It was as good as a 5 star hotel in my opinion. The beds were very comfortable, the shower had great pressure, the the heater and air worked precisely, my room was in the perfect location because I am a smoker and had to go outside every time I wanted a cigarette and being a non-smoking hotel, they even had ashtrays outside for us smokers to use. The complimentary breakfast was very tasty and the check-in check-out experience was painless in every way!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Perfect location and great breakfast is what we like to hear. Hope to see you back soon.

Summary: Stayed here for the first time and was very satisfied with the property.  The hotel is very nice and clean except for the carpet immediately outside of the elevator on the second floor.  It is worn and needs to be replaced, but that's all.  The breakfast is very good and lots to choose from and the cookies later in the day are yummy!  The staff was all very polite and accommodating.   I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We do get a lot of traffic from the pool to the elevators but I am glad to tell you, we are replacing the carpetas I write this.

Summary: We stayed at Hampton for the last 2 nights of our 2 week California road trip. Of the various hotels we stayed during our vacation we all thought this was the nicest. The hotel seemed upscale, but still reasonable price. Hotel and rooms were excellent. No complaints from us. The staff very professional,and super friendly. Our room was very large. No issues. AC was ice cold. Rooms were quiet at night. Our Bathroom was large. Breakfast was the best. It had good variety and was constantly being cleaned and refilled by staff. Other hotels we stayed at was challenged to keep food from running out. We really like the convenient location close to the beaches and good base for visiting family in Orange County. There are plenty of restaurants nearby to eat at.  We would 100% stay here
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice comments about our staff at the Hampton Inn Cypress. I will make sure they read  your review. We take great pride in the ongoing training Hilton provides to ensure all of our guests are treated well.

Summary: This is my second stay at HI-Cypress and it was a quick overnighter during a trip around So CA. I was pleasantly greeted at check-in and had pre-selected my room the day before. The room was clean and quiet and anyone staying in this area should give consideration to this hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. A hotel that is clean and quiet defintely makes for a comfortable stay. We appreciate your comments.

Summary Heading: Excellent value and a good location
Summary: This is a nicely presented hotel, clean and tidy although the rooms are a little dated.  Breakfast is fairly standard budget food but is well set out and has enough choice for most palates.  The hotel is located just off the main Katella Avenue through Cypress and is next door to a range of stores and restaurants.  Despite its position, the hotel seems very quiet and is unaffected by traffic or other noise.  Being within a short drive of Orange County airport and the Disney parks at Anaheim and close to the freeway network for easy travel to Long Beach and LA, this is a great value hotel and we would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. You are right, we are freeway close to many major highways and conveniently located to shops and restaurants. Thank you for staying at the Hampton Inn Cypress. Wwe are slated for our renovation in 2016. Hope you make it back to see all the improvements.

Summary: Gutes, ziemlich komfortables Hotel. Sehr freundlicher Empfang und sauberes, gro√ües Zimmer. Gute Ausstattung, Gro√üer Pool, allerdings direkt auf dem Parkplatz. Gutes, amerikanisches Fr√ºhst√ºcks-B√ºffet Allerdings auch hier mit viel Plastikteller- und Pappbecher-M√ºll. Das Hotel liegt etwas abgelegen, daf√ºr aber sehr ruhig.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We stayed for four nights on a recent trip to the Los Angeles area and used the Hampton Inn Orange County/Cypress as our base for visiting Disneyland.  The hotel is located less than 15 minutes west of the Disney parks, directly west on Katella Ave.    We took Katella to Euclid (left on Euclid) and then turned right on Ball.  We then took Ball to the entrance to the Mickey and Friends Garage on Disneyland Drive (the parking lot that has a tram to take you right to the entrance of the parks).  It's a very easy drive, which I appreciated sinceI wasn't very familiar with driving in the LA area.  The hotel is also easy to find driving from LAX (it's about a 45 minute drive).  The best part of staying here versus hotels closer to the park is that this hotel seemed to cost
Manager Response: Seems as though you have found the perfect route to Disneyland Parking!! Thank you for your wonderful comments about Frank. He has been with us since we opened the hotel nine years ago. I will make sure he reads these comments.We realize we are fortunate to have him on board!

Summary Heading: Very helpful staff, a great base
Summary: This was at the end of a 3 week trip for us.  We just needed a base to do our last minute shopping and fit in a beach trip to Huntingdon beach.  Staff were so lovely and helpful here.  The swimming pool was great for a quick dip.  The complimentary breakfast was well stocked and they handed out colouring in packs to the children at breakfast.  Really well stocked free coffee bar available all day.  They were very quick to bring up extra towels and the crib for our youngest.  They also called the room to make sure we didn't need anything else. The room was a good size as we packed all our bags for the flight home.  The carpets in the hall ways were incredible dated, but this place was really good value with free parking.  Lots of other guests were going to Disney from here, I
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and thank you for staying with us. Great to hear your family enjoyed their stay.

Summary: Not the usual Hampton standard, especially for the price we paid. Nancy at the check in has been very nice. Complementary cookies and coffee\tea in the hall (decaf was quite strong). There is a vending suite, a conference room open 24\7 and a gym open until midnight. We had a disabled room, wide but a little bit shabby. Tiles, in the shower, were crashed and the furniture was a little old fashioned. Our room was on 1st floor, facing the parking lot. The bedroom was comfortable, except for the too soft pillows, with a large king bed, a TV and a wardrobe. The room and the bathroom were both clean. Toiletries didn't include makeup removers or shoe mitt. WiFi worked well. Hotel offers a wide parking lot. Average breakfast. I'd definitely stay here again, but for the rate.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: I typically stay at a Hampton when traveling as I rarely find one that doesn't meet my standards. This one was perfect for us. Nice location with plenty of places around to eat and shop.   The room we were in was beginning to show its age. The bathroom had cracked grout and some of the floor tiles were loose. Otherwise the room was clean and the staff was friendly.   The free breakfast had a good selection.   I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to say that we are slated for a room renovation soon!! Hope you travel back this way to see the progress in 2016.

Summary: Our 1st time out to California was easy and  restful for us.  The hotel was clean, quiet, and centrally located for all that we did.   The staff were helpful when we need directions and forgot some things.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review- the hotel is in a very quiet location. We take great pride in our staff and attention to detail.

Summary: I know what you are thinking but it was actually really hot at our house last night so we booked an overnight at the Hampton. Staff was really friendly, room was clean and comfortable and the AC was on full blast. Free breakfast was typical for hotel but the staff kept the serving area spotless.  It was nice treat for the family. Good job Hampton Inn!
Manager Response: What a wonderful idea on these hot summer nights to have a "Staycation" with your family and stay in a nice airconditioned room, go swimming, go out a nice restaurant within walking distance and wake up to breakfast all ready cooked for you!!  Thank you for your review of the Hampton Inn Cypress.

Summary: The quality of the room and cleanniness was great. The beds were comfy. We stayed with our children and planned outings for the next day, a lot of activities were accessible from the hotel. The breakfast was better than I expected. Lots of choices and the hot waffles were a big hit! Would definitely stay here again. The only thing that bothered me was the AC was a bit noisy, kept waking up at night.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. There are many options within walking distance, great breakfast and I will pass the comments on to our housekeeping department on the cleanliness of our rooms.

Summary: The hotel staff are accommodating and on the ball!  The rooms we stayed in were clean and well cared for when we returned each day.  Our favorite part was how comfortable the beds were.  So thankful for the full breakfast each morning.  Not too many Hotels do this well like Hampton Inn.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review in Trip Advisor. We do get a lot of compliments on our comfortable beds. Great to hear our guests get a good night sleep and a great breakfast in the morning.

Summary: The team goes out of their way to make the stay feel like home.  Great location and easy access.  The rooms are nice and everybody seems to spend lots of time in the lobby, it is a great gathering place for business meetings on off time.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review for the Hampton Inn Cypress. We are proud of our team and I will make sure they see your comments. Our breakfast is very popular with our guests and glad to hear you enjoyed it THank you for staying with us.

Summary: I will recommend this hotel for any body who is traveling for business. The rooms are very clean and quiet and the complimentary internet works perfectly but, if you are traveling for leisure or with family I will not recommended it. Also, the rugs in the hallways and in front of the elevators need to be replaced immediately they are dirty and old. Overall I can say my stayed was satisfied.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your suggestions and will send it to the management team.  We hope you visit us again soon.

Would recommend honestly to anyone looking for a comfortable & safe place to stay. Also great for families wanting to visit Disneyland :)

De ligging van het hotel is perfect. Op 10-15 minuten rijden van het disneyland park. Supermarkt om de hoek. Ook Universal Studios en downtown LA zijn (mits geen file) in een 35-40 minuten te bereiken. Dus prima uitvalsbasis voor LA en omstreken. Wij zouden er zeker terugkomen.

It is also walking distance (or a 1 minute car ride) to Target for supplies, groceries etc. Walking distance to a number of restaurants or fast food too. If you've never been to California and are tempted to go to a national fast food chain for burgers, try In-N-Out or Habit instead. If you're looking for Taco Bell go to Del Taco. Summary Heading: Nice, family hotel that is not too far from Disneyland.
Summary: The location is on Katella which is about 7 miles from Disneyland.  It actually takes about 20 minutes to get there and park.  The breakfast at this Hampton Inn is better than other Hampton Inns.  The staff does a great job keeping everything well stocked and clean.  The rooms are nice and clean as well.  There are restaurants and stores within a short drive.  Overall a very nice location and well kept hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We've been staying in Hampton Inn's all over America and with each there are local nuances that make it feel like it's special.    The Cypress Hampton is in a fairly new part of town and is peaceful. No noise of traffic to break your sleep and the room temperature was perfect! No noisy air conditioners here!!   The breakfast buffet has different options than some of the others, such as the bagel toppers and there's different options for toast spreads, would have liked some plain bagels and peanut butter, but the waffles and oatmeal were still good.  There's a large dining area to sit in and plenty of space to sit around.  The staff are friendly and welcoming. They helped us out greatly when my luggage was lost from the flight, and looked after my bag when it eventually arrived.

Summary: I'm not sure what other people that write reviews about this hotel or other places to stay are expecting from a Hampton Inn. However, I will tell you as a frequent business traveler for the past 25 years the reason why travelers choose the lower tier of Hilton Hotels like the Hampton is because typically they are all the same. The layout is usually identical, the rooms are similar including the earth tone paint and pictures on the wall. What's sets each one apart is primarily the staff and the age of the establishment. This particular Hampton has a staff that is extremely courteous and respectful which is not always an easy task after reading multiple hotel reviews over the years.  Guests need to get a grip on nights in a hotel and quit treating them as your personal garbage.

For example, we visited Disneyland California (approximately 20 minutes away) and a number of family friendly beaches that were fantastic. Summary Heading: Not what I was hoping for..
Summary: This hotel was OK. We had stayed at the Hampton Inn in Burbank a couple of months ago and was expecting the same thing. It wasn't. Burbank had a wonderful breakfast with Krispy Kreme donuts! In the evening they had warm cookies and milk in the lobby! The breakfast at Cypress was minimal at best. The 1st day the milk was bad and we had to ask for it to be replaced. No sweetened cereals. I appreciate the healthful thought but, I can decide for myself, thank you.  The room never had cream and sugar packets. I brought them up from the lobby every evening for the next morning. The shower was so cold one morning I washed in the sink the next day before we left. Would not stay here again especially for the price.

The hotel is off the main street (Katella) in an office park so it is very quiet.  Within walking distance are two strip malls, one with a Target, and many resturants.  Disneyland is a 20 minute drive straight east on Katella.  The ocean is a 20 minute drive in the opposite direction.  The hotel is approximately 30 minutes from John Wayne Airport.   Our room was spotless and the beds comfortable.  We would stay in this hotel again.

Summary Heading: Good stay that one expects from Hampton.
Summary: Hampton Inns are probably my go-to hotels when travelling for business. The free internet, breakfast and a usually above-average standard make them a good value-for-money. You usually know what you are going to get--not luxurious by any means, but also a clean, functional and decent place to stay.   The Hampton Inn in Cypress met most of my expectations. Clean, decently appointed room; comfy bed; good internet; breakfast; decent rate. Is located on a side street off of Katella Ave (a very busy street), so it is quiet.   This hotel is kind of in the middle of nowhere, so a car is very necessary (we were at a convention at the Anaheim Convention Center; a 15 min drive down Katella).   The only thing that I would want to bring to the management attention is the front-desk staff.

Very pleasant and courteous staff. I will stay here again. They represent the high values I have come to expect from Hampton Inn.

Summary: We frequent Hampton Inns quite frequently with two kids and travel sports and this one happens to be one of the best in California. Check in was fast and easy at 5:00pm on a Thursday. Summary: Stayed at the Hampton from 16 July for 7 nights. Peace and quiet were the order of the day. The hotel catered for both holiday makers and business people. I am a Hilton Diamond member so the Hilton family is my primary choice when traveling.

Summary Heading: Clean, quiet,  but have to wait for breakfast
Summary: This is a very nice hotel... near Disneyland and the Anaheim area but not in the busy area. Quiet location, good parking, clean, and nice beds and showers. However, the complimentary breakfast was not stocked well on more than one stay. I think they miscalculate how many people are staying there for night and can't keep up with the breakfast rush.... i wouldn't complain if it was just once but we experienced the same thing on more than one occasion. There is a Starbucks across the way if you should experience this tho... :) also i was impressed when i asked for an extra towel that the front desk gave me 3! not stingy just maybe slow?!!!!

Summary Heading: Worst Hampton Inn I have stayed in
Summary: I always stay at hampton inns, I always get very good service and price, until this location. I was very disappointed when we first got here and we had trouble with putting in honor points, then we got to the room and found out that the room did not have a sleeping sofa, nor microwave or fridge. The room was clean but the room felt exesibly humid when we got there and it took a great while foe it to be on a decent temperature. One of our room keys got demagnetize with my cell phone in less than 5 minutes that I had it in my purse..... And finally, there is no hot tub in the pool area. I am probably spoiled but out of all sincerity, hampton inn is my favorite hotel, but this one is the worst one ever. Don't stay here.

Summary: The Hampton inn Cypress location is a very nice property! An added bonus, for some weekend night time fun it is about a mile from Los Alamitos horse race track! Good times!  The rooms are good size and the beds and pillows are comfortable. Summary Heading: Comfortable, Very Clean and Great location
Summary: A great value and experience for a family or business traveler.  Very user friendly and high quality fitness equipment, so I enjoyed my run on the treadmill.  The pool was very clean and comfortably warm on the cool night we stayed. Staff very friendly and willing to help us in anyway possible, though we did not have any extra requests.  Conveniently located near Medieval TImes (which we visited on this trip) as well as Knots Berry Farm.  They are across the street from each other and both about 3 miles from this hotel.  Disneyland pretty close as well, but closer to 5 miles away.

Summary Heading: Good business hotel in the area
Summary: Most hotels in this general area seem to be clustered by the water, where they're expensive, or near Disneyland, where you're at risk of being next door to late-night partiers or screaming kids. In between, there is Los Alamitos and Cypress, with a handful of business-oriented hotels with a reasonable room rate.  Unlike some of the other nearby hotels (Courtyard and Residence Inn) that are right on Katella Ave, this one is set about a quarter mile back from the main road, so is very quiet.  As Hamptons go, this is above par, with efficient service and unusually large rooms.  Also, unlike the hotels near the water or near Disneyland, they don't charge for parking here.  Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Thrown in a Smoking Room, "by accident"
Summary: Coming in from Boston a few weeks ago, I checked into the Hampton Inn Cypress CA location. Was welcomed by a semi friendly fellow, Booked through hotels.com (selected NonSmoking King). I was pre checked in, the guy just handed me a key card and sent me to the elevators. I crashed. The first morning I woke up to the worst headache and stuffed upper respiratory symptoms I had in 10 years. I kinda noticed the room smelt little off, but went to work. Coming back on the second night I asked why my room smelled like smoke, the young girl said promptly that I was on a SMOKING Floor. Yikes, Being from the Northeast, we haven't had smoking floors/rooms for a long time, so I forgot to ask. She changed my room, and rest was average. Better places to stay near by, Ayers Anaheim is 400%

Summary: I love Hampton Inns for business and value travel. Summary: The rooms are spacious and very clean but the walls are paper thin. If you are a light sleeper then it may not be the best fit for you. We stayed on the first floor overlooking the pool in room 128. We could hear someone in the next room snoring! The doors would slam shut and rattle the walls. The room we had did not have a bathtub only a walk in shower. That could be an issue for some people. The wifi was terrible. Never seemed to work. It's a business hotel so they should get it fixed for people who need to work during their stay. Breakfast area was nice and had a lot of options. I'd stay here again but it wouldn't be my first choice.

Coffee and breakfast provided for free. Breakfast served were omelets, sausage, waffle, bread, muffins, yoghurt, juice etc... It was filling to start the day.   This inn is very near Disneyland. Summary Heading: Excellent Property, Even for Disneyland Visitors
Summary: As others have noted, this is a newer property tucked slightly back from the main road. It is an easy walk to Target and a nice-enough shopping center with various businesses (including restaurants).  Many other restaurants are within easy driving distance. We drove 2-3 minutes to discover Rubio's Mexican Grill (slightly up-market fast food); Rubio's original fish taco = tasty.  We stayed here to be away from all the Disneyland (DL) traffic associated with closer-in hotels.  There are pros and cons to this strategy.   We had free internet, free hotel parking, and free breakfast by staying 6 miles away from DL (at a price comparable or a little less than what we would get closer in). You won't get that kind of a deal staying at a hotel closer to DL. There were fewer guests here

The breakfast (included) was more than adequate, with both hot and cold selections.  My only suggestion would be adding better-quality, local pastries and breads and losing the basic, Sara Lee-type frozen stuff that is defrosted and served. Summary: The hotel appeared to be a newer hotel in what seemed to be a business district. There were chocolate chip cookies at the desk in the evening and a complimentary hot breakfast in the morning. Our breakfast included omelets, potatoes, bacon, make your own waffles, cereal, toast, bagels, muffins, juice, milk, hot chocolate, coffee. There were numerous restaurants within a short 5-minute or less drive and few that you could probably walk to. We had a two-queen room and had plenty of space, and it was clean and comfortable. The sink is actually inside of the bathroom with the shower and toilet, which wasn't an issue for us but could be an issue if you have several people trying to shower and get ready in the morning at the same time. Summary: Enjoyed our stay at this hotel.  The hotel is kept very clean and neat.  Parking is free and they have a business center with two PC‚Äôs for guests to use also free. Each morning they had eggs along with bacon, sausage patties or sausage links and some mornings they had home fries.  They also had a waffle maker so you could make your own waffles.  For a lighter breakfast they had cereal (hot & cold varieties), yogurt, toast, bagels, pastries, cut up fruit, juice etc.  The area was kept stocked and clean. Summary Heading: Good Hampton Inn with Central Location
Summary: Nice Hampton Inn for business or leisure in this area.  Not too far from Disneyland and good restaurants.  It is a nice area very close to several businesses including Mitsubishi, Yamaha, Mary Kay, etc.  The beds are super comfortable and the hotel is quiet.  The staff is very friendly which is always appreciated.

Summary: Great hotel....was very pleased with the services provided. It was a great location in the middle of everything for Disneyland, knots barry farm, etc. Next time i go to LA i'm going to stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Stayed 12 days on business. Very quiet great comfortable beds and very clean. The front desk staff are the best made me feel like family. In a great location just off the 405. Close to many restaurants my favorite is "The Fish" . It is an 8 mile drive to Seal Beach to walk the pier and shop or dine at the many restaurants there or drive a few more miles to Huntington Beach. There is a race track a few minutes away. A nice breakfast buffet but the same boring Hampton Breakfast. I definitely would stay there again. is on Yamaha Way next door to the Yamaha factory.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I would give this place a 3.5 but Tripadvisor doesn't allow .5 star ratings.  We stayed here for the weekend a few weeks ago.  Overall it was ok.  I originally asked the guy for a room that was away from the ice machine or some place quiet.  He ended up putting me on the first floor by the pool.  Not exactly quiet.  We ended up moving to the third floor and that was better.  The reason I gave this place less stars than most was because we stayed only two nights but they didn't refill the toiletries and we ran out - and their shampoos and conditioners are tiny.  My husband usually uses what the hotel provides and I bring my own.  If we both used their stuff we would have been out the first time I used it.  We ended up running out of the shampoo.  Sure we could have gone next door

Summary: New property, friendly staff, close enough to Disney without the Disney hassle. Easy access to all freeways..great value, free parking vs. Disney properties with parking fees. Breakfast area was clean and staffed continually....outside pool was refreshing after a long day
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I'm not sure why we ever stay at any other chain.  The price was great, awesome breakfast with a different hot option each day.  One day was bacon sausage and eggs, another was roasted potatoes with toasted egg and cheese bagel halves.  Make your own waffles that even I can't screw up.  The kids loved it, pool was heated, rooms were clean, comfy and nicely decorated.  Seemed to be in a good area and about 10 min to attractions without having to take the freeways! This will be our first choice the next time we are in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Great hotel for Disneyland or exploring LA.  Less than 10 min. drive to Disney or to the freeway for other things.  This was the first time we have stayed in a Hampton Inn, and we were pleasantly surprised by how clean the rooms and bedding were.  They even wash the duvets in between guests.  We enjoyed the free breakfasts, too, with a zillion options that kept everyone happy, but didn't feel as heavy as some of the other hotel breakfasts.  Customer service was good.  The pool is smaller and not as much of a draw.  We have stayed at plenty of luxury hotels, and I found this to be good competition between the clean rooms and the great breakfast, for a great value!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We had just spent a week at the Sheraton Park in Anaheim, a lovely hotel, sowe weren't expecting too much from the Hampton - even though It is part of the HiltonGroup.  We were 2 adults, 3 kids (ages 11, 4, 1).  We were surprised at the size of the rooms - big enough for us to control our mess for 8 nights!  The location is good too, just off Katella which is one of the main roads back to Anaheim.  In fact if you don't want to stay in nasty expensive hotels in Anaheim - but don't mind a bit of travel, a bus goes along Katella to the south of Disney.  Adventure City is a couple of blocks away formthe hotel - great for kids.  The staff are friendly& helpful, and try to make  evything easy.  Rooms are clean, plenty of towels. Summary: Loved this hotel.  Spacious, clean rooms with great beds.  The breakfast area was very large and well maintained.  Hotel staff were helpful and friendly.  We were passing through, but others have commented on this being a great location for area attractions.  Definitely recommend.

Summary: It is about 15 minutes from Disney, easy drive.  This hotel is really nice and clean.  People at front desk were very friendly.. Breakfast was not mad crowded like hotels right next to Disney, which was really nice.  One con is there is not a hot tub but does have a nice pool. Hotel is newer and not run down.

Summary: nice people, clean facilities, comfortable beds. A good stay.

Summary: Had a wonderful time in CA  when we went to Disneyland and Medival Times. The Hampton Inn was a  very convenient ( 15 mins.away) too both places. NO resort fee like the other hotels. Very clean, staff hospitable,and the breakfast was good. Will definitely stay there the next time we head to Disneyland. THX, Hampton Inn !!

Summary: This was the perfect place to stay on our trip,far enough away from the Disney-mania after a long day at the park but only a 15 min drive to the parking garage.Plenty  of places to eat around the hotel,my favorite Del Taco open 24 hrs and a Target in case you forgot things.The rooms were spacious,comfortable and clean.The morning breakfast was great with eggs,bacon, potatoes and make your own waffles.Cereal,fruit, pastries and oatmeal too.Free WiFi and parking was a plus.
