Summary Heading: Good choice to visit Disneyland in Anaheim..
Summary: We stayed at Hampton Inn for our trip to Disneyland, Anaheim. My wife, me and three kids we shared one big room. There was two queen beds in the room and hotel stuff put one extra bed. There was still enough space in the room for all of us.We just stayed overnight but I can say the hotel entrance, the building and rooms are nice and clean. I was surprised having plastic dishes and paper cups at the breakfast, but then I am informed that this is quit normal in the States :) Another good think is to have many fast food restaurants just behind the hotel:) If you have a car, this hotel is very convenient to visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Best Hampton Inn I have Ever Stayed
Summary: Very nice Hampton Inn.  By far the best Hampton Inn that I have ever stayed.  Super clean and in a nice area.  Off the beatin path a little, but great price and great hotel.    Friendly staff.  I will definetly stay again.

Summary Heading: Awesome Location Near Disney & Fantastic Rooms
Summary: We loved the Hampton Inn for our trip to Disney. It was just a short drive to get to Disneyland in the morning. We just stayed overnight but I would have stayed longer. The fee was very reasonable for such a great, clean hotel room. The linens were clean and the bed was so comfortable. They greeted with cookies and had food in the morning for breakfast which was included in the price. We didn't go in the pool because it was raining but it looked fantastic. The service was great too. It was new in appearance. The only downfall was we couldn't find any great places to have dinner at... we ended up eating at the Olive Garden nearby but wasn't very good at all. I'm sure there are better choices if we would have looked; can't fault the hotel. I would stay here again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Typical clean, friendly Hampton.  About 10 minutes from Disneyland parking.  MUCH cheaper than the Anaheim options, tax rate is about 5% less, and no "resort fee".  Very quiet, filled with mostly business men instead of screaming/unruly kids.  I'll gladly trade the chaos for a 10 minute drive.  Especially since I can stop at In-N-Out on the way.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Nice hotel. Not to far from Knotts Berry Farm or Disneyland. King room was nice. Breakfast was ok. Will stay again during next years Rose Bowl when the Ducks go back to back in Rose Bowl victories. Go Ducks!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We were on our way to LA from San Diego, and decided to spend a day at Disney Land on the way. We chose to stay at this Hampton Inn as we felt it provided more value for money when compared to properties close to Disney Land. That said it took us less than half hour to get to Disney Land from here. The hotel was well maintained. rooms were clear, and the beds were comfortable. The breakfast was standard but nice. Appreciated the fact that they had different hot items on the menu each morning. Had no problems with check in or check out. Parking is free. Although they don't have an in house restaurant they are quite a lot of eating places nearby. Overall a really pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Our youth sports team stayed one night here year and came back again last weekend and everything was handled very well. Check-in was already set up with room keys. They opened breakfast 30 minutes early to accomodate our 5:50am departure time. The sales manager, Jay, gave us a great deal on the rate as well. The entire facility is well-maintained, quiet, and clean. It is close to the 605 and the 22 so it makes it easy to get around. We plan to return.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I am currently in my fourth (or fifth) stay at this hotel. There is nothing extraordinary about this hotel, but how much you need when you travel on business. The rooms are clean, check-in/check-out process is efficient. There is a plenty places to eat around the hotel. A couple things I wish were better - the internet is too slow and the workout facilities are too small/underequipped.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We really appreciate you bringing this to our attention as we are always looking for ways to provide the best possible experience for our guests. We hope to see you in the future and earn that perfect score!

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights and the accommodations were surprisingly comfortable.  The room was always clean. The only criticism I have is that the cleaning people never left enough towels. We had to ask each day for more towels. It is a Hampton Inn, so the "included" breakfast isn't great but it is sufficient for an on-the-go meal.  They also have little goodie bags with friut, a bottle of water,  a breakfast bar, and a muffin that you can just grab and go. We stayed on the 4th floor at the very end of the hall and it was very quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Clean, smoke free room, decent breakfast, good coffee. Check in people were professional and friendly. Good central location to Orange Cty and Los Angeles. Good wireless Internet.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Stayed for 3 evenings during a business trip in Southern California. Large and comfy rooms, even if somewhat dark. Details such as number of TV channels, free internet access leave little to complain for. A major drawback: no restaurant, cafeteria or bar in the hotel, and I haven't even seen a vending machine. But, quite a few restaurant options are available in the nearby shopping malls, which is truly walking distance away (2 minutes?). A basic but good quality breakfast is also available in the mornings. Parking, free and no problem at all. So, overall Hampton Inn gets a thumbs up, especially if you have things to do in this part of LA.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay in Orange County.
Summary: Stayed here several times to visit family in Westminster. This is clean, comfortable, updated, quiet and offers a decent continental breakfast. Very friendly staff, good value. Only 20 minutes to Disneyland, really close to Costco.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Had some family business to take care of in Cypress.  Was looking for a local hotel in the Hilton Family and found the Hampton Inn.  Great location off of Katella.  Very quiet, which was a big plus for us.  Lots of nice amenities, breakfast was great.  Would certainly return
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Excellent lodging, good price, fun staff.  Conveniently located, close to everything, but back in a business park off of Katella, so it is as quiet and peaceful as you will find in that  part of Orange County.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.
